ye kahnā to nahīñ kaafī ki bas pyāre lage ham ko unheñ kaise batā.eñ ham ki vo kaise lage ham ko 
makīñ the yā kisī khoī huī jannat kī tasvīreñ makāñ is shahr ke bhūle hue sapne lage ham ko 
ham un ko soch meñ gum dekh kar vāpas chale aa.e vo apne dhyān meñ baiThe hue achchhe lage ham ko 
bahut shaffāf the jab tak ki masrūf-e-tamannā the magar is kār-e-duniyā meñ baḌe dhabbe lage ham ko 
jahāñ tanhā hue dil meñ bhañvar se paḌne lagte haiñ agarche muddateñ guzrīñ kināre se lage ham ko 
ye kahna to nahin kafi ki bas pyare lage hum ko unhen kaise bataen hum ki wo kaise lage hum ko 
makin the ya kisi khoi hui jannat ki taswiren makan is shahr ke bhule hue sapne lage hum ko 
hum un ko soch mein gum dekh kar wapas chale aae wo apne dhyan mein baiThe hue achchhe lage hum ko 
bahut shaffaf the jab tak ki masruf-e-tamanna the magar is kar-e-duniya mein baDe dhabbe lage hum ko 
jahan tanha hue dil mein bhanwar se paDne lagte hain agarche muddaten guzrin kinare se lage hum ko

ye kyā hai mohabbat meñ to aisā nahīñ hotā maiñ tujh se judā ho ke bhī tanhā nahīñ hotā 
is moḌ se aage bhī koī moḌ hai varna yuuñ mere liye tū kabhī Thahrā nahīñ hotā 
kyuuñ merā muqaddar hai ujāloñ kī siyāhī kyuuñ raat ke Dhalne pe saverā nahīñ hotā 
yā itnī na tabdīl huī hotī ye duniyā yā maiñ ne ise ḳhvāb meñ dekhā nahīñ hotā 
sunte haiñ sabhī ġhaur se āvāz-e-jaras ko manzil kī taraf koī ravāna nahīñ hotā 
dil tark-e-ta.alluq pe bhī āmāda nahīñ hai aur haq bhī adā is se vafā kā nahīñ hotā 
ye kya hai mohabbat mein to aisa nahin hota main tujh se juda ho ke bhi tanha nahin hota 
is moD se aage bhi koi moD hai warna yun mere liye tu kabhi Thahra nahin hota 
kyun mera muqaddar hai ujalon ki siyahi kyun raat ke Dhalne pe sawera nahin hota 
ya itni na tabdil hui hoti ye duniya ya main ne ise KHwab mein dekha nahin hota 
sunte hain sabhi ghaur se aawaz-e-jaras ko manzil ki taraf koi rawana nahin hota 
dil tark-e-talluq pe bhi aamada nahin hai aur haq bhi ada is se wafa ka nahin hota

kahte haiñ jis ko huur vo insāñ tumhīñ to ho jaatī hai jis pe jaan mirī jaañ tumhīñ to ho 
matlab kī kah rahe haiñ vo daanā hamīñ to haiñ matlab kī pūchhte ho vo nādāñ tumhīñ to ho 
aatā hai bād-e-zulm tumhīñ ko to rahm bhī apne kiye se dil meñ pashemāñ tumhīñ to ho 
pachhtāoge bahut mire dil ko ujaaḌ kar is ghar meñ aur kaun hai mehmāñ tumhīñ to ho 
ik roz rañg lā.eñgī ye mehrbāniyāñ ham jānte the jaan ke ḳhvāhāñ tumhīñ to ho 
dildār o dil-fareb dil-āzār o dil-sitāñ lākhoñ meñ ham kaheñge ki haañ haañ tumhīñ to ho 
karte ho 'dāġh' duur se but-ḳhāne ko salām apnī tarah ke ek musalmāñ tumhīñ to ho 
kahte hain jis ko hur wo insan tumhin to ho jati hai jis pe jaan meri jaan tumhin to ho 
matlab ki kah rahe hain wo dana hamin to hain matlab ki puchhte ho wo nadan tumhin to ho 
aata hai baad-e-zulm tumhin ko to rahm bhi apne kiye se dil mein pasheman tumhin to ho 
pachhtaoge bahut mere dil ko ujaD kar is ghar mein aur kaun hai mehman tumhin to ho 
ek roz rang laengi ye mehrbaniyan hum jaante the jaan ke KHwahan tumhin to ho 
dildar o dil-fareb dil-azar o dil-sitan lakhon mein hum kahenge ki han han tumhin to ho 
karte ho 'dagh' dur se but-KHane ko salam apni tarah ke ek musalman tumhin to ho

mirī zindagī hai zālim tire ġham se āshkārā tirā ġham hai dar-haqīqat mujhe zindagī se pyārā 
vo agar burā na māneñ to jahān-e-rañg-o-bū meñ maiñ sukūn-e-dil kī ḳhātir koī DhūñDh luuñ sahārā 
mujhe tujh se ḳhaas nisbat maiñ rahīn-e-mauj-e-tūfāñ jinheñ zindagī thī pyārī unheñ mil gayā kinārā 
mujhe aa gayā yaqīñ sā ki yahī hai merī manzil sar-e-rāh jab kisī ne mujhe daf.atan pukārā 
ye ḳhunuk ḳhunuk havā.eñ ye jhukī jhukī ghaTā.eñ vo nazar bhī kyā nazar hai jo samajh na le ishāra 
maiñ batā.ūñ farq nāseh jo hai mujh meñ aur tujh meñ mirī zindagī talātum tirī zindagī kinārā 
mujhe faḳhr hai isī par ye karam bhī hai mujhī par tirī kam-nigāhiyāñ bhī mujhe kyuuñ na hoñ gavārā 
mujhe guftugū se baḌh kar ġham-e-izn-e-guftugū hai vahī baat pūchhte haiñ jo na kah sakūñ dobāra 
koī ai 'shakīl' pūchhe ye junūñ nahīñ to kyā hai ki usī ke ho ga.e ham jo na ho sakā hamārā 
meri zindagi hai zalim tere gham se aashkara tera gham hai dar-haqiqat mujhe zindagi se pyara 
wo agar bura na manen to jahan-e-rang-o-bu mein main sukun-e-dil ki KHatir koi DhunDh lun sahaara 
mujhe tujh se KHas nisbat main rahin-e-mauj-e-tufan jinhen zindagi thi pyari unhen mil gaya kinara 
mujhe aa gaya yaqin sa ki yahi hai meri manzil sar-e-rah jab kisi ne mujhe dafatan pukara 
ye KHunuk KHunuk hawaen ye jhuki jhuki ghaTaen wo nazar bhi kya nazar hai jo samajh na le ishaara 
main bataun farq naseh jo hai mujh mein aur tujh mein meri zindagi talatum teri zindagi kinara 
mujhe faKHr hai isi par ye karam bhi hai mujhi par teri kam-nigahiyan bhi mujhe kyun na hon gawara 
mujhe guftugu se baDh kar gham-e-izn-e-guftugu hai wahi baat puchhte hain jo na kah sakun dobara 
koi ai 'shakil' puchhe ye junun nahin to kya hai ki usi ke ho gae hum jo na ho saka hamara

junūñ se guzarne ko jī chāhtā hai hañsī zabt karne ko jī chāhtā hai 
jahāñ ishq meñ Duub kar rah ga.e haiñ vahīñ phir ubharne ko jī chāhtā hai 
vo ham se ḳhafā haiñ ham un se ḳhafā haiñ magar baat karne ko jī chāhtā hai 
hai muddat se be-rañg naqsh-e-mohabbat koī rañg bharne ko jī chāhtā hai 
ba-īñ ḳhud-sarī vo ġhurūr-e-mohabbat unheñ sajda karne ko jī chāhtā hai 
qazā muzhda-e-zindagī le ke aa.e kuchh is tarah marne ko jī chāhtā hai 
nizām-e-do-ālam kī ho ḳhair yā-rab phir ik aah karne ko jī chāhtā hai 
gunāh-e-mukarrar 'shakīl' allāh allāh bigaḌ kar sañvarne ko jī chāhtā hai 
junun se guzarne ko ji chahta hai hansi zabt karne ko ji chahta hai 
jahan ishq mein Dub kar rah gae hain wahin phir ubharne ko ji chahta hai 
wo hum se KHafa hain hum un se KHafa hain magar baat karne ko ji chahta hai 
hai muddat se be-rang naqsh-e-mohabbat koi rang bharne ko ji chahta hai 
ba-in KHud-sari wo ghurur-e-mohabbat unhen sajda karne ko ji chahta hai 
qaza muzhda-e-zindagi le ke aae kuchh is tarah marne ko ji chahta hai 
nizam-e-do-alam ki ho KHair ya-rab phir ek aah karne ko ji chahta hai 
gunah-e-mukarrar 'shakil' allah allah bigaD kar sanwarne ko ji chahta hai

havā ke zor se pindār-e-bām-o-dar bhī gayā charāġh ko jo bachāte the un kā ghar bhī gayā 
pukārte rahe mahfūz kashtiyoñ vaale maiñ Dūbtā huā dariyā ke paar utar bhī gayā 
ab ehtiyāt kī dīvār kyā uThāte ho jo chor dil meñ chhupā thā vo kaam kar bhī gayā 
maiñ chup rahā ki isī meñ thī āfiyat jaañ kī koī to merī tarah thā jo daar par bhī gayā 
sulagte sochte vīrān mausamoñ kī tarah kaḌā thā ahd-e-javānī magar guzar bhī gayā 
jise bhulā na sakā us ko yaad kyā rakhtā jo naam lab pe rahā zehn se utar bhī gayā 
phaTī phaTī huī āñkhoñ se yuuñ na dekh mujhe tujhe talāsh hai jis shaḳhs kī vo mar bhī gayā 
magar falak ko adāvat usī ke ghar se thī jahāñ 'farāz' na thā sail-e-ġham udhar bhī gayā 
hawa ke zor se pindar-e-baam-o-dar bhi gaya charagh ko jo bachate the un ka ghar bhi gaya 
pukarte rahe mahfuz kashtiyon wale main Dubta hua dariya ke par utar bhi gaya 
ab ehtiyat ki diwar kya uThate ho jo chor dil mein chhupa tha wo kaam kar bhi gaya 
main chup raha ki isi mein thi aafiyat jaan ki koi to meri tarah tha jo dar par bhi gaya 
sulagte sochte viran mausamon ki tarah kaDa tha ahd-e-jawani magar guzar bhi gaya 
jise bhula na saka us ko yaad kya rakhta jo nam lab pe raha zehn se utar bhi gaya 
phaTi phaTi hui aankhon se yun na dekh mujhe tujhe talash hai jis shaKHs ki wo mar bhi gaya 
magar falak ko adawat usi ke ghar se thi jahan 'faraaz' na tha sail-e-gham udhar bhi gaya

kis shai pe yahāñ vaqt kā saaya nahīñ hotā ik ḳhvāb-e-mohabbat hai ki būḌhā nahīñ hotā 
vo vaqt bhī aatā hai jab āñkhoñ meñ hamārī phirtī haiñ vo shakleñ jinheñ dekhā nahīñ hotā 
bārish vo barastī hai ki bhar jaate haiñ jal-thal dekho to kahīñ abr kā TukḌā nahīñ hotā 
ghir jaatā hai dil dard kī har band galī meñ chāho ki nikal jaa.eñ to rasta nahīñ hotā 
yādoñ pe bhī jam jaatī hai jab gard-e-zamāna miltā hai vo paiġhām ki pahuñchā nahīñ hotā 
tanhā.ī meñ karnī to hai ik baat kisī se lekin vo kisī vaqt akelā nahīñ hotā 
kyā us se gila kījiye barbādī-e-dil kā ham se bhī to iz.hār-e-tamannā nahīñ hotā 
kis shai pe yahan waqt ka saya nahin hota ek KHwab-e-mohabbat hai ki buDha nahin hota 
wo waqt bhi aata hai jab aankhon mein hamari phirti hain wo shaklen jinhen dekha nahin hota 
barish wo barasti hai ki bhar jate hain jal-thal dekho to kahin abr ka TukDa nahin hota 
ghir jata hai dil dard ki har band gali mein chaho ki nikal jaen to rasta nahin hota 
yaadon pe bhi jam jati hai jab gard-e-zamana milta hai wo paigham ki pahuncha nahin hota 
tanhai mein karni to hai ek baat kisi se lekin wo kisi waqt akela nahin hota 
kya us se gila kijiye barbaadi-e-dil ka hum se bhi to izhaar-e-tamanna nahin hota

kaabe kī hai havas kabhī kū-e-butāñ kī hai mujh ko ḳhabar nahīñ mirī miTTī kahāñ kī hai 
sun ke mirā fasāna unheñ lutf aa gayā suntā huuñ ab ki roz talab qissa-ḳhvāñ kī hai 
paiġhām-bar kī baat par aapas meñ ranj kyā merī zabāñ kī hai na tumhārī zabāñ kī hai 
kuchh tāzgī ho lazzat-e-āzār ke liye har dam mujhe talāsh na.e āsmāñ kī hai 
jāñ-bar bhī ho ga.e haiñ bahut mujh se nīm-jāñ kyā ġham hai ai tabīb jo puurī vahāñ kī hai 
hasrat baras rahī hai hamāre mazār par kahte haiñ sab ye qabr kisī naujavāñ kī hai 
vaqt-e-ḳhirām-e-nāz dikhā do judā judā ye chaal hashr kī ye ravish āsmāñ kī hai 
fursat kahāñ ki ham se kisī vaqt tū mile din ġhair kā hai raat tire pāsbāñ kī hai 
qāsid kī guftugū se tasallī ho kis tarah chhuptī nahīñ vo baat jo terī zabāñ kī hai 
jaur-e-raqīb o zulm-e-falak kā nahīñ ḳhayāl tashvīsh ek ḳhātir-e-nā-mehrbāñ kī hai 
sun kar mirā fasāna-e-ġham us ne ye kahā ho jaa.e jhuuT sach yahī ḳhūbī bayāñ kī hai 
dāman sambhāl bāñdh kamar āstīñ chaḌhā ḳhanjar nikāl dil meñ agar imtihāñ kī hai 
har har nafas meñ dil se nikalne lagā ġhubār kyā jaane gard-e-rāh ye kis kārvāñ kī hai 
kyūñki na aate ḳhuld se aadam zamīn par mauzūñ vahīñ vo ḳhuub hai jo sunte jahāñ kī hai 
taqdīr se ye pūchh rahā huuñ ki ishq meñ tadbīr koī bhī sitam-e-nā-gahāñ kī hai 
urdu hai jis kā naam hamīñ jānte haiñ 'dāġh' hindostāñ meñ dhuum hamārī zabāñ kī hai 
kabe ki hai hawas kabhi ku-e-butan ki hai mujh ko KHabar nahin meri miTTi kahan ki hai 
sun ke mera fasana unhen lutf aa gaya sunta hun ab ki roz talab qissa-KHwan ki hai 
paigham-bar ki baat par aapas mein ranj kya meri zaban ki hai na tumhaari zaban ki hai 
kuchh tazgi ho lazzat-e-azar ke liye har dam mujhe talash nae aasman ki hai 
jaan-bar bhi ho gae hain bahut mujh se nim-jaan kya gham hai ai tabib jo puri wahan ki hai 
hasrat baras rahi hai hamare mazar par kahte hain sab ye qabr kisi naujawan ki hai 
waqt-e-KHiram-e-naz dikha do juda juda ye chaal hashr ki ye rawish aasman ki hai 
fursat kahan ki hum se kisi waqt tu mile din ghair ka hai raat tere pasban ki hai 
qasid ki guftugu se tasalli ho kis tarah chhupti nahin wo baat jo teri zaban ki hai 
jaur-e-raqib o zulm-e-falak ka nahin KHayal tashwish ek KHatir-e-na-mehrban ki hai 
sun kar mera fasana-e-gham us ne ye kaha ho jae jhuT sach yahi KHubi bayan ki hai 
daman sambhaal bandh kamar aastin chaDha KHanjar nikal dil mein agar imtihan ki hai 
har har nafas mein dil se nikalne laga ghubar kya jaane gard-e-rah ye kis karwan ki hai 
kyunki na aate KHuld se aadam zamin par mauzun wahin wo KHub hai jo sunte jahan ki hai 
taqdir se ye puchh raha hun ki ishq mein tadbir koi bhi sitam-e-na-gahan ki hai 
urdu hai jis ka nam hamin jaante hain 'dagh' hindostan mein dhum hamari zaban ki hai

kaun aayā rāste ā.īna-ḳhāne ho ga.e raat raushan ho ga.ī din bhī suhāne ho ga.e 
kyuuñ havelī ke ujaḌne kā mujhe afsos ho saikḌoñ be-ghar parindoñ ke Thikāne ho ga.e 
jaao un kamroñ ke ā.īne uThā kar pheñk do be-adab ye kah rahe haiñ ham purāne ho ga.e 
ye bhī mumkin hai ki maiñ ne us ko pahchānā na ho ab use dekhe hue kitne zamāne ho ga.e 
palkoñ par ye aañsū pyaar kī tauhīn the āñkhoñ se gire motī ke daane ho ga.e 
kaun aaya raste aaina-KHane ho gae raat raushan ho gai din bhi suhane ho gae 
kyun haweli ke ujaDne ka mujhe afsos ho saikDon be-ghar parindon ke Thikane ho gae 
jao un kamron ke aaine uTha kar phenk do be-adab ye kah rahe hain hum purane ho gae 
ye bhi mumkin hai ki main ne us ko pahchana na ho ab use dekhe hue kitne zamane ho gae 
palkon par ye aansu pyar ki tauhin the aankhon se gire moti ke dane ho gae

na gul-e-naġhma huuñ na parda-e-sāz maiñ huuñ apnī shikast kī āvāz 
tū aur ārā.ish-e-ḳham-e-kākul maiñ aur andesha-hā-e-dūr-darāz 
lāf-e-tamkīñ fareb-e-sāda-dilī ham haiñ aur rāz-hā-e-sīna-gudāz 
huuñ giraftār-e-ulfat-e-sayyād varna baaqī hai tāqat-e-parvāz 
vo bhī din ho ki us sitamgar se naaz khīñchūñ bajā.e hasrat-e-nāz 
nahīñ dil meñ mire vo qatra-e-ḳhūñ jis se mizhgāñ huī na ho gul-bāz 
ai tirā ġhamza yak-qalam-añgez ai tirā zulm sar-ba-sar andāz 
tū huā jalva-gar mubārak ho rezish-e-sajda-e-jabīn-e-niyāz 
mujh ko pūchhā to kuchh ġhazab na huā maiñ ġharīb aur tū ġharīb-navāz 
'asad'-ullāh ḳhaañ tamām huā ai dareġhā vo rind-e-shāhid-bāz 
na gul-e-naghma hun na parda-e-saz main hun apni shikast ki aawaz 
tu aur aaraish-e-KHam-e-kakul main aur andesha-ha-e-dur-daraaz 
laf-e-tamkin fareb-e-sada-dili hum hain aur raaz-ha-e-sina-gudaz 
hun giraftar-e-ulfat-e-sayyaad warna baqi hai taqat-e-parwaz 
wo bhi din ho ki us sitamgar se naz khinchun bajae hasrat-e-naz 
nahin dil mein mere wo qatra-e-KHun jis se mizhgan hui na ho gul-baz 
ai tera ghamza yak-qalam-angez ai tera zulm sar-ba-sar andaz 
tu hua jalwa-gar mubarak ho rezish-e-sajda-e-jabin-e-niyaz 
mujh ko puchha to kuchh ghazab na hua main gharib aur tu gharib-nawaz 
'asad'-ullah KHan tamam hua ai daregha wo rind-e-shahid-baz

tirī anjuman meñ zālim ajab ehtimām dekhā kahīñ zindagī kī bārish kahīñ qatl-e-ām dekhā 
merī arz-e-shauq paḌh leñ ye kahāñ unheñ gavārā vahīñ chaak kar diyā ḳhat jahāñ merā naam dekhā 
baḌī minnatoñ se aa kar vo mujhe manā rahe haiñ maiñ bachā rahā huuñ dāman mirā intiqām dekhā 
ai 'shakīl' rūh-parvar tirī be-ḳhudī ke naġhme magar aaj tak na ham ne tire lab pe jaam dekhā 
teri anjuman mein zalim ajab ehtimam dekha kahin zindagi ki barish kahin qatl-e-am dekha 
meri arz-e-shauq paDh len ye kahan unhen gawara wahin chaak kar diya KHat jahan mera nam dekha 
baDi minnaton se aa kar wo mujhe mana rahe hain main bacha raha hun daman mera intiqam dekha 
ai 'shakil' ruh-parwar teri be-KHudi ke naghme magar aaj tak na hum ne tere lab pe jam dekha

patthar ke jigar vaalo ġham meñ vo ravānī hai ḳhud raah banā legā bahtā huā paanī hai 
ik zehn-e-pareshāñ meñ ḳhvāb-e-ġhazalistāñ hai patthar kī hifāzat meñ shīshe kī javānī hai 
dil se jo chhaTe bādal to aañkh meñ sāvan hai Thahrā huā dariyā hai bahtā huā paanī hai 
ham-rañg-e-dil-e-pur-ḳhūñ har lāla-e-sahrā.ī gesū kī tarah muztar ab raat kī raanī hai 
jis sañg pe nazreñ kiiñ ḳhurshīd-e-haqīqat hai jis chāñd se muñh moḌā patthar kī kahānī hai 
ai pīr-e-ḳhirad-mandāñ dil kī bhī zarūrat hai ye shahr-e-ġhazālāñ hai ye mulk-e-javānī hai 
ġham vaj.h-e-figār-e-dil ġham vaj.h-e-qarār-e-dil aañsū kabhī shīsha hai aañsū kabhī paanī hai 
is hausla-e-dil par ham ne bhī kafan pahnā hañs kar koī pūchhegā kyā jaan gañvānī hai 
din talḳh haqā.eq ke sahrāoñ kā sūraj hai shab gesū-e-afsāna yādoñ kī kahānī hai 
vo husn jise ham ne rusvā kiyā duniyā meñ nādīda haqīqat hai nā-gufta kahānī hai 
vo misra-e-āvāra dīvānoñ pe bhārī hai jis meñ tire gesū kī be-rabt kahānī hai 
ham ḳhushbu-e-āvāra ham nūr-e-pareshāñ haiñ ai 'badr' muqaddar meñ āshufta-bayānī hai 
patthar ke jigar walo gham mein wo rawani hai KHud rah bana lega bahta hua pani hai 
ek zehn-e-pareshan mein KHwab-e-ghazalistan hai patthar ki hifazat mein shishe ki jawani hai 
dil se jo chhaTe baadal to aankh mein sawan hai Thahra hua dariya hai bahta hua pani hai 
ham-rang-e-dil-e-pur-KHun har lala-e-sahrai gesu ki tarah muztar ab raat ki rani hai 
jis sang pe nazren kin KHurshid-e-haqiqat hai jis chand se munh moDa patthar ki kahani hai 
ai pir-e-KHirad-mandan dil ki bhi zarurat hai ye shahr-e-ghazalan hai ye mulk-e-jawani hai 
gham wajh-e-figar-e-dil gham wajh-e-qarar-e-dil aansu kabhi shisha hai aansu kabhi pani hai 
is hausla-e-dil par hum ne bhi kafan pahna hans kar koi puchhega kya jaan ganwani hai 
din talKH haqaeq ke sahraon ka suraj hai shab gesu-e-afsana yaadon ki kahani hai 
wo husn jise hum ne ruswa kiya duniya mein nadida haqiqat hai na-gufta kahani hai 
wo misra-e-awara diwanon pe bhaari hai jis mein tere gesu ki be-rabt kahani hai 
hum KHushbu-e-awara hum nur-e-pareshan hain ai 'badr' muqaddar mein aashufta-bayani hai

dil mirā soz-e-nihāñ se be-muhābā jal gayā ātish-e-ḳhāmosh kī mānind goyā jal gayā 
dil meñ zauq-e-vasl o yād-e-yār tak baaqī nahīñ aag is ghar meñ lagī aisī ki jo thā jal gayā 
maiñ adam se bhī pare huuñ varna ġhāfil bār-hā merī āh-e-ātishīñ se bāl-e-anqā jal gayā 
arz kiije jauhar-e-andesha kī garmī kahāñ kuchh ḳhayāl aayā thā vahshat kā ki sahrā jal gayā 
dil nahīñ tujh ko dikhātā varna dāġhoñ kī bahār is charāġhāñ kā karūñ kyā kār-farmā jal gayā 
maiñ huuñ aur afsurdagī kī aarzū 'ġhālib' ki dil dekh kar tarz-e-tapāk-e-ahl-e-duniyā jal gayā 
ḳhānmān-e-āshiqāñ dūkān-e-ātish-bāz hai sho.ala-rū jab ho ga.e garm-e-tamāshā jal gayā 
tā kujā afsos-e-garmī-hā-e-sohbat ai ḳhayāl dil ba-soz-e-ātish-e-dāġh-e-tamannā jal gayā 
hai 'asad' begāna-e-afsurdagī ai bekasī dil z-andāz-e-tapāk-e-ahl-e-duniyā jal gayā 
duud merā sumbulistāñ se kare hai ham-sarī bas-ki shauq-e-ātish-e-gul se sarāpā jal gayā 
sham.a-rūyāñ kī sar-añgusht-e-hinā.ī dekh kar ġhuncha-e-gul par-fishāñ parvāna-āsā jal gayā 
dil mera soz-e-nihan se be-muhaba jal gaya aatish-e-KHamosh ki manind goya jal gaya 
dil mein zauq-e-wasl o yaad-e-yar tak baqi nahin aag is ghar mein lagi aisi ki jo tha jal gaya 
main adam se bhi pare hun warna ghafil bar-ha meri aah-e-atishin se baal-e-anqa jal gaya 
arz kije jauhar-e-andesha ki garmi kahan kuchh KHayal aaya tha wahshat ka ki sahra jal gaya 
dil nahin tujh ko dikhata warna daghon ki bahaar is charaghan ka karun kya kar-farma jal gaya 
main hun aur afsurdagi ki aarzu 'ghaalib' ki dil dekh kar tarz-e-tapak-e-ahl-e-duniya jal gaya 
KHanman-e-ashiqan dukan-e-atish-baz hai shoala-ru jab ho gae garm-e-tamasha jal gaya 
ta kuja afsos-e-garmi-ha-e-sohbat ai KHayal dil ba-soz-e-atish-e-dagh-e-tamanna jal gaya 
hai 'asad' begana-e-afsurdagi ai bekasi dil z-andaz-e-tapak-e-ahl-e-duniya jal gaya 
dud mera sumbulistan se kare hai ham-sari bas-ki shauq-e-atish-e-gul se sarapa jal gaya 
shama-ruyan ki sar-angusht-e-hinai dekh kar ghuncha-e-gul par-fishan parwana-asa jal gaya

rog dil ko lagā ga.iiñ āñkheñ ik tamāshā dikhā ga.iiñ āñkheñ 
mil ke un kī nigāh-e-jādū se dil ko hairāñ banā ga.iiñ āñkheñ 
mujh ko dikhlā ke rāh-e-kūcha-yār kis ġhazab meñ phañsā ga.iiñ āñkheñ 
us ne dekhā thā kis nazar se mujhe dil meñ goyā samā ga.iiñ āñkheñ 
mahfil-e-yār meñ ba-zauq-e-nigāh lutf kyā kyā uThā ga.iiñ āñkheñ 
haal sunte vo kyā mirā 'hasrat' vo to kahiye sunā ga.iiñ āñkheñ 
rog dil ko laga gain aankhen ek tamasha dikha gain aankhen 
mil ke un ki nigah-e-jadu se dil ko hairan bana gain aankhen 
mujh ko dikhla ke rah-e-kucha-yar kis ghazab mein phansa gain aankhen 
us ne dekha tha kis nazar se mujhe dil mein goya sama gain aankhen 
mahfil-e-yar mein ba-zauq-e-nigah lutf kya kya uTha gain aankhen 
haal sunte wo kya mera 'hasrat' wo to kahiye suna gain aankhen

kis kis tarah se mujh ko na rusvā kiyā gayā ġhairoñ kā naam mere lahū se likhā gayā 
niklā thā maiñ sadā-e-jaras kī talāsh meñ dhoke se is sukūt ke sahrā meñ aa gayā 
kyuuñ aaj us kā zikr mujhe ḳhush na kar sakā kyuuñ aaj us kā naam mirā dil dukhā gayā 
maiñ jism ke hisār meñ mahsūr huuñ abhī vo ruuh kī hadoñ se bhī aage chalā gayā 
is hādse ko sun ke karegā yaqīñ koī sūraj ko ek jhoñkā havā kā bujhā gayā 
kis kis tarah se mujh ko na ruswa kiya gaya ghairon ka nam mere lahu se likha gaya 
nikla tha main sada-e-jaras ki talash mein dhoke se is sukut ke sahra mein aa gaya 
kyun aaj us ka zikr mujhe KHush na kar saka kyun aaj us ka nam mera dil dukha gaya 
main jism ke hisar mein mahsur hun abhi wo ruh ki hadon se bhi aage chala gaya 
is hadse ko sun ke karega yaqin koi suraj ko ek jhonka hawa ka bujha gaya

ham se khul jaao ba-vaqt-e-mai-parastī ek din varna ham chheḌeñge rakh kar uzr-e-mastī ek din 
ġharra-e-auj-e-binā-e-ālam-e-imkāñ na ho is bulandī ke nasīboñ meñ hai pastī ek din 
qarz kī piite the mai lekin samajhte the ki haañ rañg lāvegī hamārī fāqa-mastī ek din 
naġhma-hā-e-ġham ko bhī ai dil ġhanīmat jāniye be-sadā ho jā.egā ye sāz-e-hastī ek din 
dhaul-dhappā us sarāpā-nāz kā sheva nahīñ ham hī kar baiThe the 'ġhālib' pesh-dastī ek din 
hum se khul jao ba-waqt-e-mai-parasti ek din warna hum chheDenge rakh kar uzr-e-masti ek din 
gharra-e-auj-e-bina-e-alam-e-imkan na ho is bulandi ke nasibon mein hai pasti ek din 
qarz ki pite the mai lekin samajhte the ki han rang lawegi hamari faqa-masti ek din 
naghma-ha-e-gham ko bhi ai dil ghanimat jaaniye be-sada ho jaega ye saz-e-hasti ek din 
dhaul-dhappa us sarapa-naz ka shewa nahin hum hi kar baiThe the 'ghaalib' pesh-dasti ek din

mirī ġhazal kī tarah us kī bhī hukūmat hai tamām mulk meñ vo sab se ḳhūb-sūrat hai 
kabhī kabhī koī insān aisā lagtā hai purāne shahr meñ jaise na.ī imārat hai 
jamī hai der se kamre meñ ġhībatoñ kī nashist fazā meñ gard hai māhaul meñ kudūrat hai 
bahut dinoñ se mire saath thī magar kal shaam mujhe pata chalā vo kitnī ḳhūb-sūrat hai 
ye zā.irān-e-alī-gaḌh kā ḳhaas tohfa hai mirī ġhazal kā tabarruk diloñ kī barakat hai 
meri ghazal ki tarah us ki bhi hukumat hai tamam mulk mein wo sab se KHub-surat hai 
kabhi kabhi koi insan aisa lagta hai purane shahr mein jaise nai imarat hai 
jami hai der se kamre mein ghibaton ki nashist faza mein gard hai mahaul mein kudurat hai 
bahut dinon se mere sath thi magar kal sham mujhe pata chala wo kitni KHub-surat hai 
ye zairan-e-ali-gaDh ka KHas tohfa hai meri ghazal ka tabarruk dilon ki barakat hai

chamak rahī hai paroñ meñ uḌaan kī ḳhushbū bulā rahī hai bahut āsmān kī ḳhushbū 
bhaTak rahī hai purānī dulā.iyāñ oḌhe haveliyoñ meñ mire ḳhāndān kī ḳhushbū 
sunā ke koī kahānī hameñ sulātī thī duāoñ jaisī baḌe pān-dān kī ḳhushbū 
dabā thā phuul koī mez-posh ke nīche garaj rahī thī bahut pechvān kī ḳhushbū 
ajab vaqār thā sūkhe sunahre bāloñ meñ udāsiyoñ kī chamak zard lawn kī ḳhushbū 
vo itr-dān sā lahja mire buzurgoñ kā rachī-basī huī urdu zabān kī ḳhushbū 
ġhazal kī shāḳh pe ik phuul khilne vaalā hai badan se aane lagī za.afrān kī ḳhushbū 
imāratoñ kī bulandī pe koī mausam kyā kahāñ se aa ga.ī kachche makān kī ḳhushbū 
guloñ pe likhtī huī lā-ilāha-illallāh pahāḌiyoñ se utartī azaan kī ḳhushbū 
chamak rahi hai paron mein uDan ki KHushbu bula rahi hai bahut aasman ki KHushbu 
bhaTak rahi hai purani dulaiyan oDhe haweliyon mein mere KHandan ki KHushbu 
suna ke koi kahani hamein sulati thi duaon jaisi baDe pan-dan ki KHushbu 
daba tha phul koi mez-posh ke niche garaj rahi thi bahut pechwan ki KHushbu 
ajab waqar tha sukhe sunahre baalon mein udasiyon ki chamak zard lawn ki KHushbu 
wo itr-dan sa lahja mere buzurgon ka rachi-basi hui urdu zaban ki KHushbu 
ghazal ki shaKH pe ek phul khilne wala hai badan se aane lagi zafran ki KHushbu 
imaraton ki bulandi pe koi mausam kya kahan se aa gai kachche makan ki KHushbu 
gulon pe likhti hui la-ilaha-illallah pahaDiyon se utarti azan ki KHushbu

azmateñ sab tirī ḳhudā.ī kī haisiyat kyā mirī ikaa.ī kī 
mire hoñToñ ke phuul suukh ga.e tum ne kyā mujh se bevafā.ī kī 
sab mire haath paañv lafzoñ ke aur āñkheñ bhī raushnā.ī kī 
maiñ hī mulzim huuñ maiñ hī munsif huuñ koī sūrat nahīñ rihā.ī kī 
ik baras zindagī kā biit gayā tah jamī ek aur kaa.ī kī 
ab taraste raho ġhazal ke liye tum ne lafzoñ se bevafā.ī kī 
azmaten sab teri KHudai ki haisiyat kya meri ikai ki 
mere honTon ke phul sukh gae tum ne kya mujh se bewafai ki 
sab mere hath panw lafzon ke aur aankhen bhi raushnai ki 
main hi mulzim hun main hi munsif hun koi surat nahin rihai ki 
ek baras zindagi ka bit gaya tah jami ek aur kai ki 
ab taraste raho ghazal ke liye tum ne lafzon se bewafai ki

jāgtā huuñ maiñ ek akelā duniyā sotī hai kitnī vahshat hijr kī lambī raat meñ hotī hai 
yādoñ ke sailāb meñ jis dam maiñ ghir jaatā huuñ dil-dīvār udhar jaane kī ḳhvāhish hotī hai 
ḳhvāb dekhne kī hasrat meñ tanhā.ī merī āñkhoñ kī banjar dhartī meñ nīndeñ botī hai 
ḳhud ko tasallī denā kitnā mushkil hotā hai koī qīmtī chiiz achānak jab bhī khotī hai 
umr-safar jaarī hai bas ye khel dekhne ko ruuh badan kā bojh kahāñ tak kab tak Dhotī hai 
jagta hun main ek akela duniya soti hai kitni wahshat hijr ki lambi raat mein hoti hai 
yaadon ke sailab mein jis dam main ghir jata hun dil-diwar udhar jaane ki KHwahish hoti hai 
KHwab dekhne ki hasrat mein tanhai meri aankhon ki banjar dharti mein ninden boti hai 
KHud ko tasalli dena kitna mushkil hota hai koi qimti chiz achanak jab bhi khoti hai 
umr-safar jari hai bas ye khel dekhne ko ruh badan ka bojh kahan tak kab tak Dhoti hai

dard-e-dil kī unheñ ḳhabar na huī koī tadbīr kārgar na huī 
koshisheñ ham ne kiiñ hazār magar ishq meñ ek mo'tabar na huī 
kar chuke ham ko be-gunāh shahīd aap kī aañkh phir bhī tar na huī 
nā-rasā āh-e-āshiqāñ vo kahāñ duur un se jo be-asar na huī 
aa.ī bujhne ko apnī sham-e-hayāt shab-e-ġham kī magar sahar na huī 
shab the ham garm-e-nāla-hā-e-firāq sub.h ik āh-e-sard sar na huī 
tum se kyūñkar vo chhup sake 'hasrat' nigah-e-shauq parda dar na huī 
dard-e-dil ki unhen KHabar na hui koi tadbir kargar na hui 
koshishen hum ne kin hazar magar ishq mein ek mo'tabar na hui 
kar chuke hum ko be-gunah shahid aap ki aankh phir bhi tar na hui 
na-rasa aah-e-ashiqan wo kahan dur un se jo be-asar na hui 
aai bujhne ko apni sham-e-hayat shab-e-gham ki magar sahar na hui 
shab the hum garm-e-nala-ha-e-firaq subh ek aah-e-sard sar na hui 
tum se kyunkar wo chhup sake 'hasrat' nigah-e-shauq parda dar na hui

dil churā kar nazar churā.ī hai luT ga.e luT ga.e duhā.ī hai 
ek din mil ke phir nahīñ milte kis qayāmat kī ye judā.ī hai 
ai asar kar na intizār-e-duā māñgnā saḳht be-hayā.ī hai 
maiñ yahāñ huuñ vahāñ hai dil merā nā-rasā.ī ajab rasā.ī hai 
is tarah ahl-e-nāz naaz kareñ bandagī hai ki ye ḳhudā.ī hai 
paanī pī pī ke tauba kartā huuñ pārsā.ī sī pārsā.ī hai 
va.ada karne kā iḳhtiyār rahā baat karne meñ kyā burā.ī hai 
kab nikaltā hai ab jigar se tiir ye bhī kyā terī āshnā.ī hai 
'dāġh' un se dimāġh karte haiñ nahīñ mālūm kyā samā.ī hai 
dil chura kar nazar churai hai luT gae luT gae duhai hai 
ek din mil ke phir nahin milte kis qayamat ki ye judai hai 
ai asar kar na intizar-e-dua mangna saKHt be-hayai hai 
main yahan hun wahan hai dil mera na-rasai ajab rasai hai 
is tarah ahl-e-naz naz karen bandagi hai ki ye KHudai hai 
pani pi pi ke tauba karta hun parsai si parsai hai 
wada karne ka iKHtiyar raha baat karne mein kya burai hai 
kab nikalta hai ab jigar se tir ye bhi kya teri aashnai hai 
'dagh' un se dimagh karte hain nahin malum kya samai hai

jab tak nigār-e-dasht kā siina dukhā na thā sahrā meñ koī lāla-e-sahrā khilā na thā 
do jhīleñ us kī āñkhoñ meñ lahrā ke so ga.iiñ us vaqt merī 'umr kā dariyā chaḌhā na thā 
jaagī na thiiñ nasoñ meñ tamannā kī nāgineñ us gandumī sharāb ko jab tak chakhā na thā 
DhūñDā karo jahān-e-tahayyur meñ 'umr bhar vo chaltī phirtī chhāñv hai maiñ ne kahā na thā 
ik bevafā ke sāmne aañsū bahāte ham itnā hamārī aañkh kā paanī marā na thā 
vo kaale hoñT jaam samajh kar chaḌhā ga.e vo aab jis se maiñ ne vuzū tak kiyā na thā 
sab log apne apne ḳhudāoñ ko laa.e the ik ham hī aise the ki hamārā ḳhudā na thā 
vo kaalī āñkheñ shahr meñ mash.hūr thiiñ bahut tab un pe moTe shīshoñ kā chashma chaḌhā na thā 
maiñ sāhib-e-ġhazal thā hasīnoñ kī bazm meñ sar par ghanere baal the māthā khulā na thā 
jab tak nigar-e-dasht ka sina dukha na tha sahra mein koi lala-e-sahra khila na tha 
do jhilen us ki aankhon mein lahra ke so gain us waqt meri 'umr ka dariya chaDha na tha 
jagi na thin nason mein tamanna ki naginen us gandumi sharab ko jab tak chakha na tha 
DhunDa karo jahan-e-tahayyur mein 'umr bhar wo chalti phirti chhanw hai main ne kaha na tha 
ek bewafa ke samne aansu bahate hum itna hamari aankh ka pani mara na tha 
wo kale honT jam samajh kar chaDha gae wo aab jis se main ne wuzu tak kiya na tha 
sab log apne apne KHudaon ko lae the ek hum hi aise the ki hamara KHuda na tha 
wo kali aankhen shahr mein mashhur thin bahut tab un pe moTe shishon ka chashma chaDha na tha 
main sahib-e-ghazal tha hasinon ki bazm mein sar par ghanere baal the matha khula na tha

qismat-e-shauq aazmā na sake un se ham aañkh bhī milā na sake 
ham se yaañ ranj-e-hijr uTh na sakā vaañ vo majbūr the vo aa na sake 
Dar ye thā ro na deñ kahīñ vo unheñ ham hañsī meñ bhī gudgudā na sake 
ham se dil aap ne uThā to liyā par kahīñ aur bhī lagā na sake 
ab kahāñ tum kahāñ vo rabt-e-vafā yaad bhī jis kī ham dilā na sake 
dil meñ kyā kyā the 'arz-e-hāl ke shauq us ne pūchhā to kuchh batā na sake 
ham to kyā bhūlte unheñ 'hasrat' dil se vo bhī hameñ bhulā na sake 
qismat-e-shauq aazma na sake un se hum aankh bhi mila na sake 
hum se yan ranj-e-hijr uTh na saka wan wo majbur the wo aa na sake 
Dar ye tha ro na den kahin wo unhen hum hansi mein bhi gudguda na sake 
hum se dil aap ne uTha to liya par kahin aur bhi laga na sake 
ab kahan tum kahan wo rabt-e-wafa yaad bhi jis ki hum dila na sake 
dil mein kya kya the 'arz-e-haal ke shauq us ne puchha to kuchh bata na sake 
hum to kya bhulte unhen 'hasrat' dil se wo bhi hamein bhula na sake

dil ke bahlāne kī tadbīr to hai tū nahīñ hai tirī tasvīr to hai 
ham-safar chhoḌ ga.e mujh ko to kyā saath mere mirī taqdīr to hai 
qaid se chhūT ke bhī kyā paayā aaj bhī paañv meñ zanjīr to hai 
kyā majāl un kī na deñ ḳhat kā javāb baat kuchh bā.is-e-tāḳhīr to hai 
pursish-e-hāl ko vo aa hī ga.e kuchh bhī ho ishq meñ tāsīr to hai 
ġham kī duniyā rahe ābād 'shakīl' muflisī meñ koī jāgīr to hai 
dil ke bahlane ki tadbir to hai tu nahin hai teri taswir to hai 
ham-safar chhoD gae mujh ko to kya sath mere meri taqdir to hai 
qaid se chhuT ke bhi kya paya aaj bhi panw mein zanjir to hai 
kya majal un ki na den KHat ka jawab baat kuchh bais-e-taKHir to hai 
pursish-e-haal ko wo aa hi gae kuchh bhi ho ishq mein tasir to hai 
gham ki duniya rahe aabaad 'shakil' muflisi mein koi jagir to hai

tere va.ade ko kabhī jhuuT nahīñ samjhūñgā aaj kī raat bhī darvāza khulā rakkhūñgā 
dekhne ke liye ik chehra bahut hotā hai aañkh jab tak hai tujhe sirf tujhe dekhūñgā 
merī tanhā.ī kī rusvā.ī kī manzil aa.ī vasl ke lamhe se maiñ hijr kī shab badlūñgā 
shaam hote hī khulī saḌkoñ kī yaad aatī hai sochtā roz huuñ maiñ ghar se nahīñ niklūñgā 
tā-ki mahfūz rahe mere qalam kī hurmat sach mujhe likhnā hai maiñ husn ko sach likkhūñgā 
tere wade ko kabhi jhuT nahin samjhunga aaj ki raat bhi darwaza khula rakkhunga 
dekhne ke liye ek chehra bahut hota hai aankh jab tak hai tujhe sirf tujhe dekhunga 
meri tanhai ki ruswai ki manzil aai wasl ke lamhe se main hijr ki shab badlunga 
sham hote hi khuli saDkon ki yaad aati hai sochta roz hun main ghar se nahin niklunga 
ta-ki mahfuz rahe mere qalam ki hurmat sach mujhe likhna hai main husn ko sach likkhunga

jis bazm meñ tū naaz se guftār meñ aave jaañ kālbad-e-sūrat-e-dīvār meñ aave 
saa.e kī tarah saath phireñ sarv o sanobar tū is qad-e-dilkash se jo gulzār meñ aave 
tab nāz-e-girāñ mā.igi-e-ashk bajā hai jab laḳht-e-jigar dīda-e-ḳhūñ-bār meñ aave 
de mujh ko shikāyat kī ijāzat ki sitamgar kuchh tujh ko mazā bhī mire āzār meñ aave 
us chashm-e-fusūñ-gar kā agar paa.e ishāra tuutī kī tarah aa.ina guftār meñ aave 
kāñToñ kī zabāñ suukh ga.ī pyaas se yā rab ik ābla-pā vādī-e-pur-ḳhār meñ aave 
mar jā.ūñ na kyuuñ rashk se jab vo tan-e-nāzuk āġhosh-e-ḳham-e-halqa-e-zunnār meñ aave 
ġhārat-gar-e-nāmūs na ho gar havas-e-zar kyuuñ shāhid-e-gul baaġh se bāzār meñ aave 
tab chāk-e-garebāñ kā mazā hai dil-e-nālāñ jab ik nafas uljhā huā har taar meñ aave 
ātish-kada hai siina mirā rāz-e-nihāñ se ai vaa.e agar ma.ariz-e-iz.hār meñ aave 
ganjīna-e-ma.anī kā tilism us ko samajhiye jo lafz ki 'ġhālib' mire ash.ār meñ aave 
jis bazm mein tu naz se guftar mein aawe jaan kalbad-e-surat-e-diwar mein aawe 
sae ki tarah sath phiren sarw o sanobar tu is qad-e-dilkash se jo gulzar mein aawe 
tab naz-e-giran maigi-e-ashk baja hai jab laKHt-e-jigar dida-e-KHun-bar mein aawe 
de mujh ko shikayat ki ijazat ki sitamgar kuchh tujh ko maza bhi mere aazar mein aawe 
us chashm-e-fusun-gar ka agar pae ishaara tuti ki tarah aaina guftar mein aawe 
kanTon ki zaban sukh gai pyas se ya rab ek aabla-pa wadi-e-pur-KHar mein aawe 
mar jaun na kyun rashk se jab wo tan-e-nazuk aaghosh-e-KHam-e-halqa-e-zunnar mein aawe 
ghaarat-gar-e-namus na ho gar hawas-e-zar kyun shahid-e-gul bagh se bazar mein aawe 
tab chaak-e-gareban ka maza hai dil-e-nalan jab ek nafas uljha hua har tar mein aawe 
aatish-kada hai sina mera raaz-e-nihan se ai wae agar mariz-e-izhaar mein aawe 
ganjina-e-mani ka tilism us ko samajhiye jo lafz ki 'ghaalib' mere ashaar mein aawe

dil-e-nākām ke haiñ kaam ḳharāb kar liyā āshiqī meñ naam ḳharāb 
is ḳharābāt kā yahī hai maza ki rahe aadmī mudām ḳharāb 
dekh kar jins-e-dil vo kahte haiñ kyuuñ kare koī apne daam ḳharāb 
abr-e-tar se sabā hī achchhī thī merī miTTī huī tamām ḳharāb 
vo bhī saaqī mujhe nahīñ detā vo jo TuuTā paḌā hai jaam ḳharāb 
kyā milā ham ko zindagī ke sivā vo bhī dushvār nā-tamām ḳharāb

phul barse kahin shabnam kahin gauhar barse aur is dil ki taraf barse to patthar barse

manāzir the jo firdaus-e-tasavvur vo sab mastūr hote jā rahe haiñ 
badaltī jā rahī hai dil kī duniyā na.e dastūr hote jā rahe haiñ 
bahut maġhmūm the jo dīda-o-dil bahut masrūr hote jā rahe haiñ 
vafā par murdanī sī chhā chalī hai sitam kā nuur hote jā rahe haiñ 
kabhī vo paas aa.e jā rahe the magar ab duur hote jā rahe haiñ 
firāq o hijr ke tārīk lamhe sarāpā nuur hote jā rahe haiñ 
'shakīl' ehsās-e-gumnāmī se kah do ki ham mash.hūr hote jā rahe haiñ

manazir the jo firdaus-e-tasawwur wo sab mastur hote ja rahe hain

kabhi wo pas aae ja rahe the magar ab dur hote ja rahe hain 
firaq o hijr ke tarik lamhe sarapa nur hote ja rahe hain

zindagī un kī chaah meñ guzrī mustaqil dard-o-āh meñ guzrī 
rahmatoñ se nibāh meñ guzrī umr saarī gunāh meñ guzrī 
haa.e vo zindagī kī ik saa.at jo tirī bārgāh meñ guzrī 
sab kī nazroñ meñ sar-buland rahe jab tak un kī nigāh meñ guzrī 
maiñ vo ik rahrav-e-mohabbat huuñ jis kī manzil bhī raah meñ guzrī 
ik ḳhushī ham ne dil meñ chāhī thī vo bhī ġham kī panāh meñ guzrī 
zindagī apnī ai 'shakīl' ab tak talḳhī-e-rasm-o-rāh meñ guzrī 
zindagi un ki chah mein guzri mustaqil dard-o-ah mein guzri 
rahmaton se nibah mein guzri umr sari gunah mein guzri 
hae wo zindagi ki ek saat jo teri bargah mein guzri 
sab ki nazron mein sar-buland rahe jab tak un ki nigah mein guzri 
main wo ek rahraw-e-mohabbat hun jis ki manzil bhi rah mein guzri 
ek KHushi hum ne dil mein chahi thi wo bhi gham ki panah mein guzri 
zindagi apni ai 'shakil' ab tak talKHi-e-rasm-o-rah mein guzri

ummīd se kam chashm-e-ḳharīdār meñ aa.e ham log zarā der se bāzār meñ aa.e

ye aag havas kī hai jhulas degī ise bhī sūraj se kaho sāya-e-dīvār meñ aa.e 
baḌhtī hī chalī jaatī hai tanhā.ī hamārī kyā soch ke ham vādī-e-inkār meñ aa.e 
ummid se kam chashm-e-KHaridar mein aae hum log zara der se bazar mein aae

us but ke pujārī haiñ musalmān hazāroñ bigḌe haiñ isī kufr meñ īmān hazāroñ

ai shauq tirī pasti-e-himmat kā burā ho mushkil hue jo kaam the āsān hazāroñ 
āñkhoñ ne tujhe dekh liyā ab unheñ kyā ġham hālāñki abhī dil ko haiñ armān hazāroñ 
chhāne haiñ tire ishq meñ āshufta-sarī ne duniyā-e-musībat ke bayābān hazāroñ

us but ke pujari hain musalman hazaron bigDe hain isi kufr mein iman hazaron

tanhai mein bhi tere tasawwur ki badaulat dil-bastagi-e-gham ke hain saman hazaron

jo bhī darūn-e-dil hai vo bāhar na aa.egā ab āgahī kā zahr zabāñ par na aa.egā 
ab ke bichhaḌ ke us ko nadāmat thī is qadar jī chāhtā bhī ho to palaT kar na aa.egā 
yuuñ phir rahā hai kāñch kā paikar liye hue ġhāfil ko ye gumāñ hai ki patthar na aa.egā 
phir bo rahā huuñ aaj unhīñ sāhiloñ pe phuul phir jaise mauj meñ ye samundar na aa.egā 
maiñ jāñ-ba-lab huuñ tark-e-ta.alluq ke zahr se vo mutma.in ki harf to us par na aa.egā

ab ke bichhaD ke us ko nadamat thi is qadar ji chahta bhi ho to palaT kar na aaega

main jaan-ba-lab hun tark-e-talluq ke zahr se wo mutmain ki harf to us par na aaega

ham ne kis din tire kūche meñ guzārā na kiyā tū ne ai shoḳh magar kaam hamārā na kiyā 
ek hī baar huiiñ vaj.h-e-giraftārī-e-dil iltifāt un kī nigāhoñ ne dubārā na kiyā 
mahfil-e-yār kī rah jā.egī aadhī raunaq naaz ko us ne agar anjuman-ārā na kiyā 
tān-e-ahbāb sune sarzanish-e-ḳhalq sahī ham ne kyā kyā tirī ḳhātir se gavārā na kiyā 
jab diyā tum ne raqīboñ ko diyā jām-e-sharāb bhuul kar bhī mirī jānib ko ishārā na kiyā 
rū-ba-rū chashm-e-tasavvur ke vo har vaqt rahe na sahī aañkh ne gar un kā nazārā na kiyā 
gar yahī hai sitam-e-yār to ham ne 'hasrat' na kiyā kuchh bhī jo duniyā se kinārā na kiyā 
hum ne kis din tere kuche mein guzara na kiya tu ne ai shoKH magar kaam hamara na kiya 
ek hi bar huin wajh-e-giraftari-e-dil iltifat un ki nigahon ne dubara na kiya 
mahfil-e-yar ki rah jaegi aadhi raunaq naz ko us ne agar anjuman-ara na kiya 
tan-e-ahbab sune sarzanish-e-KHalq sahi hum ne kya kya teri KHatir se gawara na kiya 
jab diya tum ne raqibon ko diya jam-e-sharab bhul kar bhi meri jaanib ko ishaara na kiya 
ru-ba-ru chashm-e-tasawwur ke wo har waqt rahe na sahi aankh ne gar un ka nazara na kiya 
gar yahi hai sitam-e-yar to hum ne 'hasrat' na kiya kuchh bhi jo duniya se kinara na kiya

pyaar kī na.ī dastak dil pe phir sunā.ī dī chāñd sī koī sūrat ḳhvāb meñ dikhā.ī dī 
kis ne merī palkoñ pe titliyoñ ke par rakkhe aaj apnī aahaT bhī der tak sunā.ī dī 
ham ġharīb logoñ ke aaj bhī vahī din haiñ pahle kyā asīrī thī aaj kyā rihā.ī dī 
bārishoñ ke chehre par āñsuoñ se likhnā hai kuchh na koī paḌh paa.e aisī raushnā.ī dī 
āsmāñ zamīñ rakh kar donoñ ek muTThī meñ ik zarā sī laḌkī ne pyaar kī ḳhudā.ī dī 
ye tunak-mizājī to ḳhair us kī fitrat hai varna us ne chāhat bhī ham ko intihā.ī dī 
ye tanāv qudrat ne do diloñ meñ kyuuñ rakkhā mujh ko kaj-kulāhī dī us ko kaj-adā.ī dī 
pyar ki nai dastak dil pe phir sunai di chand si koi surat KHwab mein dikhai di 
kis ne meri palkon pe titliyon ke par rakkhe aaj apni aahaT bhi der tak sunai di 
hum gharib logon ke aaj bhi wahi din hain pahle kya asiri thi aaj kya rihai di 
barishon ke chehre par aansuon se likhna hai kuchh na koi paDh pae aisi raushnai di 
aasman zamin rakh kar donon ek muTThi mein ek zara si laDki ne pyar ki KHudai di 
ye tunak-mizaji to KHair us ki fitrat hai warna us ne chahat bhi hum ko intihai di 
ye tanaw qudrat ne do dilon mein kyun rakkha mujh ko kaj-kulahi di us ko kaj-adai di

kahāñ tak vaqt ke dariyā ko ham Thahrā huā dekheñ ye hasrat hai ki in āñkhoñ se kuchh hotā huā dekheñ 
bahut muddat huī ye aarzū karte hue ham ko kabhī manzar kahīñ ham koī an-dekhā huā dekheñ 
sukūt-e-shām se pahle kī manzil saḳht hotī hai kaho logoñ se sūraj ko na yuuñ Dhaltā huā dekheñ 
havā.eñ bādbāñ kholīñ lahū-āsār bārish ho zamīn-e-saḳht tujh ko phūltā-phaltā huā dekheñ 
dhueñ ke bādaloñ meñ chhup ga.e ujle makāñ saare ye chāhā thā ki manzar shahr kā badlā huā dekheñ 
hamārī be-hisī pe rone vaalā bhī nahīñ koī chalo jaldī chalo phir shahr ko jaltā huā dekheñ 
kahan tak waqt ke dariya ko hum Thahra hua dekhen ye hasrat hai ki in aankhon se kuchh hota hua dekhen 
bahut muddat hui ye aarzu karte hue hum ko kabhi manzar kahin hum koi an-dekha hua dekhen 
sukut-e-sham se pahle ki manzil saKHt hoti hai kaho logon se suraj ko na yun Dhalta hua dekhen 
hawaen baadban kholin lahu-asar barish ho zamin-e-saKHt tujh ko phulta-phalta hua dekhen 
dhuen ke baadalon mein chhup gae ujle makan sare ye chaha tha ki manzar shahr ka badla hua dekhen 
hamari be-hisi pe rone wala bhi nahin koi chalo jaldi chalo phir shahr ko jalta hua dekhen

shikve ke naam se be-mehr ḳhafā hotā hai ye bhī mat kah ki jo kahiye to gila hotā hai

maiñ jo gustāḳh huuñ ā.īn-e-ġhazal-ḳhvānī meñ ye bhī terā hī karam zauq-fazā hotā hai 
rakhiyo 'ġhālib' mujhe is talḳh-navā.ī meñ muaaf aaj kuchh dard mire dil meñ sivā hotā hai 
shikwe ke nam se be-mehr KHafa hota hai ye bhi mat kah ki jo kahiye to gila hota hai 
pur hun main shikwe se yun rag se jaise baja ek zara chheDiye phir dekhiye kya hota hai

ishq ki rah mein hai charKH-e-makaukab ki wo chaal sust-rau jaise koi aabla-pa hota hai

KHub tha pahle se hote jo hum apne bad-KHwah ki bhala chahte hain aur bura hota hai

KHama mera ki wo hai bar-bud-e-bazm-e-suKHan shah ki madh mein yun naghma-sara hota hai

sunsān rāstoñ se savārī na aa.egī ab dhuul se aTī huī laarī na aa.egī

kis fikr kis ḳhayāl meñ khoyā huā sā hai dil aaj terī yaad ko bhūlā huā sā hai 
gulshan meñ is tarah se kab aa.ī thī fasl-e-gul har phuul apnī shāḳh se TuuTā huā sā hai 
chal chal ke thak gayā hai ki manzil nahīñ koī kyuuñ vaqt ek moḌ pe Thahrā huā sā hai 
kyā hādisa huā hai jahāñ meñ ki aaj phir chehra har ek shaḳhs kā utrā huā sā hai 
nazrāna tere husn ko kyā deñ ki apne paas le de ke ek dil hai so TuuTā huā sā hai 
pahle the jo bhī aaj magar kārobār-e-ishq duniyā ke kārobār se miltā huā sā hai 
lagtā hai us kī bātoñ se ye 'shahryār' bhī yāroñ ke iltifāt kā maarā huā sā hai 
kis fikr kis KHayal mein khoya hua sa hai dil aaj teri yaad ko bhula hua sa hai 
gulshan mein is tarah se kab aai thi fasl-e-gul har phul apni shaKH se TuTa hua sa hai 
chal chal ke thak gaya hai ki manzil nahin koi kyun waqt ek moD pe Thahra hua sa hai

nazrana tere husn ko kya den ki apne pas le de ke ek dil hai so TuTa hua sa hai 
pahle the jo bhi aaj magar karobar-e-ishq duniya ke karobar se milta hua sa hai 
lagta hai us ki baaton se ye 'shahryar' bhi yaron ke iltifat ka mara hua sa hai

rat-jage taqsīm kartī phir rahī haiñ shahr meñ shauq jin āñkhoñ ko kal tak raat meñ sone kā thā 
is safar meñ bas mirī tanhā.ī mere saath thī har qadam kyuuñ ḳhauf mujh ko bhiiḌ meñ khone kā thā 
har bun-e-mū se darindoñ kī sadā aane lagī kaam hī aisā badan meñ ḳhvāhisheñ bone kā thā 
maiñ ne jab se ye sunā hai ḳhud se bhī nādim huuñ maiñ zikr tujh hoñToñ pe mere dar-ba-dar hone kā thā 
hans raha tha main bahut go waqt wo rone ka tha saKHt kitna marhala tujh se juda hone ka tha 
rat-jage taqsim karti phir rahi hain shahr mein shauq jin aankhon ko kal tak raat mein sone ka tha 
is safar mein bas meri tanhai mere sath thi har qadam kyun KHauf mujh ko bhiD mein khone ka tha 
har bun-e-mu se darindon ki sada aane lagi kaam hi aisa badan mein KHwahishen bone ka tha 
main ne jab se ye suna hai KHud se bhi nadim hun main zikr tujh honTon pe mere dar-ba-dar hone ka tha

dil meñ vo shor na āñkhoñ meñ vo nam rahtā hai ab tap-e-hijr tavaqqo se bhī kam rahtā hai 
kabhī sho.ale se lapakte the mire siine meñ ab kisī vaqt dhuāñ sā koī dam rahtā hai 
kyā ḳhudā jaane mire dil ko huā tere ba.ad na ḳhushī is meñ Thahartī hai na ġham rahtā hai 
rishta-e-tār-e-tamannā nahīñ TuuTā ab tak ab bhī āñkhoñ meñ tirī zulf kā ḳham rahtā hai 
chhoḌ jaatī hai har ik rut koī ḳhushbū koī rañg na sitam rahtā hai baaqī na karam rahtā hai 
dil mein wo shor na aankhon mein wo nam rahta hai ab tap-e-hijr tawaqqo se bhi kam rahta hai 
kabhi shoale se lapakte the mere sine mein ab kisi waqt dhuan sa koi dam rahta hai 
kya KHuda jaane mere dil ko hua tere baad na KHushi is mein Thaharti hai na gham rahta hai 
rishta-e-tar-e-tamanna nahin TuTa ab tak ab bhi aankhon mein teri zulf ka KHam rahta hai 
chhoD jati hai har ek rut koi KHushbu koi rang na sitam rahta hai baqi na karam rahta hai

chāñdnī meñ ruḳh-e-zebā nahīñ dekhā jaatā maah o ḳhurshīd ko yakjā nahīñ dekhā jaatā 
yuuñ to un āñkhoñ se kyā kyā nahīñ dekhā jaatā haañ magar apnā hī jalva nahīñ dekhā jaatā 
dīda-o-dil kī tabāhī mujhe manzūr magar un kā utrā huā chehra nahīñ dekhā jaatā 
zabt-e-ġham haañ vahī ashkoñ kā talātum ik baar ab to sūkhā huā dariyā nahīñ dekhā jaatā 
zindagī aa tujhe qātil ke havāle kar duuñ mujh se ab ḳhūn-e-tamannā nahīñ dekhā jaatā 
ab to jhūTī bhī tasallī ba-sar-o-chashm qubūl dil kā rah rah ke taḌapnā nahīñ dekhā jaatā 
chandni mein ruKH-e-zeba nahin dekha jata mah o KHurshid ko yakja nahin dekha jata 
yun to un aankhon se kya kya nahin dekha jata han magar apna hi jalwa nahin dekha jata 
dida-o-dil ki tabahi mujhe manzur magar un ka utra hua chehra nahin dekha jata 
zabt-e-gham han wahi ashkon ka talatum ek bar ab to sukha hua dariya nahin dekha jata 
zindagi aa tujhe qatil ke hawale kar dun mujh se ab KHun-e-tamanna nahin dekha jata 
ab to jhuTi bhi tasalli ba-sar-o-chashm qubul dil ka rah rah ke taDapna nahin dekha jata

maze jahān ke apnī nazar meñ ḳhaak nahīñ sivā.e ḳhūn-e-jigar so jigar meñ ḳhaak nahīñ 
magar ġhubār hue par havā uḌā le jaa.e vagarna taab o tavāñ bāl-o-par meñ ḳhaak nahīñ 
ye kis bahīsht-shamā.il kī aamad aamad hai ki ġhair-e-jalva-e-gul rahguzar meñ ḳhaak nahīñ 
bhalā use na sahī kuchh mujhī ko rahm aatā asar mire nafas-e-be-asar meñ ḳhaak nahīñ 
ḳhayāl-e-jalva-e-gul se ḳharāb haiñ mai-kash sharāb-ḳhāne ke dīvār-o-dar meñ ḳhaak nahīñ 
huā huuñ ishq kī ġhārat-garī se sharminda sivā.e hasrat-e-tāmīr ghar meñ ḳhaak nahīñ 
hamāre sher haiñ ab sirf dil-lagī ke 'asad' khulā ki fā.eda arz-e-hunar meñ ḳhaak nahīñ 
maze jahan ke apni nazar mein KHak nahin siwae KHun-e-jigar so jigar mein KHak nahin 
magar ghubar hue par hawa uDa le jae wagarna tab o tawan baal-o-par mein KHak nahin 
ye kis bahisht-shamail ki aamad aamad hai ki ghair-e-jalwa-e-gul rahguzar mein KHak nahin 
bhala use na sahi kuchh mujhi ko rahm aata asar mere nafas-e-be-asar mein KHak nahin 
KHayal-e-jalwa-e-gul se KHarab hain mai-kash sharab-KHane ke diwar-o-dar mein KHak nahin 
hua hun ishq ki ghaarat-gari se sharminda siwae hasrat-e-tamir ghar mein KHak nahin 
hamare sher hain ab sirf dil-lagi ke 'asad' khula ki faeda arz-e-hunar mein KHak nahin

dekh kar joban tirā kis kis ko hairānī huī is javānī par javānī aap dīvānī huī 
parde parde meñ mohabbat dushman-e-jānī huī ye ḳhudā kī maar kyā ai shauq-e-pinhānī huī 
dil kā saudā kar ke un se kyā pashemānī huī qadr us kī phir kahāñ jis shai kī arzānī huī 
mere ghar us shoḳh kī do din se mehmānī huī bekasī kī aaj kal kyā ḳhāna-vīrānī huī 
tark-e-rasm-o-rāh par afsos hai donoñ taraf ham se nādānī huī yā tum se nādānī huī 
ibtidā se intihā tak haal un se kah to duuñ fikr ye hai aur jo kah kar pashemānī huī 
ġham qayāmat kā nahīñ vā'iz mujhe ye fikr hai diin kab baaqī rahā duniyā agar faanī huī 
tum na shab ko aaoge ye hai yaqīñ aayā huā tum na mānoge mirī ye baat hai maanī huī 
mujh meñ dam jab tak rahā mushkil meñ the tīmārdār merī āsānī se sab yāroñ kī āsānī huī 
is ko kyā kahte haiñ utnā hī baḌhā shauq-e-visāl jis qadar mash.hūr un kī pāk-dāmānī huī 
bazm se uThne kī ġhairat baiThne se dil ko rashk dekh kar ġhairoñ kā majma.a kyā pareshānī huī 
dāva-e-tasḳhīr par ye us parī-vash ne kahā aap kā dil kyā huā mohr-e-sulemānī huī 
khul ga.iiñ zulfeñ magar us shoḳh mast-e-nāz kī jhūmtī bād-e-sabā phirtī hai mastānī huī 
maiñ sarāpā sajde kartā us ke dar par shauq se sar se pā tak kyuuñ na peshānī hī peshānī huī 
dil kī qalb-e-māhiyat kā ho use kyūñkar yaqīñ kab havā miTTī huī hai aag kab paanī huī 
aate hī kahte ho ab ghar jā.eñge achchhī kahī ye masal puurī yahāñ man-mānī ghar jaanī huī 
arsa-e-mahshar meñ tujh ko DhūñD lā.ūñ to sahī koī chhup saktī hai jo sūrat ho pahchānī huī 
dekh kar qātil kā ḳhālī haath bhī jī Dar gayā us kī chīn-e-āstīñ bhī chīn-e-peshānī huī 
khā ke dhokā us but-e-kamsin ne dāman meñ liye ashk-afshānī bhī merī gauhar-afshānī huī 
bekasī par merī apnī teġh kī hasrat to dekh chashm-e-jauhar bhī ba-shakl-e-chashm-e-hairānī huī 
bekasī par 'dāġh' kī afsos aatā hai hameñ kis jagah kis vaqt us kī ḳhāna-vīrānī huī 
dekh kar joban tera kis kis ko hairani hui is jawani par jawani aap diwani hui 
parde parde mein mohabbat dushman-e-jaani hui ye KHuda ki mar kya ai shauq-e-pinhani hui 
dil ka sauda kar ke un se kya pashemani hui qadr us ki phir kahan jis shai ki arzani hui 
mere ghar us shoKH ki do din se mehmani hui bekasi ki aaj kal kya KHana-virani hui 
tark-e-rasm-o-rah par afsos hai donon taraf hum se nadani hui ya tum se nadani hui 
ibtida se intiha tak haal un se kah to dun fikr ye hai aur jo kah kar pashemani hui 
gham qayamat ka nahin wa'iz mujhe ye fikr hai din kab baqi raha duniya agar fani hui 
tum na shab ko aaoge ye hai yaqin aaya hua tum na manoge meri ye baat hai mani hui 
mujh mein dam jab tak raha mushkil mein the timardar meri aasani se sab yaron ki aasani hui 
is ko kya kahte hain utna hi baDha shauq-e-visal jis qadar mashhur un ki pak-damani hui 
bazm se uThne ki ghairat baiThne se dil ko rashk dekh kar ghairon ka majma kya pareshani hui 
dawa-e-tasKHir par ye us pari-wash ne kaha aap ka dil kya hua mohr-e-sulemani hui 
khul gain zulfen magar us shoKH mast-e-naz ki jhumti baad-e-saba phirti hai mastani hui 
main sarapa sajde karta us ke dar par shauq se sar se pa tak kyun na peshani hi peshani hui 
dil ki qalb-e-mahiyat ka ho use kyunkar yaqin kab hawa miTTi hui hai aag kab pani hui 
aate hi kahte ho ab ghar jaenge achchhi kahi ye masal puri yahan man-mani ghar jaani hui 
arsa-e-mahshar mein tujh ko DhunD laun to sahi koi chhup sakti hai jo surat ho pahchani hui 
dekh kar qatil ka KHali hath bhi ji Dar gaya us ki chin-e-astin bhi chin-e-peshani hui 
kha ke dhoka us but-e-kamsin ne daman mein liye ashk-afshani bhi meri gauhar-afshani hui 
bekasi par meri apni tegh ki hasrat to dekh chashm-e-jauhar bhi ba-shakl-e-chashm-e-hairani hui 
bekasi par 'dagh' ki afsos aata hai hamein kis jagah kis waqt us ki KHana-virani hui

pahlā sā vo zor nahīñ hai mere dukh kī sadāoñ meñ shāyad paanī nahīñ rahā hai ab pyāse dariyāoñ meñ 
jis bādal kī aas meñ joḌe khol liye haiñ suhāgan ne vo parbat se Takrā kar baras chukā sahrāoñ meñ 
jaane kab taḌpe aur chamke suunī raat ko phir Das jaa.e mujh ko ek rupahlī nāgin baiThī milī hai ghaTāoñ meñ 
patta to āḳhir patta thā gunjān ghane daraḳhtoñ ne zamīñ ko tanhā chhoḌ diyā hai itnī tez havāoñ meñ 
din bhar dhuup kī tarah se ham chhā.e rahte haiñ duniyā par raat huī to simaT ke aa jaate haiñ dil kī guphāoñ meñ 
khaḌe hue jo sāhil par to dil meñ palkeñ bhiig ga.iiñ shāyad aañsū chhupe hue hoñ sub.h kī narm havāoñ meñ 
ġhazal ke mandir meñ dīvāna mūrat rakh kar chalā gayā kaun use pahle pūjegā bahas chalī devtāoñ meñ 
pahla sa wo zor nahin hai mere dukh ki sadaon mein shayad pani nahin raha hai ab pyase dariyaon mein 
jis baadal ki aas mein joDe khol liye hain suhagan ne wo parbat se Takra kar baras chuka sahraon mein 
jaane kab taDpe aur chamke suni raat ko phir Das jae mujh ko ek rupahli nagin baiThi mili hai ghaTaon mein 
patta to aaKHir patta tha gunjaan ghane daraKHton ne zamin ko tanha chhoD diya hai itni tez hawaon mein 
din bhar dhup ki tarah se hum chhae rahte hain duniya par raat hui to simaT ke aa jate hain dil ki guphaon mein 
khaDe hue jo sahil par to dil mein palken bhig gain shayad aansu chhupe hue hon subh ki narm hawaon mein 
ghazal ke mandir mein diwana murat rakh kar chala gaya kaun use pahle pujega bahas chali dewtaon mein

diloñ kī or dhuāñ sā dikhā.ī detā hai ye shahr to mujhe jaltā dikhā.ī detā hai 
jahāñ ki daaġh hai yaañ aage dard rahtā thā magar ye daaġh bhī jaatā dikhā.ī detā hai 
pukārtī haiñ bhare shahr kī guzargāheñ vo roz shaam ko tanhā dikhā.ī detā hai 
ye log TuuTī huī kashtiyoñ meñ sote haiñ mire makān se dariyā dikhā.ī detā hai 
ḳhizāñ ke zard dinoñ kī siyāh rātoñ meñ kisī kā phuul sā chehra dikhā.ī detā hai 
kahīñ mile vo sar-e-rāh to lipaT jaa.eñ bas ab to ek hī rasta dikhā.ī detā hai 
dilon ki or dhuan sa dikhai deta hai ye shahr to mujhe jalta dikhai deta hai 
jahan ki dagh hai yan aage dard rahta tha magar ye dagh bhi jata dikhai deta hai 
pukarti hain bhare shahr ki guzargahen wo roz sham ko tanha dikhai deta hai 
ye log TuTi hui kashtiyon mein sote hain mere makan se dariya dikhai deta hai 
KHizan ke zard dinon ki siyah raaton mein kisi ka phul sa chehra dikhai deta hai 
kahin mile wo sar-e-rah to lipaT jaen bas ab to ek hi rasta dikhai deta hai

har haal meñ rahā jo tirā aasrā mujhe māyūs kar sakā na hujūm-e-balā mujhe 
har naġhme ne unhīñ kī talab kā diyā payām har saaz ne unhīñ kī sunā.ī sadā mujhe 
har baat meñ unhīñ kī ḳhushī kā rahā ḳhayāl har kaam se ġharaz hai unhīñ kī razā mujhe 
rahtā huuñ ġharq un ke tasavvur meñ roz o shab mastī kā paḌ gayā hai kuchh aisā mazā mujhe 
rakhiye na mujh pe tark-e-mohabbat kī tohmateñ jis kā ḳhayāl tak bhī nahīñ hai ravā mujhe 
kaafī hai un ke pā-e-hinā-basta kā ḳhayāl haath aa.ī ḳhuub soz-e-jigar kī davā mujhe 
kyā kahte ho ki aur lagā lo kisī se dil tum sā nazar bhī aa.e koī dūsrā mujhe 
begāna-e-adab kiye detī hai kyā karūñ us mahv-e-nāz kī nigah-e-āshnā mujhe 
us be-nishāñ ke milne kī 'hasrat' huī umiid āb-e-baqā se baḌh ke hai zahr-e-fanā mujhe 
har haal mein raha jo tera aasra mujhe mayus kar saka na hujum-e-bala mujhe 
har naghme ne unhin ki talab ka diya payam har saz ne unhin ki sunai sada mujhe 
har baat mein unhin ki KHushi ka raha KHayal har kaam se gharaz hai unhin ki raza mujhe 
rahta hun gharq un ke tasawwur mein roz o shab masti ka paD gaya hai kuchh aisa maza mujhe 
rakhiye na mujh pe tark-e-mohabbat ki tohmaten jis ka KHayal tak bhi nahin hai rawa mujhe 
kafi hai un ke pa-e-hina-basta ka KHayal hath aai KHub soz-e-jigar ki dawa mujhe 
kya kahte ho ki aur laga lo kisi se dil tum sa nazar bhi aae koi dusra mujhe 
begana-e-adab kiye deti hai kya karun us mahw-e-naz ki nigah-e-ashna mujhe 
us be-nishan ke milne ki 'hasrat' hui umid aab-e-baqa se baDh ke hai zahr-e-fana mujhe

lubhātā hai agarche husn-e-dariyā Dar rahā huuñ maiñ sabab ye hai ki ik muddat kināre par rahā huuñ maiñ 
ye jhoñke jin se dil meñ tāzgī āñkhoñ meñ ThanDak hai inhī jhoñkoñ se murjhāyā huā shab bhar rahā huuñ maiñ 
tire aane kā din hai tere raste meñ bichhāne ko chamaktī dhuup meñ saa.e ikaTThe kar rahā huuñ maiñ 
koī kamra hai jis ke taaq meñ ik sham.a jaltī hai añdherī raat hai aur saañs lete Dar rahā huuñ maiñ 
mujhe ma.alūm hai ahl-e-vafā par kyā guzartī hai samajh kar soch kar tujh se mohabbat kar rahā huuñ maiñ 
lubhata hai agarche husn-e-dariya Dar raha hun main sabab ye hai ki ek muddat kinare par raha hun main 
ye jhonke jin se dil mein tazgi aankhon mein ThanDak hai inhi jhonkon se murjhaya hua shab bhar raha hun main 
tere aane ka din hai tere raste mein bichhane ko chamakti dhup mein sae ikaTThe kar raha hun main 
koi kamra hai jis ke taq mein ek shama jalti hai andheri raat hai aur sans lete Dar raha hun main 
mujhe malum hai ahl-e-wafa par kya guzarti hai samajh kar soch kar tujh se mohabbat kar raha hun main

judā hue vo log ki jin ko saath meñ aanā thā ik aisā moḌ bhī hamārī raat meñ aanā thā 
tujh se bichhaḌ jaane kā ġham kuchh ḳhaas nahīñ ham ko ek na ik din khoT hamārī zaat meñ aanā thā 
āñkhoñ ko ye kahte sunte rahte haiñ har dam sūkhe ko aanā thā aur barsāt meñ aanā thā 
ik lambī sunsān saḌak par tanhā phirte haiñ vo aahaT thī ham ko na us kī baat meñ aanā thā 
ai yaado tum aise kyuuñ is vaqt kahāñ aa.iiñ kisī munāsib vaqt na.e hālāt meñ aanā thā 
juda hue wo log ki jin ko sath mein aana tha ek aisa moD bhi hamari raat mein aana tha 
tujh se bichhaD jaane ka gham kuchh KHas nahin hum ko ek na ek din khoT hamari zat mein aana tha 
aankhon ko ye kahte sunte rahte hain har dam sukhe ko aana tha aur barsat mein aana tha 
ek lambi sunsan saDak par tanha phirte hain wo aahaT thi hum ko na us ki baat mein aana tha 
ai yaado tum aise kyun is waqt kahan aain kisi munasib waqt nae haalat mein aana tha

ye jab hai ki ik ḳhvāb se rishta hai hamārā din Dhalte hī dil Dūbne lagtā hai hamārā 
chehroñ ke samundar se guzarte rahe phir bhī ik aks ko ā.īna tarastā hai hamārā 
un logoñ se kyā kahiye ki kyā biit rahī hai ahvāl magar tū to samajhtā hai hamārā 
har moḌ pe paḌtā hai hameñ vāsta is se duniyā se alag kahne ko rasta hai hamārā 
ye jab hai ki ek KHwab se rishta hai hamara din Dhalte hi dil Dubne lagta hai hamara 
chehron ke samundar se guzarte rahe phir bhi ek aks ko aaina tarasta hai hamara 
un logon se kya kahiye ki kya bit rahi hai ahwal magar tu to samajhta hai hamara 
har moD pe paDta hai hamein wasta is se duniya se alag kahne ko rasta hai hamara

dil markaz-e-hijāb banāyā na jā.egā un se bhī rāz-e-ishq chhupāyā na jā.egā 
sar ko kabhī qadam pe jhukāyā na jā.egā un ke nuqūsh-e-pā ko miTāyā na jā.egā 
be-vaj.h intizār dikhāne se fā.eda kah dījiye ki sāmne aayā na jā.egā 
āñkhoñ meñ ashk qalb pareshāñ nazar udaas is tarah un ko chhoḌ ke jaayā na jā.egā 
vo ḳhud kaheñ to sharh-e-mohabbat bayāñ karūñ naġhma baġhair saaz sunāyā na jā.egā 
behtar yahī hai zikr-e-mohabbat na chheḌiye naqsha bigaḌ gayā to banāyā na jā.egā 
dil kī taraf 'shakīl' tavajjoh zarūr ho ye ghar ujaḌ gayā to basāyā na jā.egā 
dil markaz-e-hijab banaya na jaega un se bhi raaz-e-ishq chhupaya na jaega 
sar ko kabhi qadam pe jhukaya na jaega un ke nuqush-e-pa ko miTaya na jaega 
be-wajh intizar dikhane se faeda kah dijiye ki samne aaya na jaega 
aankhon mein ashk qalb pareshan nazar udas is tarah un ko chhoD ke jaya na jaega 
wo KHud kahen to sharh-e-mohabbat bayan karun naghma baghair saz sunaya na jaega 
behtar yahi hai zikr-e-mohabbat na chheDiye naqsha bigaD gaya to banaya na jaega 
dil ki taraf 'shakil' tawajjoh zarur ho ye ghar ujaD gaya to basaya na jaega

ḳhū samajh meñ nahīñ aatī tire dīvānoñ kī dāmanoñ kī na ḳhabar hai na girebānoñ kī 
jalva-e-sāġhar-o-mīnā hai jo ham-rañg-e-bahār raunaqeñ turfa taraqqī pe haiñ mai-ḳhānoñ kī 
har taraf be-ḳhudī o be-ḳhabarī kī hai numūd qābil-e-dīd hai duniyā tire hairānoñ kī 
sahl is se to yahī hai ki sambhāleñ dil ko minnateñ kaun kare aap ke darbānoñ kī 
aañkh vaale tirī sūrat pe miTe jaate haiñ sham-e-mahfil kī taraf bhiiḌ hai parvānoñ kī 
ai jafākār tire ahd se pahle to na thī kasrat is darja mohabbat ke pashīmānoñ kī 
rāz-e-ġham se hameñ āgāh kiyā ḳhuub kiyā kuchh nihāyat hī nahīñ aap ke ehsānoñ kī 
dushman-e-ahl-e-muravvat hai vo begāna-e-uns shakl pariyoñ kī hai ḳhū bhī nahīñ insānoñ kī 
hamrah-e-ġhair mubārak unheñ gul-gasht-e-chaman sair ham ko bhī mayassar hai bayābānoñ kī 
ik bakheḌā hai nazar meñ sar-o-sāmān-e-vajūd ab ye hālat hai tire soḳhta-sāmānoñ kī 
faiz-e-sāqī kī ajab dhuum hai mai-ḳhānoñ meñ har taraf mai kī talab maañg hai paimānoñ kī 
āshiqoñ hī kā jigar hai ki haiñ ḳhursañd-e-jafā kāfiroñ kī hai ye himmat na musalmānoñ kī 
yaad phir taaza huī haal se tere 'hasrat' qais o farhād ke guzre hue afsānoñ kī 
KHu samajh mein nahin aati tere diwanon ki damanon ki na KHabar hai na girebanon ki 
jalwa-e-saghar-o-mina hai jo ham-rang-e-bahaar raunaqen turfa taraqqi pe hain mai-KHanon ki 
har taraf be-KHudi o be-KHabari ki hai numud qabil-e-did hai duniya tere hairanon ki 
sahl is se to yahi hai ki sambhaalen dil ko minnaten kaun kare aap ke darbanon ki 
aankh wale teri surat pe miTe jate hain sham-e-mahfil ki taraf bhiD hai parwanon ki 
ai jafakar tere ahd se pahle to na thi kasrat is darja mohabbat ke pashimanon ki 
raaz-e-gham se hamein aagah kiya KHub kiya kuchh nihayat hi nahin aap ke ehsanon ki 
dushman-e-ahl-e-murawwat hai wo begana-e-uns shakl pariyon ki hai KHu bhi nahin insanon ki 
hamrah-e-ghair mubarak unhen gul-gasht-e-chaman sair hum ko bhi mayassar hai bayabanon ki 
ek bakheDa hai nazar mein sar-o-saman-e-wajud ab ye haalat hai tere soKHta-samanon ki 
faiz-e-saqi ki ajab dhum hai mai-KHanon mein har taraf mai ki talab mang hai paimanon ki 
aashiqon hi ka jigar hai ki hain KHursand-e-jafa kafiron ki hai ye himmat na musalmanon ki 
yaad phir taza hui haal se tere 'hasrat' qais o farhad ke guzre hue afsanon ki

ab tak shikāyateñ haiñ dil-e-bad-nasīb se ik din kisī ko dekh liyā thā qarīb se 
aksar ba-zom-e-tark-e-mohabbat ḳhudā gavāh guzrā chalā gayā huuñ dayār-e-habīb se 
dast-e-ḳhizāñ ne baḌh ke vahīñ us ko chun liyā jo phuul gir gayā nigah-e-andalīb se 
ahl-e-sukūñ se khel na ai mauj-e-imbisāt ik din ulajh ke dekh kisī ġham-nasīb se 
nā ahl-e-nāz ko bhī mile fursat-e-niyāz maiñ duur haT gayā jo vo guzre qarīb se 
ye kis ḳhatā pe ruuTh ga.ī chashm-e-iltifāt ye kab kā intiqām liyā mujh ġharīb se 
un ke baġhair bhī hai vahī zindagī kā daur hālāt-e-zindagī haiñ magar kuchh ajiib se 
samjhe hue the husn-e-azal jis ko ham 'shakīl' apnā hī aks-e-ruḳh nazar aayā qarīb se 
ab tak shikayaten hain dil-e-bad-nasib se ek din kisi ko dekh liya tha qarib se 
aksar ba-zom-e-tark-e-mohabbat KHuda gawah guzra chala gaya hun dayar-e-habib se 
dast-e-KHizan ne baDh ke wahin us ko chun liya jo phul gir gaya nigah-e-andalib se 
ahl-e-sukun se khel na ai mauj-e-imbisat ek din ulajh ke dekh kisi gham-nasib se 
na ahl-e-naz ko bhi mile fursat-e-niyaz main dur haT gaya jo wo guzre qarib se 
ye kis KHata pe ruTh gai chashm-e-iltifat ye kab ka intiqam liya mujh gharib se 
un ke baghair bhi hai wahi zindagi ka daur haalat-e-zindagi hain magar kuchh ajib se 
samjhe hue the husn-e-azal jis ko hum 'shakil' apna hi aks-e-ruKH nazar aaya qarib se

aise hijr ke mausam kab kab aate haiñ tere alāva yaad hameñ sab aate haiñ 
jāgtī āñkhoñ se bhī dekho duniyā ko ḳhvāboñ kā kyā hai vo har shab aate haiñ 
jazb kare kyuuñ ret hamārī ashkoñ ko terā dāman tar karne ab aate haiñ 
ab vo safar kī taab nahīñ baaqī varna ham ko bulāve dasht se jab tab aate haiñ 
kāġhaz kī kashtī meñ dariyā paar kiyā dekho ham ko kyā kyā kartab aate haiñ 
aise hijr ke mausam kab kab aate hain tere alawa yaad hamein sab aate hain 
jagti aankhon se bhi dekho duniya ko KHwabon ka kya hai wo har shab aate hain 
jazb kare kyun ret hamari ashkon ko tera daman tar karne ab aate hain 
ab wo safar ki tab nahin baqi warna hum ko bulawe dasht se jab tab aate hain 
kaghaz ki kashti mein dariya par kiya dekho hum ko kya kya kartab aate hain

bahār aa.ī kisī kā sāmnā karne kā vaqt aayā sambhal ai dil ki iz.hār-e-vafā karne kā vaqt aayā 
unheñ āmāda-e-mehr-o-vafā karne kā vaqt aayā baḌī muddat meñ arz-e-mudda.ā karne kā vaqt aayā 
ravāñ haiñ apne markaz kī taraf āsūda ummīdeñ hujūm-e-yās ko dil se judā karne kā vaqt aayā 
phir ik gum-karda-rāh-e-zindagī ko mil ga.ī manzil sujūd-e-shukr-e-be-pāyāñ adā karne kā vaqt aayā 
kabhī duurī thī lekin ab ḳhayāl-e-ḳhauf-e-dūrī hai fuġhāñ kī sā.ateñ guzrīñ duā karne kā vaqt aayā 
kahāñ tak ḳhatm rahtā darmiyāñ par dil kā afsāna bil-āḳhir darmiyāñ se ibtidā karne kā vaqt aayā 
har ik jurm-e-mohabbat us nigāh-e-lutf ke sadqe naved-e-āfiyat le kar ḳhatā karne kā vaqt aayā 
nigāh o dil se ab tafsīr-o-sharh-e-āzrū hogī zabān o lab se tark-e-iltijā karne kā vaqt aayā 
vo aate haiñ 'shakīl' ab apne dil se haath dho baiTho nigāh-e-nāz kī qīmat adā karne kā vaqt aayā 
bahaar aai kisi ka samna karne ka waqt aaya sambhal ai dil ki izhaar-e-wafa karne ka waqt aaya 
unhen aamada-e-mehr-o-wafa karne ka waqt aaya baDi muddat mein arz-e-muddaa karne ka waqt aaya 
rawan hain apne markaz ki taraf aasuda ummiden hujum-e-yas ko dil se juda karne ka waqt aaya 
phir ek gum-karda-rah-e-zindagi ko mil gai manzil sujud-e-shukr-e-be-payan ada karne ka waqt aaya 
kabhi duri thi lekin ab KHayal-e-KHauf-e-duri hai fughan ki saaten guzrin dua karne ka waqt aaya 
kahan tak KHatm rahta darmiyan par dil ka afsana bil-aKHir darmiyan se ibtida karne ka waqt aaya 
har ek jurm-e-mohabbat us nigah-e-lutf ke sadqe nawed-e-afiyat le kar KHata karne ka waqt aaya 
nigah o dil se ab tafsir-o-sharh-e-azru hogi zaban o lab se tark-e-iltija karne ka waqt aaya 
wo aate hain 'shakil' ab apne dil se hath dho baiTho nigah-e-naz ki qimat ada karne ka waqt aaya

na sahī gar unheñ ḳhayāl nahīñ ki hamārā bhī ab vo haal nahīñ 
yaad unheñ vāda-e-visāl nahīñ kab kiyā thā yahī ḳhayāl nahīñ 
aise bigḌe vo sun ke shauq kī baat aaj tak ham se bol-chāl nahīñ 
mujh ko ab ġham ye hai ki baad mire ḳhātir-e-yār be-malāl nahīñ 
afv-e-haq kā hai mai-kashoñ pe nuzūl rezish-e-abr-e-barshagāl nahīñ 
ham pe kyuuñ arz-e-hāl-e-dil pe itaab elchī ko kahīñ zavāl nahīñ 
sun ke mujh se vo ḳhvāhish-e-pā-bos hañs ke kahne lage majāl nahīñ 
dil ko hai yaad shauq kā vo hunar jis se baḌh kar koī kamāl nahīñ 
aap nādim na hoñ ki 'hasrat' se shikva-e-ġham kā ehtimāl nahīñ 
na sahi gar unhen KHayal nahin ki hamara bhi ab wo haal nahin 
yaad unhen wada-e-visal nahin kab kiya tha yahi KHayal nahin 
aise bigDe wo sun ke shauq ki baat aaj tak hum se bol-chaal nahin 
mujh ko ab gham ye hai ki baad mere KHatir-e-yar be-malal nahin 
afw-e-haq ka hai mai-kashon pe nuzul rezish-e-abr-e-barshagal nahin 
hum pe kyun arz-e-haal-e-dil pe itab elchi ko kahin zawal nahin 
sun ke mujh se wo KHwahish-e-pa-bos hans ke kahne lage majal nahin 
dil ko hai yaad shauq ka wo hunar jis se baDh kar koi kamal nahin 
aap nadim na hon ki 'hasrat' se shikwa-e-gham ka ehtimal nahin

maiñ aur bazm-e-mai se yuuñ tishna-kām aa.uuñ gar maiñ ne kī thī tauba saaqī ko kyā huā thā 
hai ek tiir jis meñ donoñ chhide paḌe haiñ vo din ga.e ki apnā dil se jigar judā thā 
darmāñdagī meñ 'ġhālib' kuchh ban paḌe to jānūñ jab rishta be-girah thā nāḳhun girah-kushā thā 
main aur bazm-e-mai se yun tishna-kaam aaun gar main ne ki thi tauba saqi ko kya hua tha 
hai ek tir jis mein donon chhide paDe hain wo din gae ki apna dil se jigar juda tha 
darmandagi mein 'ghaalib' kuchh ban paDe to jaanun jab rishta be-girah tha naKHun girah-kusha tha

numāyāñ donoñ jānib shān-e-fitrat hotī jaatī hai unheñ mujh se mujhe un se mohabbat hotī jaatī hai 
mirī shām-e-alam sub.h-e-masarrat hotī jaatī hai ki har lahza tire milne kī sūrat hotī jaatī hai 
nigāheñ muztarib utrā huā chehra zabāñ sākit jo thī apnī vahī ab un kī hālat hotī jaatī hai 
na kyuuñ hoñ is adā par ishq kī ḳhuddāriyāñ sadqe unheñ rūdād-e-ġham sun sun ke hairat hotī jaatī hai 
kahīñ rāz-e-mohabbat āsmāñ par bhī na khul jaa.e mujhe āh-o-fuġhāñ karne kī aadat hotī jaatī hai 
mohabbat hī meñ milte haiñ shikāyat ke maze paiham mohabbat jitnī baḌhtī hai shikāyat hotī jaatī hai 
'shakīl' un kī judā.ī meñ hai lutf-e-zindagī zaa.il nazar be-kaif afsurda tabī.at hotī jaatī hai 
numayan donon jaanib shan-e-fitrat hoti jati hai unhen mujh se mujhe un se mohabbat hoti jati hai 
meri sham-e-alam subh-e-masarrat hoti jati hai ki har lahza tere milne ki surat hoti jati hai 
nigahen muztarib utra hua chehra zaban sakit jo thi apni wahi ab un ki haalat hoti jati hai 
na kyun hon is ada par ishq ki KHuddariyan sadqe unhen rudad-e-gham sun sun ke hairat hoti jati hai 
kahin raaz-e-mohabbat aasman par bhi na khul jae mujhe aah-o-fughan karne ki aadat hoti jati hai 
mohabbat hi mein milte hain shikayat ke maze paiham mohabbat jitni baDhti hai shikayat hoti jati hai 
'shakil' un ki judai mein hai lutf-e-zindagi zail nazar be-kaif afsurda tabiat hoti jati hai

haa.il thī biich meñ jo razā.ī tamām shab is ġham se ham ko niiñd na aa.ī tamām shab 
kī yaas se havas ne laḌā.ī tamām shab tum ne to ḳhuub raah dikhā.ī tamām shab 
phir bhī to ḳhatm ho na sakī aarzū kī baat har chand ham ne un ko sunā.ī tamām shab 
bebāk milte hī jo hue ham to sharm se aañkh us parī ne phir na milā.ī tamām shab 
dil ḳhuub jāntā hai ki tum kis ḳhayāl se karte rahe adū kī burā.ī tamām shab 
phir shaam hī se kyuuñ vo chale the chhuḌā ke haath dukhtī rahī jo un kī kalā.ī tamām shab 
'hasrat' se kuchh vo aate hī aise hue ḳhafā phir ho sakī na un se safā.ī tamām shab 
hail thi bich mein jo razai tamam shab is gham se hum ko nind na aai tamam shab 
ki yas se hawas ne laDai tamam shab tum ne to KHub rah dikhai tamam shab 
phir bhi to KHatm ho na saki aarzu ki baat har chand hum ne un ko sunai tamam shab 
bebak milte hi jo hue hum to sharm se aankh us pari ne phir na milai tamam shab 
dil KHub jaanta hai ki tum kis KHayal se karte rahe adu ki burai tamam shab 
phir sham hi se kyun wo chale the chhuDa ke hath dukhti rahi jo un ki kalai tamam shab 
'hasrat' se kuchh wo aate hi aise hue KHafa phir ho saki na un se safai tamam shab

bekalī se mujhe rāhat hogī chheḌ deñ aap ināyat hogī 
vasl meñ un ke qadam chūmeñge vo bhī gar un kī ijāzat hogī 
be-qarārī ke maze lūTeñge aaj phir dard kī shiddat hogī 
ek din khol ke jī ro leñge zabt-e-ġham kī jo ijāzat hogī 
qissa-e-ġham na kahūñgā 'hasrat' jaur kī un ke shikāyat hogī 
bekali se mujhe rahat hogi chheD den aap inayat hogi 
wasl mein un ke qadam chumenge wo bhi gar un ki ijazat hogi 
be-qarari ke maze luTenge aaj phir dard ki shiddat hogi 
ek din khol ke ji ro lenge zabt-e-gham ki jo ijazat hogi 
qissa-e-gham na kahunga 'hasrat' jaur ki un ke shikayat hogi

lutf kī un se iltijā na kareñ ham ne aisā kabhī kiyā na kareñ 
mil rahegā jo un se milnā hai lab ko sharminda-e-duā na kareñ 
sabr mushkil hai aarzū bekār kyā kareñ āshiqī meñ kyā na kareñ 
maslak-e-ishq meñ hai fikr harām dil ko tadbīr-āshnā na kareñ 
bhuul hī jaa.eñ ham ko ye to na ho log mere liye duā na kareñ 
marzi-e-yār ke ḳhilāf na ho kaun kahtā hai vo jafā na kareñ 
shauq un kā so miT chukā 'hasrat' kyā kareñ ham agar vafā na kareñ 
lutf ki un se iltija na karen hum ne aisa kabhi kiya na karen 
mil rahega jo un se milna hai lab ko sharminda-e-dua na karen 
sabr mushkil hai aarzu bekar kya karen aashiqi mein kya na karen 
maslak-e-ishq mein hai fikr haram dil ko tadbir-ashna na karen 
bhul hi jaen hum ko ye to na ho log mere liye dua na karen 
marzi-e-yar ke KHilaf na ho kaun kahta hai wo jafa na karen 
shauq un ka so miT chuka 'hasrat' kya karen hum agar wafa na karen

tāsīr-e-barq-e-husn jo un ke suḳhan meñ thī ik larzish-e-ḳhafī mire saare badan meñ thī 
vaañ se nikal ke phir na farāġhat huī nasīb āsūdgī kī jaan tirī anjuman meñ thī 
ik rañg-e-iltifāt bhī us be-ruḳhī meñ thā ik sādgī bhī us nigah-e-sahar fan meñ thī 
mohtāj-e-bū-e-itr na thā jism-e-ḳhūb-e-yār ḳhushbu-e-dilbarī thī jo us pairahan meñ thī 
kuchh dil hī bujh gayā hai mirā varna aaj kal kaifiyat-e-bahār kī shiddat chaman meñ thī 
mālūm ho ga.ī mire dil ko rāh-e-shauq vo baat pyaar kī jo hunūz us dahan meñ thī 
ġhurbat kī sub.h meñ bhī nahīñ hai vo raushnī jo raushnī ki shām-e-savād-e-vatan meñ thī 
aish gudāz-e-dil bhī ġham-e-āshiqī meñ thā ik rāhat-e-latīf bhī zimn-e-mehan meñ thī 
achchhā huā ki ḳhātir-e-'hasrat' se haT ga.ī haibat sī ik jo ḳhatra-e-dār-o-rasan meñ thī 
tasir-e-barq-e-husn jo un ke suKHan mein thi ek larzish-e-KHafi mere sare badan mein thi 
wan se nikal ke phir na faraghat hui nasib aasudgi ki jaan teri anjuman mein thi 
ek rang-e-iltifat bhi us be-ruKHi mein tha ek sadgi bhi us nigah-e-sahar fan mein thi 
mohtaj-e-bu-e-itr na tha jism-e-KHub-e-yar KHushbu-e-dilbari thi jo us pairahan mein thi 
kuchh dil hi bujh gaya hai mera warna aaj kal kaifiyat-e-bahaar ki shiddat chaman mein thi 
malum ho gai mere dil ko rah-e-shauq wo baat pyar ki jo hunuz us dahan mein thi 
ghurbat ki subh mein bhi nahin hai wo raushni jo raushni ki sham-e-sawad-e-watan mein thi 
aish gudaz-e-dil bhi gham-e-ashiqi mein tha ek rahat-e-latif bhi zimn-e-mehan mein thi 
achchha hua ki KHatir-e-'hasrat' se haT gai haibat si ek jo KHatra-e-dar-o-rasan mein thi

shāyad āġhāz huā phir kisī afsāne kā hukm aadam ko hai jannat se nikal jaane kā 
un se kuchh kah to rahā huuñ magar allāh kare vo bhī mafhūm na samjheñ mire afsāne kā 
dekhnā dekhnā ye hazrat-e-vā.iz hī na hoñ rāsta pūchh rahā hai koī mai-ḳhāne kā 
be-ta.alluq tire aage se guzar jaatā hai ye bhī ik husn-e-talab hai tire dīvāne kā 
hashr tak garmi-e-hañgāma-e-hastī hai 'shakīl' silsila ḳhatm na hogā mire afsāne kā 
shayad aaghaz hua phir kisi afsane ka hukm aadam ko hai jannat se nikal jaane ka 
un se kuchh kah to raha hun magar allah kare wo bhi mafhum na samjhen mere afsane ka 
dekhna dekhna ye hazrat-e-waiz hi na hon rasta puchh raha hai koi mai-KHane ka 
be-talluq tere aage se guzar jata hai ye bhi ek husn-e-talab hai tere diwane ka 
hashr tak garmi-e-hangama-e-hasti hai 'shakil' silsila KHatm na hoga mere afsane ka

ḳhūb-rūyoñ se yāriyāñ na ga.iiñ dil kī be-iḳhtiyāriyāñ na ga.iiñ 
aql-e-sabr-āshnā se kuchh na huā shauq kī be-qarāriyāñ na ga.iiñ 
din kī sahrā-navardiyāñ na chhuTīñ shab kī aḳhtar-shumāriyāñ na ga.iiñ 
hosh yaañ sadd-e-rāh-e-ilm rahā aql kī harzā-kāriyāñ na ga.iiñ 
the jo ham-rañg-e-nāz un ke sitam dil kī ummīdvāriyāñ na ga.iiñ 
husn jab tak rahā nazāra-farosh sabr kī sharmsāriyāñ na ga.iiñ 
tarz-e-'momin' meñ marhabā 'hasrat' terī rangīñ-nigāriyāñ na ga.iiñ 
KHub-ruyon se yariyan na gain dil ki be-iKHtiyariyan na gain 
aql-e-sabr-ashna se kuchh na hua shauq ki be-qarariyan na gain 
din ki sahra-nawardiyan na chhuTin shab ki aKHtar-shumariyan na gain 
hosh yan sadd-e-rah-e-ilm raha aql ki harza-kariyan na gain 
the jo ham-rang-e-naz un ke sitam dil ki ummidwariyan na gain 
husn jab tak raha nazara-farosh sabr ki sharmsariyan na gain 
tarz-e-'momin' mein marhaba 'hasrat' teri rangin-nigariyan na gain

kahāñ kī guuñj dil-e-nā-tavāñ meñ rahtī hai ki thartharī sī ajab jism-o-jāñ meñ rahtī hai 
qadam qadam pe vahī chashm o lab vahī gesū tamām umr nazar imtihāñ meñ rahtī hai 
maza to ye hai ki vo ḳhud to hai na.e ghar meñ aur us kī yaad purāne makāñ meñ rahtī hai 
pata to fasl-e-gul-o-lāla kā nahīñ mālūm sunā hai qurb-o-javār-e-ḳhizāñ meñ rahtī hai 
maiñ kitnā vahm karūñ lekin ik shuā-e-yaqīñ kahīñ navāh-e-dil-e-bad-gumāñ meñ rahtī hai 
hazār jaan khapātā rahūñ magar phir bhī kamī sī kuchh mire tarz-e-bayāñ meñ rahtī hai 
kahan ki gunj dil-e-na-tawan mein rahti hai ki tharthari si ajab jism-o-jaan mein rahti hai 
qadam qadam pe wahi chashm o lab wahi gesu tamam umr nazar imtihan mein rahti hai 
maza to ye hai ki wo KHud to hai nae ghar mein aur us ki yaad purane makan mein rahti hai 
pata to fasl-e-gul-o-lala ka nahin malum suna hai qurb-o-jawar-e-KHizan mein rahti hai 
main kitna wahm karun lekin ek shua-e-yaqin kahin nawah-e-dil-e-bad-guman mein rahti hai 
hazar jaan khapata rahun magar phir bhi kami si kuchh mere tarz-e-bayan mein rahti hai

nazar se qaid-e-ta.ayyun uThā.ī jaatī hai tajallī-e-ruḳh-e-jānāñ dikhā.ī jaatī hai 
jab un ko hausla-e-dil pe e'tibār nahīñ to phir nazar se nazar kyuuñ milā.ī jaatī hai 
ḳhum-o-subū kī zarūrat ke ham nahīñ qaa.il sharāb mast nazar se pilā.ī jaatī hai 
sitam-navāzī-e-paiham hai ishq kī fitrat fuzūl husn pe tohmat lagā.ī jaatī hai 
bhulā diyā hai ġham-e-rozgār ne jis ko vo dāstāñ mujhe phir yaad aa.ī jaatī hai 
'shakīl' dūrī-e-manzil se nā-umīd na ho ab aa.ī jaatī hai manzil ab aa.ī jaatī hai 
nazar se qaid-e-tayyun uThai jati hai tajalli-e-ruKH-e-jaanan dikhai jati hai 
jab un ko hausla-e-dil pe e'tibar nahin to phir nazar se nazar kyun milai jati hai 
KHum-o-subu ki zarurat ke hum nahin qail sharab mast nazar se pilai jati hai 
sitam-nawazi-e-paiham hai ishq ki fitrat fuzul husn pe tohmat lagai jati hai 
bhula diya hai gham-e-rozgar ne jis ko wo dastan mujhe phir yaad aai jati hai 
'shakil' duri-e-manzil se na-umid na ho ab aai jati hai manzil ab aai jati hai

pahlū meñ dard-e-ishq kī duniyā liye hue baiThā huuñ zindagī kā sahārā liye hue 
dil hai tajallī-e-ruḳh-e-zebā liye hue āġhosh meñ hai chāñd ko dariyā liye hue 
pahuñche to dil meñ josh-e-tamannā liye hue lauTe magar luTī huī duniyā liye hue 
maiñ jī rahā huuñ ġham-kada-e-rozgār meñ terī mohabbatoñ kā sahārā liye hue 
uThtā huuñ bazm-e-husn se laġhzish-ba-pā 'shakīl' bahkī sī ik nazar kā sahārā liye hue 
pahlu mein dard-e-ishq ki duniya liye hue baiTha hun zindagi ka sahaara liye hue 
dil hai tajalli-e-ruKH-e-zeba liye hue aaghosh mein hai chand ko dariya liye hue 
pahunche to dil mein josh-e-tamanna liye hue lauTe magar luTi hui duniya liye hue 
main ji raha hun gham-kada-e-rozgar mein teri mohabbaton ka sahaara liye hue 
uThta hun bazm-e-husn se laghzish-ba-pa 'shakil' bahki si ek nazar ka sahaara liye hue

nashāt-e-ġham bhī milā ranj-e-shād-mānī bhī magar vo lamhe bahut muḳhtasar the faanī bhī 
khulī hai aañkh kahāñ kaun moḌ hai yaaro dayār-e-ḳhvāb kī baaqī nahīñ nishānī bhī 
ragoñ meñ ret kī ik aur tah jamī dekho ki pahle jaisī nahīñ ḳhuun meñ ravānī bhī 
bhaTak rahe haiñ ta'āqub meñ ab sarāboñ ke milā na jin ko samundar se buuñd paanī bhī

be-qarārī sī be-qarārī hai vasl hai aur firāq taarī hai 
jo guzārī na jā sakī ham se ham ne vo zindagī guzārī hai 
nighare kyā hue ki logoñ par apnā saaya bhī ab to bhārī hai 
bin tumhāre kabhī nahīñ aa.ī kyā mirī niiñd bhī tumhārī hai 
aap meñ kaise aa.uuñ maiñ tujh bin saañs jo chal rahī hai aarī hai 
us se kahiyo ki dil kī galiyoñ meñ raat din terī intizārī hai 
hijr ho yā visāl ho kuchh ho ham haiñ aur us kī yādgārī hai 
ik mahak samt-e-dil se aa.ī thī maiñ ye samjhā tirī savārī hai 
hādsoñ kā hisāb hai apnā varna har aan sab kī baarī hai 
ḳhush rahe tū ki zindagī apnī umr bhar kī umīd-vārī hai 
be-qarari si be-qarari hai wasl hai aur firaq tari hai 
jo guzari na ja saki hum se hum ne wo zindagi guzari hai 
nighare kya hue ki logon par apna saya bhi ab to bhaari hai 
bin tumhaare kabhi nahin aai kya meri nind bhi tumhaari hai 
aap mein kaise aaun main tujh bin sans jo chal rahi hai aari hai 
us se kahiyo ki dil ki galiyon mein raat din teri intizari hai 
hijr ho ya visal ho kuchh ho hum hain aur us ki yaadgari hai 
ek mahak samt-e-dil se aai thi main ye samjha teri sawari hai 
hadson ka hisab hai apna warna har aan sab ki bari hai 
KHush rahe tu ki zindagi apni umr bhar ki umid-wari hai

aah ko chāhiye ik umr asar hote tak kaun jiitā hai tirī zulf ke sar hote tak 
dām-e-har-mauj meñ hai halqa-e-sad-kām-e-nahañg dekheñ kyā guzre hai qatre pe guhar hote tak 
āshiqī sabr-talab aur tamannā betāb dil kā kyā rañg karūñ ḳhūn-e-jigar hote tak 
tā-qayāmat shab-e-furqat meñ guzar jā.egī umr saat din ham pe bhī bhārī haiñ sahar hote tak 
ham ne maanā ki taġhāful na karoge lekin ḳhaak ho jā.eñge ham tum ko ḳhabar hote tak 
partav-e-ḳhur se hai shabnam ko fanā kī ta.alīm maiñ bhī huuñ ek ināyat kī nazar hote tak 
yak nazar besh nahīñ fursat-e-hastī ġhāfil garmī-e-bazm hai ik raqs-e-sharar hote tak 
ġham-e-hastī kā 'asad' kis se ho juz marg ilaaj sham.a har rañg meñ jaltī hai sahar hote tak 
aah ko chahiye ek umr asar hote tak kaun jita hai teri zulf ke sar hote tak 
dam-e-har-mauj mein hai halqa-e-sad-kaam-e-nahang dekhen kya guzre hai qatre pe guhar hote tak 
aashiqi sabr-talab aur tamanna betab dil ka kya rang karun KHun-e-jigar hote tak 
ta-qayamat shab-e-furqat mein guzar jaegi umr sat din hum pe bhi bhaari hain sahar hote tak 
hum ne mana ki taghaful na karoge lekin KHak ho jaenge hum tum ko KHabar hote tak 
partaw-e-KHur se hai shabnam ko fana ki talim main bhi hun ek inayat ki nazar hote tak

nukta-chīñ hai ġham-e-dil us ko sunā.e na bane kyā bane baat jahāñ baat banā.e na bane 
maiñ bulātā to huuñ us ko magar ai jazba-e-dil us pe ban jaa.e kuchh aisī ki bin aa.e na bane 
khel samjhā hai kahīñ chhoḌ na de bhuul na jaa.e kaash yuuñ bhī ho ki bin mere satā.e na bane 
ġhair phirtā hai liye yuuñ tire ḳhat ko ki agar koī pūchhe ki ye kyā hai to chhupā.e na bane 
is nazākat kā burā ho vo bhale haiñ to kyā haath aaveñ to unheñ haath lagā.e na bane 
kah sake kaun ki ye jalvagarī kis kī hai parda chhoḌā hai vo us ne ki uThā.e na bane 
maut kī raah na dekhūñ ki bin aa.e na rahe tum ko chāhūñ ki na aao to bulā.e na bane 
bojh vo sar se girā hai ki uThā.e na uThe kaam vo aan paḌā hai ki banā.e na bane 
ishq par zor nahīñ hai ye vo ātish 'ġhālib' ki lagā.e na lage aur bujhā.e na bane 
nukta-chin hai gham-e-dil us ko sunae na bane kya bane baat jahan baat banae na bane

bojh wo sar se gira hai ki uThae na uThe kaam wo aan paDa hai ki banae na bane

nā-ravā kahiye nā-sazā kahiye kahiye kahiye mujhe burā kahiye 
tujh ko bad-ahd o bevafā kahiye aise jhūTe ko aur kyā kahiye 
dard dil kā na kahiye yā kahiye jab vo pūchhe mizāj kyā kahiye 
phir na rukiye jo mudda.ā kahiye ek ke ba.ad dūsrā kahiye 
aap ab merā muñh na khulvā.eñ ye na kahiye ki mudda.ā kahiye 
vo mujhe qatl kar ke kahte haiñ māntā hī na thā ye kyā kahiye

vo bhī sun leñge ye kabhī na kabhī hāl-e-dil sab se jā-ba-jā kahiye

intihā ishq kī ḳhudā jaane dam-e-āḳhir ko ibtidā kahiye

aisī kashtī kā Dūbnā achchhā ki jo dushman ko nāḳhudā kahiye 
sabr furqat meñ aa hī jaatā hai par use der-āshnā kahiye

sunā hai log use aañkh bhar ke dekhte haiñ so us ke shahr meñ kuchh din Thahar ke dekhte haiñ
