ye udas udas se baam o dar ye ujaD ujaD si rah-guzar chalo hum nahin na sahi magar sar-e-ku-e-yar koi to ho 
ye sukun-e-jaan ki ghaDi Dhale to charagh-e-dil hi na bujh chale wo bala se ho gham-e-ishq ya gham-e-rozgar koi to ho 
sar-e-maqtal-e-shab-e-arzu rahe kuchh to ishq ki aabru jo nahin adu to 'faraaz' tu ki nasib-e-dar koi to ho

ajab apnā haal hotā jo visāl-e-yār hotā kabhī jaan sadqe hotī kabhī dil nisār hotā 
koī fitna tā-qayāmat na phir āshkār hotā tire dil pe kaash zālim mujhe iḳhtiyār hotā 
jo tumhārī tarah tum se koī jhūTe va.ade kartā tumhīñ munsifī se kah do tumheñ e'tibār hotā 
ġham-e-ishq meñ mazā thā jo use samajh ke khāte ye vo zahr hai ki āḳhir mai-e-ḳhush-gavār hotā 
ye maza thā dil-lagī kā ki barābar aag lagtī na tujhe qarār hotā na mujhe qarār hotā 
na mazā hai dushmanī meñ na hai lutf dostī meñ koī ġhair ġhair hotā koī yaar yaar hotā 
tire va.ade par sitamgar abhī aur sabr karte agar apnī zindagī kā hameñ e'tibār hotā 
ye vo dard-e-dil nahīñ hai ki ho chārasāz koī agar ek baar miTtā to hazār baar hotā 
ga.e hosh tere zāhid jo vo chashm-e-mast dekhī mujhe kyā ulaT na dete jo na bāda-ḳhvār hotā 
mujhe mānte sab aisā ki adū bhī sajde karte dar-e-yār ka.aba bantā jo mirā mazār hotā 
tumheñ naaz ho na kyūñkar ki liyā hai 'dāġh' kā dil ye raqam na haath lagtī na ye iftiḳhār hotā 
ajab apna haal hota jo visal-e-yar hota kabhi jaan sadqe hoti kabhi dil nisar hota 
koi fitna ta-qayamat na phir aashkar hota tere dil pe kash zalim mujhe iKHtiyar hota 
jo tumhaari tarah tum se koi jhuTe wade karta tumhin munsifi se kah do tumhein e'tibar hota 
gham-e-ishq mein maza tha jo use samajh ke khate ye wo zahr hai ki aaKHir mai-e-KHush-gawar hota 
ye maza tha dil-lagi ka ki barabar aag lagti na tujhe qarar hota na mujhe qarar hota 
na maza hai dushmani mein na hai lutf dosti mein koi ghair ghair hota koi yar yar hota 
tere wade par sitamgar abhi aur sabr karte agar apni zindagi ka hamein e'tibar hota 
ye wo dard-e-dil nahin hai ki ho chaarasaz koi agar ek bar miTta to hazar bar hota 
gae hosh tere zahid jo wo chashm-e-mast dekhi mujhe kya ulaT na dete jo na baada-KHwar hota 
mujhe mante sab aisa ki adu bhi sajde karte dar-e-yar kaba banta jo mera mazar hota 
tumhein naz ho na kyunkar ki liya hai 'dagh' ka dil ye raqam na hath lagti na ye iftiKHar hota

tire ġham ko jaañ kī talāsh thī tire jāñ-nisār chale ga.e tirī rah meñ karte the sar talab sar-e-rahguzār chale ga.e 
tirī kaj-adā.ī se haar ke shab-e-intizār chalī ga.ī mire zabt-e-hāl se ruuTh kar mire ġham-gusār chale ga.e 
na savāl-e-vasl na arz-e-ġham na hikāyateñ na shikāyateñ tire ahd meñ dil-e-zār ke sabhī iḳhtiyār chale ga.e 
ye hamīñ the jin ke libās par sar-e-rah siyāhī likhī ga.ī yahī daaġh the jo sajā ke ham sar-e-bazm-e-yār chale ga.e 
na rahā junūn-e-ruḳh-e-vafā ye rasan ye daar karoge kyā jinheñ jurm-e-ishq pe naaz thā vo gunāhgār chale ga.e 
tere gham ko jaan ki talash thi tere jaan-nisar chale gae teri rah mein karte the sar talab sar-e-rahguzar chale gae 
teri kaj-adai se haar ke shab-e-intizar chali gai mere zabt-e-haal se ruTh kar mere gham-gusar chale gae 
na sawal-e-wasl na arz-e-gham na hikayaten na shikayaten tere ahd mein dil-e-zar ke sabhi iKHtiyar chale gae 
ye hamin the jin ke libas par sar-e-rah siyahi likhi gai yahi dagh the jo saja ke hum sar-e-bazm-e-yar chale gae 
na raha junun-e-ruKH-e-wafa ye rasan ye dar karoge kya jinhen jurm-e-ishq pe naz tha wo gunahgar chale gae

zindagī kyā hai ik kahānī hai ye kahānī nahīñ sunānī hai 
hai ḳhudā bhī ajiib ya.anī jo na zamīnī na āsmānī hai 
hai mire shauq-e-vasl ko ye gila us kā pahlū sarā-e-fānī hai 
apnī tāmīr-e-jān-o-dil ke liye apnī buniyād ham ko Dhānī hai 
ye hai lamhoñ kā ek shahr-e-azal yaañ kī har baat nā-gahānī hai 
chaliye ai jān-e-shām aaj tumheñ sham.a ik qabr par jalānī hai 
rañg kī apnī baat hai varna āḳhirash ḳhuun bhī to paanī hai 
ik abas kā vajūd hai jis se zindagī ko murād paanī hai 
shaam hai aur sahn meñ dil ke ik ajab huzn-e-āsmānī hai 
zindagi kya hai ek kahani hai ye kahani nahin sunani hai 
hai KHuda bhi ajib yani jo na zamini na aasmani hai 
hai mere shauq-e-wasl ko ye gila us ka pahlu sara-e-fani hai 
apni tamir-e-jaan-o-dil ke liye apni buniyaad hum ko Dhani hai 
ye hai lamhon ka ek shahr-e-azal yan ki har baat na-gahani hai 
chaliye ai jaan-e-sham aaj tumhein shama ek qabr par jalani hai 
rang ki apni baat hai warna aaKHirash KHun bhi to pani hai 
ek abas ka wajud hai jis se zindagi ko murad pani hai 
sham hai aur sahn mein dil ke ek ajab huzn-e-asmani hai

vo chāñdnī kā badan ḳhushbuoñ kā saayā hai bahut aziiz hameñ hai magar parāyā hai 
utar bhī aao kabhī āsmāñ ke ziine se tumheñ ḳhudā ne hamāre liye banāyā hai 
kahāñ se aa.ī ye ḳhushbū ye ghar kī ḳhushbū hai is ajnabī ke añdhere meñ kaun aayā hai 
mahak rahī hai zamīñ chāñdnī ke phūloñ se ḳhudā kisī kī mohabbat pe muskurāyā hai 
use kisī kī mohabbat kā e'tibār nahīñ use zamāne ne shāyad bahut satāyā hai 
tamām umr mirā dil usī dhueñ meñ ghuTā vo ik charāġh thā maiñ ne use bujhāyā hai 
wo chandni ka badan KHushbuon ka saya hai bahut aziz hamein hai magar paraya hai 
utar bhi aao kabhi aasman ke zine se tumhein KHuda ne hamare liye banaya hai 
kahan se aai ye KHushbu ye ghar ki KHushbu hai is ajnabi ke andhere mein kaun aaya hai 
mahak rahi hai zamin chandni ke phulon se KHuda kisi ki mohabbat pe muskuraya hai 
use kisi ki mohabbat ka e'tibar nahin use zamane ne shayad bahut sataya hai 
tamam umr mera dil usi dhuen mein ghuTa wo ek charagh tha main ne use bujhaya hai

baat merī kabhī sunī hī nahīñ jānte vo burī bhalī hī nahīñ 
dil-lagī un kī dil-lagī hī nahīñ ranj bhī hai faqat hañsī hī nahīñ 
lutf-e-mai tujh se kyā kahūñ zāhid haa.e kam-baḳht tū ne pī hī nahīñ 
uḌ ga.ī yuuñ vafā zamāne se kabhī goyā kisī meñ thī hī nahīñ 
jaan kyā duuñ ki jāntā huuñ maiñ tum ne ye chiiz le ke dī hī nahīñ 
ham to dushman ko dost kar lete par kareñ kyā tirī ḳhushī hī nahīñ 
ham tirī aarzū pe jiite haiñ ye nahīñ hai to zindagī hī nahīñ 
dil-lagī dil-lagī nahīñ nāseh tere dil ko abhī lagī hī nahīñ 
'dāġh' kyuuñ tum ko bevafā kahtā vo shikāyat kā aadmī hī nahīñ 
baat meri kabhi suni hi nahin jaante wo buri bhali hi nahin 
dil-lagi un ki dil-lagi hi nahin ranj bhi hai faqat hansi hi nahin 
lutf-e-mai tujh se kya kahun zahid hae kam-baKHt tu ne pi hi nahin 
uD gai yun wafa zamane se kabhi goya kisi mein thi hi nahin 
jaan kya dun ki jaanta hun main tum ne ye chiz le ke di hi nahin 
hum to dushman ko dost kar lete par karen kya teri KHushi hi nahin 
hum teri aarzu pe jite hain ye nahin hai to zindagi hi nahin 
dil-lagi dil-lagi nahin naseh tere dil ko abhi lagi hi nahin 
'dagh' kyun tum ko bewafa kahta wo shikayat ka aadmi hi nahin

na gañvāo nāvak-e-nīm-kash dil-e-reza-reza gañvā diyā jo bache haiñ sañg sameT lo tan-e-dāġh-dāġh luTā diyā 
mire chāra-gar ko naved ho saf-e-dushmanāñ ko ḳhabar karo jo vo qarz rakhte the jaan par vo hisāb aaj chukā diyā 
karo kaj jabīñ pe sar-e-kafan mire qātiloñ ko gumāñ na ho ki ġhurūr-e-ishq kā bāñkpan pas-e-marg ham ne bhulā diyā 
udhar ek harf ki kushtanī yahāñ laakh uzr thā guftanī jo kahā to sun ke uḌā diyā jo likhā to paḌh ke miTā diyā 
jo ruke to koh-e-girāñ the ham jo chale to jaañ se guzar ga.e rah-e-yār ham ne qadam qadam tujhe yādgār banā diyā 
na ganwao nawak-e-nim-kash dil-e-reza-reza ganwa diya jo bache hain sang sameT lo tan-e-dagh-dagh luTa diya 
mere chaara-gar ko nawed ho saf-e-dushmanan ko KHabar karo jo wo qarz rakhte the jaan par wo hisab aaj chuka diya 
karo kaj jabin pe sar-e-kafan mere qatilon ko guman na ho ki ghurur-e-ishq ka bankpan pas-e-marg hum ne bhula diya 
udhar ek harf ki kushtani yahan lakh uzr tha guftani jo kaha to sun ke uDa diya jo likha to paDh ke miTa diya 
jo ruke to koh-e-giran the hum jo chale to jaan se guzar gae rah-e-yar hum ne qadam qadam tujhe yaadgar bana diya

har dhaḌkan haijānī thī har ḳhāmoshī tūfānī thī phir bhī mohabbat sirf musalsal milne kī āsānī thī 
jis din us se baat huī thī us din bhī be-kaif thā maiñ jis din us kā ḳhat aayā hai us din bhī vīrānī thī 
jab us ne mujh se ye kahā thā ishq rifāqat hī to nahīñ tab maiñ ne har shaḳhs kī sūrat mushkil se pahchānī thī 
jis din vo milne aa.ī hai us din kī rūdād ye hai us kā blouse nāranjī thā us kī saarī dhānī thī 
uljhan sī hone lagtī thī mujh ko aksar aur vo yuuñ merā mizāj-e-ishq thā shahrī us kī vafā dahqānī thī 
ab to us ke baare meñ tum jo chāho vo kah Daalo vo añgḌā.ī mere kamre tak to baḌī rūhānī thī 
naam pe ham qurbān the us ke lekin phir ye taur huā us ko dekh ke ruk jaanā bhī sab se baḌī qurbānī thī 
mujh se bichhaḌ kar bhī vo laḌkī kitnī ḳhush ḳhush rahtī hai us laḌkī ne mujh se bichhaḌ kar mar jaane kī Thānī thī 
ishq kī hālat kuchh bhī nahīñ thī baat baḌhāne kā fan thā lamhe lā-fānī Thahre the qatroñ kī tuġhyānī thī 
jis ko ḳhud maiñ ne bhī apnī ruuh kā irfāñ samjhā thā vo to shāyad mere pyāse hoñToñ kī shaitānī thī 
thā darbār-e-kalāñ bhī us kā naubat-ḳhāna us kā thā thī mere dil kī jo raanī amrohe kī raanī thī 
har dhaDkan haijaani thi har KHamoshi tufani thi phir bhi mohabbat sirf musalsal milne ki aasani thi 
jis din us se baat hui thi us din bhi be-kaif tha main jis din us ka KHat aaya hai us din bhi virani thi 
jab us ne mujh se ye kaha tha ishq rifaqat hi to nahin tab main ne har shaKHs ki surat mushkil se pahchani thi 
jis din wo milne aai hai us din ki rudad ye hai us ka blouse naranji tha us ki sari dhani thi 
uljhan si hone lagti thi mujh ko aksar aur wo yun mera mizaj-e-ishq tha shahri us ki wafa dahqani thi 
ab to us ke bare mein tum jo chaho wo kah Dalo wo angDai mere kamre tak to baDi ruhani thi 
nam pe hum qurban the us ke lekin phir ye taur hua us ko dekh ke ruk jaana bhi sab se baDi qurbani thi 
mujh se bichhaD kar bhi wo laDki kitni KHush KHush rahti hai us laDki ne mujh se bichhaD kar mar jaane ki Thani thi 
ishq ki haalat kuchh bhi nahin thi baat baDhane ka fan tha lamhe la-fani Thahre the qatron ki tughyani thi 
jis ko KHud main ne bhi apni ruh ka irfan samjha tha wo to shayad mere pyase honTon ki shaitani thi 
tha darbar-e-kalan bhi us ka naubat-KHana us ka tha thi mere dil ki jo rani amrohe ki rani thi

duā karo ki ye paudā sadā harā hī lage udāsiyoñ meñ bhī chehra khilā khilā hī lage 
vo sādgī na kare kuchh bhī to adā hī lage vo bhol-pan hai ki bebākī bhī hayā hī lage 
ye zāfrānī pullover usī kā hissa hai koī jo dūsrā pahne to dūsrā hī lage 
nahīñ hai mere muqaddar meñ raushnī na sahī ye khiḌkī kholo zarā sub.h kī havā hī lage 
ajiib shaḳhs hai nārāz ho ke hañstā hai maiñ chāhtā huuñ ḳhafā ho to vo ḳhafā hī lage 
hasīñ to aur haiñ lekin koī kahāñ tujh sā jo dil jalā.e bahut phir bhī dilrubā hī lage 
hazāroñ bhes meñ phirte haiñ raam aur rahīm koī zarūrī nahīñ hai bhalā bhalā hī lage 
dua karo ki ye pauda sada hara hi lage udasiyon mein bhi chehra khila khila hi lage 
wo sadgi na kare kuchh bhi to ada hi lage wo bhol-pan hai ki bebaki bhi haya hi lage 
ye zafrani pullower usi ka hissa hai koi jo dusra pahne to dusra hi lage 
nahin hai mere muqaddar mein raushni na sahi ye khiDki kholo zara subh ki hawa hi lage 
ajib shaKHs hai naraaz ho ke hansta hai main chahta hun KHafa ho to wo KHafa hi lage 
hasin to aur hain lekin koi kahan tujh sa jo dil jalae bahut phir bhi dilruba hi lage 
hazaron bhes mein phirte hain ram aur rahim koi zaruri nahin hai bhala bhala hi lage

vo ġhazal vāloñ kā uslūb samajhte hoñge chāñd kahte haiñ kise ḳhuub samajhte hoñge 
itnī miltī hai mirī ġhazloñ se sūrat terī log tujh ko mirā mahbūb samajhte hoñge 
maiñ samajhtā thā mohabbat kī zabāñ ḳhushbū hai phuul se log use ḳhuub samajhte hoñge 
dekh kar phuul ke aurāq pe shabnam kuchh log tirā ashkoñ bharā maktūb samajhte hoñge 
bhuul kar apnā zamāna ye zamāne vaale aaj ke pyaar ko ma.ayūb samajhte hoñge 
wo ghazal walon ka uslub samajhte honge chand kahte hain kise KHub samajhte honge 
itni milti hai meri ghazlon se surat teri log tujh ko mera mahbub samajhte honge 
main samajhta tha mohabbat ki zaban KHushbu hai phul se log use KHub samajhte honge 
dekh kar phul ke auraq pe shabnam kuchh log tera ashkon bhara maktub samajhte honge 
bhul kar apna zamana ye zamane wale aaj ke pyar ko mayub samajhte honge

agarche zor havāoñ ne Daal rakkhā hai magar charāġh ne lau ko sambhāl rakkhā hai 
mohabbatoñ meñ to milnā hai yā ujaḌ jaanā mizāj-e-ishq meñ kab e'tidāl rakkhā hai 
havā meñ nashsha hī nashsha fazā meñ rañg hī rañg ye kis ne pairahan apnā uchhāl rakkhā hai 
bhale dinoñ kā bharosā hī kyā raheñ na raheñ so maiñ ne rishta-e-ġham ko bahāl rakkhā hai 
ham aise sāda-diloñ ko vo dost ho ki ḳhudā sabhī ne vāda-e-fardā pe Taal rakkhā hai 
hisāb-e-lutf-e-harīfāñ kiyā hai jab to khulā ki dostoñ ne ziyāda ḳhayāl rakkhā hai 
bharī bahār meñ ik shāḳh par khilā hai gulāb ki jaise tū ne hathelī pe gaal rakkhā hai 
'farāz' ishq kī duniyā to ḳhūb-sūrat thī ye kis ne fitna-e-hijr-o-visāl rakkhā hai 
agarche zor hawaon ne Dal rakkha hai magar charagh ne lau ko sambhaal rakkha hai 
mohabbaton mein to milna hai ya ujaD jaana mizaj-e-ishq mein kab e'tidal rakkha hai 
hawa mein nashsha hi nashsha faza mein rang hi rang ye kis ne pairahan apna uchhaal rakkha hai 
bhale dinon ka bharosa hi kya rahen na rahen so main ne rishta-e-gham ko bahaal rakkha hai 
hum aise sada-dilon ko wo dost ho ki KHuda sabhi ne wada-e-farda pe Tal rakkha hai 
hisab-e-lutf-e-harifan kiya hai jab to khula ki doston ne ziyaada KHayal rakkha hai 
bhari bahaar mein ek shaKH par khila hai gulab ki jaise tu ne hatheli pe gal rakkha hai 
'faraaz' ishq ki duniya to KHub-surat thi ye kis ne fitna-e-hijr-o-visal rakkha hai

ab vo ghar ik vīrāna thā bas vīrāna zinda thā sab āñkheñ dam toḌ chukī thiiñ aur maiñ tanhā zinda thā 
saarī galī sunsān paḌī thī bād-e-fanā ke pahre meñ hijr ke dālān aur āñgan meñ bas ik saaya zinda thā 
vo jo kabūtar us mūkhe meñ rahte the kis des uḌe ek kā naam navāzinda thā aur ik kā bāzinda thā 
vo dopahr apnī ruḳhsat kī aisā-vaisā dhokā thī apne andar apnī laash uThā.e maiñ jhūTā zinda thā 
thiiñ vo ghar rāteñ bhī kahānī va.ade aur phir din ginnā aanā thā jaane vaale ko jaane vaalā zinda thā 
dastak dene vaale bhī the dastak sunñe vaale bhī thā ābād mohalla saarā har darvāza zinda thā 
piile pattoñ ko sah-pahr kī vahshat pursā detī thī āñgan meñ ik auñdhe ghaḌe par bas ik kavvā zinda thā 
ab wo ghar ek virana tha bas virana zinda tha sab aankhen dam toD chuki thin aur main tanha zinda tha 
sari gali sunsan paDi thi baad-e-fana ke pahre mein hijr ke dalan aur aangan mein bas ek saya zinda tha 
wo jo kabutar us mukhe mein rahte the kis des uDe ek ka nam nawazinda tha aur ek ka bazinda tha 
wo dopahr apni ruKHsat ki aisa-waisa dhoka thi apne andar apni lash uThae main jhuTa zinda tha 
thin wo ghar raaten bhi kahani wade aur phir din ginna aana tha jaane wale ko jaane wala zinda tha 
dastak dene wale bhi the dastak sunne wale bhi tha aabaad mohalla sara har darwaza zinda tha 
pile patton ko sah-pahr ki wahshat pursa deti thi aangan mein ek aundhe ghaDe par bas ek kawwa zinda tha

abhī farmān aayā hai vahāñ se ki haT jā.ūñ maiñ apne darmiyāñ se 
yahāñ jo hai tanaffus hī meñ gum hai parinde uḌ rahe haiñ shāḳh-e-jāñ se 
darīcha baaz hai yādoñ kā aur maiñ havā suntā huuñ peḌoñ kī zabāñ se 
zamāna thā vo dil kī zindagī kā tirī furqat ke din lā.ūñ kahāñ se 
thā ab tak ma.arka bāhar kā darpesh abhī to ghar bhī jaanā hai yahāñ se 
fulāñ se thī ġhazal behtar fulāñ kī fulāñ ke zaḳhm achchhe the fulāñ se 
ḳhabar kyā duuñ maiñ shahr-e-raftagāñ kī koī lauTe bhī shahr-e-raftagāñ se 
yahī anjām kyā tujh ko havas thā koī pūchhe to mīr-e-dāstāñ se 
abhi farman aaya hai wahan se ki haT jaun main apne darmiyan se 
yahan jo hai tanaffus hi mein gum hai parinde uD rahe hain shaKH-e-jaan se 
daricha baz hai yaadon ka aur main hawa sunta hun peDon ki zaban se 
zamana tha wo dil ki zindagi ka teri furqat ke din laun kahan se 
tha ab tak marka bahar ka darpesh abhi to ghar bhi jaana hai yahan se 
fulan se thi ghazal behtar fulan ki fulan ke zaKHm achchhe the fulan se 
KHabar kya dun main shahr-e-raftagan ki koi lauTe bhi shahr-e-raftagan se 
yahi anjam kya tujh ko hawas tha koi puchhe to mir-e-dastan se

mil hī aate haiñ use aisā bhī kyā ho jā.egā bas yahī nā dard kuchh dil kā sivā ho jā.egā 
vo mire dil kī pareshānī se afsurda ho kyuuñ dil kā kyā hai kal ko phir achchhā bhalā ho jā.egā 
ghar se kuchh ḳhvāboñ se milne ke liye nikle the ham kyā ḳhabar thī zindagī se sāmnā ho jā.egā 
rone lagtā huuñ mohabbat meñ to kahtā hai koī kyā tire ashkoñ se ye jañgal harā ho jā.egā 
kaise aa saktī hai aisī dil-nashīñ duniyā ko maut kaun kahtā hai ki ye sab kuchh fanā ho jā.egā 
mil hi aate hain use aisa bhi kya ho jaega bas yahi na dard kuchh dil ka siwa ho jaega 
wo mere dil ki pareshani se afsurda ho kyun dil ka kya hai kal ko phir achchha bhala ho jaega 
ghar se kuchh KHwabon se milne ke liye nikle the hum kya KHabar thi zindagi se samna ho jaega 
rone lagta hun mohabbat mein to kahta hai koi kya tere ashkon se ye jangal hara ho jaega 
kaise aa sakti hai aisi dil-nashin duniya ko maut kaun kahta hai ki ye sab kuchh fana ho jaega

rone se aur ishq meñ bebāk ho ga.e dho.e ga.e ham itne ki bas paak ho ga.e 
sarf-e-bahā-e-mai hue ālāt-e-mai-kashī the ye hī do hisāb so yuuñ paak ho ga.e 
rusvā-e-dahr go hue āvārgī se tum baare tabī.atoñ ke to chālāk ho ga.e 
kahtā hai kaun nāla-e-bulbul ko be-asar parde meñ gul ke laakh jigar chaak ho ga.e 
pūchhe hai kyā vajūd o adam ahl-e-shauq kā aap apnī aag ke ḳhas-o-ḳhāshāk ho ga.e 
karne ga.e the us se taġhāful kā ham gila kī ek hī nigāh ki bas ḳhaak ho ga.e 
is rañg se uThā.ī kal us ne 'asad' kī na.ash dushman bhī jis ko dekh ke ġhamnāk ho ga.e 
rone se aur ishq mein bebak ho gae dhoe gae hum itne ki bas pak ho gae 
sarf-e-baha-e-mai hue aalat-e-mai-kashi the ye hi do hisab so yun pak ho gae 
ruswa-e-dahr go hue aawargi se tum bare tabiaton ke to chaalak ho gae 
kahta hai kaun nala-e-bulbul ko be-asar parde mein gul ke lakh jigar chaak ho gae 
puchhe hai kya wajud o adam ahl-e-shauq ka aap apni aag ke KHas-o-KHashak ho gae 
karne gae the us se taghaful ka hum gila ki ek hi nigah ki bas KHak ho gae 
is rang se uThai kal us ne 'asad' ki nash dushman bhi jis ko dekh ke ghamnak ho gae

juz tire koī bhī din raat na jaane mere tū kahāñ hai magar ai dost purāne mere 
tū bhī ḳhushbū hai magar merā tajassus bekār barg-e-āvāra kī mānind Thikāne mere 
sham.a kī lau thī ki vo tū thā magar hijr kī raat der tak rotā rahā koī sirhāne mere 
ḳhalq kī be-ḳhabarī hai ki mirī rusvā.ī log mujh ko hī sunāte haiñ fasāne mere 
luT ke bhī ḳhush huuñ ki ashkoñ se bharā hai dāman dekh ġhārat-gar-e-dil ye bhī ḳhazāne mere 
aaj ik aur baras biit gayā us ke baġhair jis ke hote hue hote the zamāne mere 
kaash tū bhī merī āvāz kahīñ suntā ho phir pukārā hai tujhe dil kī sadā ne mere 
kaash tū bhī kabhī aa jaa.e masīhā.ī ko log aate haiñ bahut dil ko dukhāne mere 
kaash auroñ kī tarah maiñ bhī kabhī kah saktā baat sun lī hai mirī aaj ḳhudā ne mere 
tū hai kis haal meñ ai zūd-farāmosh mire mujh ko to chhīn liyā ahd-e-vafā ne mere 
chārā-gar yuuñ to bahut haiñ magar ai jān-e-'farāz' juz tire aur koī zaḳhm na jaane mere 
juz tere koi bhi din raat na jaane mere tu kahan hai magar ai dost purane mere 
tu bhi KHushbu hai magar mera tajassus bekar barg-e-awara ki manind Thikane mere 
shama ki lau thi ki wo tu tha magar hijr ki raat der tak rota raha koi sirhane mere 
KHalq ki be-KHabari hai ki meri ruswai log mujh ko hi sunate hain fasane mere 
luT ke bhi KHush hun ki ashkon se bhara hai daman dekh ghaarat-gar-e-dil ye bhi KHazane mere 
aaj ek aur baras bit gaya us ke baghair jis ke hote hue hote the zamane mere 
kash tu bhi meri aawaz kahin sunta ho phir pukara hai tujhe dil ki sada ne mere 
kash tu bhi kabhi aa jae masihai ko log aate hain bahut dil ko dukhane mere 
kash auron ki tarah main bhi kabhi kah sakta baat sun li hai meri aaj KHuda ne mere 
tu hai kis haal mein ai zud-faramosh mere mujh ko to chhin liya ahd-e-wafa ne mere 
chaara-gar yun to bahut hain magar ai jaan-e-'faraaz' juz tere aur koi zaKHm na jaane mere

raushan jamāl-e-yār se hai anjuman tamām dahkā huā hai ātish-e-gul se chaman tamām 
hairat ġhurūr-e-husn se shoḳhī se iztirāb dil ne bhī tere siikh liye haiñ chalan tamām 
allāh-rī jism-e-yār kī ḳhūbī ki ḳhud-ba-ḳhud rangīniyoñ meñ Duub gayā pairahan tamām 
dil ḳhuun ho chukā hai jigar ho chukā hai ḳhaak baaqī huuñ maiñ mujhe bhī kar ai teġh-zan tamām 
dekho to chashm-e-yār kī jādū-nigāhiyāñ behosh ik nazar meñ huī anjuman tamām 
hai nāz-e-husn se jo farozāñ jabīn-e-yār labrez āb-e-nūr hai chāh-e-zaqan tamām 
nashv-o-numā-e-sabza-o-gul se bahār meñ shādābiyoñ ne gher liyā hai chaman tamām 
us nāznīñ ne jab se kiyā hai vahāñ qayām gulzār ban ga.ī hai zamīn-e-dakan tamām 
achchhā hai ahl-e-jaur kiye jaa.eñ saḳhtiyāñ phailegī yuuñ hī shorish-e-hubb-e-vatan tamām 
samjhe haiñ ahl-e-sharq ko shāyad qarīb-e-marg maġhrib ke yuuñ haiñ jam.a ye zaaġh o zaġhan tamām 
shīrīni-e-nasīm hai soz-o-gudāz-e-'mīr' 'hasrat' tire suḳhan pe hai lutf-e-suḳhan tamām 
raushan jamal-e-yar se hai anjuman tamam dahka hua hai aatish-e-gul se chaman tamam 
hairat ghurur-e-husn se shoKHi se iztirab dil ne bhi tere sikh liye hain chalan tamam 
allah-ri jism-e-yar ki KHubi ki KHud-ba-KHud ranginiyon mein Dub gaya pairahan tamam 
dil KHun ho chuka hai jigar ho chuka hai KHak baqi hun main mujhe bhi kar ai tegh-zan tamam 
dekho to chashm-e-yar ki jadu-nigahiyan behosh ek nazar mein hui anjuman tamam 
hai naz-e-husn se jo farozan jabin-e-yar labrez aab-e-nur hai chah-e-zaqan tamam 
nashw-o-numa-e-sabza-o-gul se bahaar mein shadabiyon ne gher liya hai chaman tamam 
us naznin ne jab se kiya hai wahan qayam gulzar ban gai hai zamin-e-dakan tamam 
achchha hai ahl-e-jaur kiye jaen saKHtiyan phailegi yun hi shorish-e-hubb-e-watan tamam 
samjhe hain ahl-e-sharq ko shayad qarib-e-marg maghrib ke yun hain jama ye zagh o zaghan tamam 
shirini-e-nasim hai soz-o-gudaz-e-'mir' 'hasrat' tere suKHan pe hai lutf-e-suKHan tamam

vahī taaj hai vahī taḳht hai vahī zahr hai vahī jaam hai ye vahī ḳhudā kī zamīn hai ye vahī butoñ kā nizām hai 
baḌe shauq se mirā ghar jalā koī aañch tujh pe na aa.egī ye zabāñ kisī ne ḳharīd lī ye qalam kisī kā ġhulām hai 
yahāñ ek bachche ke ḳhuun se jo likhā huā hai use paḌheñ tirā kīrtan abhī paap hai abhī merā sajda harām hai 
maiñ ye māntā huuñ mire diye tirī āñdhiyoñ ne bujhā diye magar ek jugnū havāoñ meñ abhī raushnī kā imaam hai 
mire fikr-o-fan tirī anjuman na uruuj thā na zavāl hai mire lab pe terā hī naam thā mire lab pe terā hī naam hai 
wahi taj hai wahi taKHt hai wahi zahr hai wahi jam hai ye wahi KHuda ki zamin hai ye wahi buton ka nizam hai 
baDe shauq se mera ghar jala koi aanch tujh pe na aaegi ye zaban kisi ne KHarid li ye qalam kisi ka ghulam hai 
yahan ek bachche ke KHun se jo likha hua hai use paDhen tera kirtan abhi pap hai abhi mera sajda haram hai 
main ye manta hun mere diye teri aandhiyon ne bujha diye magar ek jugnu hawaon mein abhi raushni ka imam hai 
mere fikr-o-fan teri anjuman na uruj tha na zawal hai mere lab pe tera hi nam tha mere lab pe tera hi nam hai

arz-e-niyāz-e-ishq ke qābil nahīñ rahā jis dil pe naaz thā mujhe vo dil nahīñ rahā 
jaatā huuñ dāġh-e-hasrat-e-hastī liye hue huuñ sham-e-kushta dar-ḳhur-e-mahfil nahīñ rahā 
marne kī ai dil aur hī tadbīr kar ki maiñ shāyān-e-dast-o-bāzū-e-qātil nahīñ rahā 
bar-rū-e-shash-jahat dar-e-ā.īna baaz hai yaañ imtiyāz-e-nāqis-o-kāmil nahīñ rahā 
vā kar diye haiñ shauq ne band-e-naqāb-e-husn ġhair-az-nigāh ab koī haa.il nahīñ rahā 
go maiñ rahā rahīn-e-sitam-hā-e-rozgār lekin tire ḳhayāl se ġhāfil nahīñ rahā 
dil se havā-e-kisht-e-vafā miT ga.ī ki vaañ hāsil sivā.e hasrat-e-hāsil nahīñ rahā 
bedād-e-ishq se nahīñ Dartā magar 'asad' jis dil pe naaz thā mujhe vo dil nahīñ rahā 
har-chand maiñ huuñ tūti-e-shīrīñ-suḳhan vale ā.īna aah mere muqābil nahīñ rahā 
jāñ-dād-gāñ kā hausla fursat-gudāz hai yaañ arsa-e-tapīdan-e-bismil nahīñ rahā 
huuñ qatra-zan ba-vādī-e-hasrat shabāna roz juz tār-e-ashk jāda-e-manzil nahīñ rahā 
ai aah merī ḳhātir-e-vābasta ke sivā duniyā meñ koī uqda-e-mushkil nahīñ rahā 
andāz-e-nāla yaad haiñ sab mujh ko par 'asad' jis dil pe naaz thā mujhe vo dil nahīñ rahā 
arz-e-niyaz-e-ishq ke qabil nahin raha jis dil pe naz tha mujhe wo dil nahin raha 
jata hun dagh-e-hasrat-e-hasti liye hue hun sham-e-kushta dar-KHur-e-mahfil nahin raha 
marne ki ai dil aur hi tadbir kar ki main shayan-e-dast-o-bazu-e-qatil nahin raha 
bar-ru-e-shash-jahat dar-e-aina baz hai yan imtiyaz-e-naqis-o-kaamil nahin raha 
wa kar diye hain shauq ne band-e-naqab-e-husn ghair-az-nigah ab koi hail nahin raha 
go main raha rahin-e-sitam-ha-e-rozgar lekin tere KHayal se ghafil nahin raha 
dil se hawa-e-kisht-e-wafa miT gai ki wan hasil siwae hasrat-e-hasil nahin raha 
bedad-e-ishq se nahin Darta magar 'asad' jis dil pe naz tha mujhe wo dil nahin raha 
har-chand main hun tuti-e-shirin-suKHan wale aaina aah mere muqabil nahin raha 
jaan-dad-gan ka hausla fursat-gudaz hai yan arsa-e-tapidan-e-bismil nahin raha 
hun qatra-zan ba-wadi-e-hasrat shabana roz juz tar-e-ashk jada-e-manzil nahin raha 
ai aah meri KHatir-e-wabasta ke siwa duniya mein koi uqda-e-mushkil nahin raha 
andaz-e-nala yaad hain sab mujh ko par 'asad' jis dil pe naz tha mujhe wo dil nahin raha

ḳhātir se yā lihāz se maiñ maan to gayā jhūTī qasam se aap kā īmān to gayā 
dil le ke muft kahte haiñ kuchh kaam kā nahīñ ulTī shikāyateñ huiiñ ehsān to gayā 
Dartā huuñ dekh kar dil-e-be-ārzū ko maiñ sunsān ghar ye kyuuñ na ho mehmān to gayā 
kyā aa.e rāhat aa.ī jo kunj-e-mazār meñ vo valvala vo shauq vo armān to gayā 
dekhā hai but-kade meñ jo ai shaiḳh kuchh na pūchh īmān kī to ye hai ki īmān to gayā 
ifshā-e-rāz-e-ishq meñ go zillateñ huiiñ lekin use jatā to diyā jaan to gayā 
go nāma-bar se ḳhush na huā par hazār shukr mujh ko vo mere naam se pahchān to gayā 
bazm-e-adū meñ sūrat-e-parvāna dil mirā go rashk se jalā tire qurbān to gayā 
hosh o havās o taab o tavāñ 'dāġh' jā chuke ab ham bhī jaane vaale haiñ sāmān to gayā 
KHatir se ya lihaz se main man to gaya jhuTi qasam se aap ka iman to gaya 
dil le ke muft kahte hain kuchh kaam ka nahin ulTi shikayaten huin ehsan to gaya 
Darta hun dekh kar dil-e-be-arzu ko main sunsan ghar ye kyun na ho mehman to gaya 
kya aae rahat aai jo kunj-e-mazar mein wo walwala wo shauq wo arman to gaya 
dekha hai but-kade mein jo ai shaiKH kuchh na puchh iman ki to ye hai ki iman to gaya 
ifsha-e-raaz-e-ishq mein go zillaten huin lekin use jata to diya jaan to gaya 
go nama-bar se KHush na hua par hazar shukr mujh ko wo mere nam se pahchan to gaya 
bazm-e-adu mein surat-e-parwana dil mera go rashk se jala tere qurban to gaya 
hosh o hawas o tab o tawan 'dagh' ja chuke ab hum bhi jaane wale hain saman to gaya

sab log jidhar vo haiñ udhar dekh rahe haiñ ham dekhne vāloñ kī nazar dekh rahe haiñ 
tevar tire ai rashk-e-qamar dekh rahe haiñ ham shaam se āsār-e-sahar dekh rahe haiñ 
merā dil-e-gum-gashta jo DhūñDā nahīñ miltā vo apnā dahan apnī kamar dekh rahe haiñ 
koī to nikal aa.egā sarbāz-e-mohabbat dil dekh rahe haiñ vo jigar dekh rahe haiñ 
hai majma-e-aġhyār ki hañgāma-e-mahshar kyā sair mire dīda-e-tar dekh rahe haiñ 
ab ai nigah-e-shauq na rah jaa.e tamannā is vaqt udhar se vo idhar dekh rahe haiñ 
har-chand ki har roz kī ranjish hai qayāmat ham koī din us ko bhī magar dekh rahe haiñ 
aamad hai kisī kī ki gayā koī idhar se kyuuñ sab taraf-e-rāhguzar dekh rahe haiñ 
takrār tajallī ne tire jalve meñ kyuuñ kī hairat-zada sab ahl-e-nazar dekh rahe haiñ 
nairañg hai ek ek tirā diid ke qābil ham ai falak-e-shobada-gar dekh rahe haiñ 
kab tak hai tumhārā suḳhan-e-talḳh gavārā is zahr meñ kitnā hai asar dekh rahe haiñ 
kuchh dekh rahe haiñ dil-e-bismil kā taḌapnā kuchh ġhaur se qātil kā hunar dekh rahe haiñ 
ab tak to jo qismat ne dikhāyā vahī dekhā ā.inda ho kyā nafā o zarar dekh rahe haiñ 
pahle to sunā karte the āshiq kī musībat ab aañkh se vo aaTh pahar dekh rahe haiñ 
kyuuñ kufr hai dīdār-e-sanam hazrat-e-vā.iz allāh dikhātā hai bashar dekh rahe haiñ 
ḳhat ġhair kā paḌhte the jo Tokā to vo bole aḳhbār kā parcha hai ḳhabar dekh rahe haiñ 
paḌh paḌh ke vo dam karte haiñ kuchh haath par apne hañs hañs ke mire zaḳhm-e-jigar dekh rahe haiñ 
maiñ 'dāġh' huuñ martā huuñ idhar dekhiye mujh ko muñh pher ke ye aap kidhar dekh rahe haiñ 
sab log jidhar wo hain udhar dekh rahe hain hum dekhne walon ki nazar dekh rahe hain 
tewar tere ai rashk-e-qamar dekh rahe hain hum sham se aasar-e-sahar dekh rahe hain 
mera dil-e-gum-gashta jo DhunDa nahin milta wo apna dahan apni kamar dekh rahe hain 
koi to nikal aaega sarbaz-e-mohabbat dil dekh rahe hain wo jigar dekh rahe hain 
hai majma-e-aghyar ki hangama-e-mahshar kya sair mere dida-e-tar dekh rahe hain 
ab ai nigah-e-shauq na rah jae tamanna is waqt udhar se wo idhar dekh rahe hain 
har-chand ki har roz ki ranjish hai qayamat hum koi din us ko bhi magar dekh rahe hain 
aamad hai kisi ki ki gaya koi idhar se kyun sab taraf-e-rahguzar dekh rahe hain 
takrar tajalli ne tere jalwe mein kyun ki hairat-zada sab ahl-e-nazar dekh rahe hain 
nairang hai ek ek tera did ke qabil hum ai falak-e-shobada-gar dekh rahe hain 
kab tak hai tumhaara suKHan-e-talKH gawara is zahr mein kitna hai asar dekh rahe hain 
kuchh dekh rahe hain dil-e-bismil ka taDapna kuchh ghaur se qatil ka hunar dekh rahe hain 
ab tak to jo qismat ne dikhaya wahi dekha aainda ho kya nafa o zarar dekh rahe hain 
pahle to suna karte the aashiq ki musibat ab aankh se wo aaTh pahar dekh rahe hain 
kyun kufr hai didar-e-sanam hazrat-e-waiz allah dikhata hai bashar dekh rahe hain 
KHat ghair ka paDhte the jo Toka to wo bole aKHbar ka parcha hai KHabar dekh rahe hain 
paDh paDh ke wo dam karte hain kuchh hath par apne hans hans ke mere zaKHm-e-jigar dekh rahe hain 
main 'dagh' hun marta hun idhar dekhiye mujh ko munh pher ke ye aap kidhar dekh rahe hain

milāte ho usī ko ḳhaak meñ jo dil se miltā hai mirī jaañ chāhne vaalā baḌī mushkil se miltā hai 
kahīñ hai iid kī shādī kahīñ mātam hai maqtal meñ koī qātil se miltā hai koī bismil se miltā hai 
pas-e-parda bhī lailā haath rakh letī hai āñkhoñ par ġhubār-e-nā-tavān-e-qais jab mahmil se miltā hai 
bhare haiñ tujh meñ vo lākhoñ hunar ai majma-e-ḳhūbī mulāqātī tirā goyā bharī mahfil se miltā hai 
mujhe aatā hai kyā kyā rashk vaqt-e-zab.h us se bhī galā jis dam lipaT kar ḳhanjar-e-qātil se miltā hai 
ba-zāhir bā-adab yuuñ hazrat-e-nāseh se miltā huuñ murīd-e-ḳhās jaise murshid-e-kāmil se miltā hai 
misāl-e-ganj-e-qārūñ ahl-e-hājat se nahīñ chhuptā jo hotā hai saḳhī ḳhud DhūñD kar saa.il se miltā hai 
javāb is baat kā us shoḳh ko kyā de sake koī jo dil le kar kahe kam-baḳht tū kis dil se miltā hai 
chhupā.e se koī chhuptī hai apne dil kī betābī ki har tār-e-nafas apnā rag-e-bismil se miltā hai 
adam kī jo haqīqat hai vo pūchho ahl-e-hastī se musāfir ko to manzil kā patā manzil se miltā hai 
ġhazab hai 'dāġh' ke dil se tumhārā dil nahīñ miltā tumhārā chāñd sā chehra mah-e-kāmil se miltā hai 
milate ho usi ko KHak mein jo dil se milta hai meri jaan chahne wala baDi mushkil se milta hai 
kahin hai id ki shadi kahin matam hai maqtal mein koi qatil se milta hai koi bismil se milta hai 
pas-e-parda bhi laila hath rakh leti hai aankhon par ghubar-e-na-tawan-e-qais jab mahmil se milta hai 
bhare hain tujh mein wo lakhon hunar ai majma-e-KHubi mulaqati tera goya bhari mahfil se milta hai 
mujhe aata hai kya kya rashk waqt-e-zabh us se bhi gala jis dam lipaT kar KHanjar-e-qatil se milta hai 
ba-zahir ba-adab yun hazrat-e-naseh se milta hun murid-e-KHas jaise murshid-e-kaamil se milta hai 
misal-e-ganj-e-qarun ahl-e-hajat se nahin chhupta jo hota hai saKHi KHud DhunD kar sail se milta hai 
jawab is baat ka us shoKH ko kya de sake koi jo dil le kar kahe kam-baKHt tu kis dil se milta hai 
chhupae se koi chhupti hai apne dil ki betabi ki har tar-e-nafas apna rag-e-bismil se milta hai 
adam ki jo haqiqat hai wo puchho ahl-e-hasti se musafir ko to manzil ka pata manzil se milta hai 
ghazab hai 'dagh' ke dil se tumhaara dil nahin milta tumhaara chand sa chehra mah-e-kaamil se milta hai

tirī umiid tirā intizār jab se hai na shab ko din se shikāyat na din ko shab se hai 
kisī kā dard ho karte haiñ tere naam raqam gila hai jo bhī kisī se tire sabab se hai 
huā hai jab se dil-e-nā-subūr be-qābū kalām tujh se nazar ko baḌe adab se hai 
agar sharar hai to bhaḌke jo phuul hai to khile tarah tarah kī talab tere rañg-e-lab se hai 
kahāñ ga.e shab-e-furqat ke jāgne vaale sitāra-e-saharī ham-kalām kab se hai 
teri umid tera intizar jab se hai na shab ko din se shikayat na din ko shab se hai 
kisi ka dard ho karte hain tere nam raqam gila hai jo bhi kisi se tere sabab se hai 
hua hai jab se dil-e-na-subur be-qabu kalam tujh se nazar ko baDe adab se hai 
agar sharar hai to bhaDke jo phul hai to khile tarah tarah ki talab tere rang-e-lab se hai 
kahan gae shab-e-furqat ke jagne wale sitara-e-sahari ham-kalam kab se hai

ḳhāmosh ho kyuuñ dād-e-jafā kyuuñ nahīñ dete bismil ho to qātil ko duā kyuuñ nahīñ dete 
vahshat kā sabab rauzan-e-zindāñ to nahīñ hai mehr o mah o anjum ko bujhā kyuuñ nahīñ dete 
ik ye bhī to andāz-e-ilāj-e-ġham-e-jāñ hai ai chāragaro dard baḌhā kyuuñ nahīñ dete 
munsif ho agar tum to kab insāf karoge mujrim haiñ agar ham to sazā kyuuñ nahīñ dete 
rahzan ho to hāzir hai matā-e-dil-o-jāñ bhī rahbar ho to manzil kā pata kyuuñ nahīñ dete 
kyā biit ga.ī ab ke 'farāz' ahl-e-chaman par yārān-e-qafas mujh ko sadā kyuuñ nahīñ dete 
KHamosh ho kyun dad-e-jafa kyun nahin dete bismil ho to qatil ko dua kyun nahin dete 
wahshat ka sabab rauzan-e-zindan to nahin hai mehr o mah o anjum ko bujha kyun nahin dete 
ek ye bhi to andaz-e-ilaj-e-gham-e-jaan hai ai chaaragaro dard baDha kyun nahin dete 
munsif ho agar tum to kab insaf karoge mujrim hain agar hum to saza kyun nahin dete 
rahzan ho to hazir hai mata-e-dil-o-jaan bhi rahbar ho to manzil ka pata kyun nahin dete 
kya bit gai ab ke 'faraaz' ahl-e-chaman par yaran-e-qafas mujh ko sada kyun nahin dete

muntazir kab se tahayyur hai tirī taqrīr kā baat kar tujh par gumāñ hone lagā tasvīr kā 
raat kyā so.e ki baaqī umr kī niiñd uḌ ga.ī ḳhvāb kyā dekhā ki dhaḌkā lag gayā tābīr kā 
kaise paayā thā tujhe phir kis tarah khoyā tujhe mujh sā munkir bhī to qaa.el ho gayā taqdīr kā 
jis tarah bādal kā saaya pyaas bhaḌkātā rahe maiñ ne ye aalam bhī dekhā hai tirī tasvīr kā 
jaane kis aalam meñ tū bichhḌā ki hai tere baġhair aaj tak har naqsh fariyādī mirī tahrīr kā 
ishq meñ sar phoḌnā bhī kyā ki ye be-mehr log jū-e-ḳhūñ ko naam de dete haiñ jū-e-shīr kā 
jis ko bhī chāhā use shiddat se chāhā hai 'farāz' silsila TuuTā nahīñ hai dard kī zanjīr kā 
muntazir kab se tahayyur hai teri taqrir ka baat kar tujh par guman hone laga taswir ka 
raat kya soe ki baqi umr ki nind uD gai KHwab kya dekha ki dhaDka lag gaya tabir ka 
kaise paya tha tujhe phir kis tarah khoya tujhe mujh sa munkir bhi to qael ho gaya taqdir ka 
jis tarah baadal ka saya pyas bhaDkata rahe main ne ye aalam bhi dekha hai teri taswir ka 
jaane kis aalam mein tu bichhDa ki hai tere baghair aaj tak har naqsh fariyaadi meri tahrir ka 
ishq mein sar phoDna bhi kya ki ye be-mehr log ju-e-KHun ko nam de dete hain ju-e-shir ka 
jis ko bhi chaha use shiddat se chaha hai 'faraaz' silsila TuTa nahin hai dard ki zanjir ka

vafā-e-vāda nahīñ vāda-e-digar bhī nahīñ vo mujh se rūThe to the lekin is qadar bhī nahīñ 
baras rahī hai harīm-e-havas meñ daulat-e-husn gadā-e-ishq ke kaase meñ ik nazar bhī nahīñ 
na jaane kis liye ummīd-vār baiThā huuñ ik aisī raah pe jo terī rahguzar bhī nahīñ 
nigāh-e-shauq sar-e-bazm be-hijāb na ho vo be-ḳhabar hī sahī itne be-ḳhabar bhī nahīñ 
ye ahd-e-tark-e-mohabbat hai kis liye āḳhir sukūn-e-qalb udhar bhī nahīñ idhar bhī nahīñ 
wafa-e-wada nahin wada-e-digar bhi nahin wo mujh se ruThe to the lekin is qadar bhi nahin 
baras rahi hai harim-e-hawas mein daulat-e-husn gada-e-ishq ke kase mein ek nazar bhi nahin 
na jaane kis liye ummid-war baiTha hun ek aisi rah pe jo teri rahguzar bhi nahin 
nigah-e-shauq sar-e-bazm be-hijab na ho wo be-KHabar hi sahi itne be-KHabar bhi nahin 
ye ahd-e-tark-e-mohabbat hai kis liye aaKHir sukun-e-qalb udhar bhi nahin idhar bhi nahin

ye tanhā raat ye gahrī fazā.eñ use DhūñDeñ ki us ko bhuul jaa.eñ 
ḳhayāloñ kī ghanī ḳhāmoshiyoñ meñ ghulī jaatī haiñ lafzoñ kī sadā.eñ 
ye raste rahravoñ se bhāgte haiñ yahāñ chhup chhup ke chaltī haiñ havā.eñ 
ye paanī ḳhāmushī se bah rahā hai ise dekheñ ki is meñ Duub jaa.eñ 
jo ġham jalte haiñ sheroñ kī chitā meñ unheñ phir apne siine se lagā.eñ 
chalo aisā makāñ ābād kar leñ jahāñ logoñ kī āvāzeñ na aa.eñ 
ye tanha raat ye gahri fazaen use DhunDen ki us ko bhul jaen 
KHayalon ki ghani KHamoshiyon mein ghuli jati hain lafzon ki sadaen 
ye raste rahrawon se bhagte hain yahan chhup chhup ke chalti hain hawaen 
ye pani KHamushi se bah raha hai ise dekhen ki is mein Dub jaen 
jo gham jalte hain sheron ki chita mein unhen phir apne sine se lagaen 
chalo aisa makan aabaad kar len jahan logon ki aawazen na aaen

maiñ kab tanhā huā thā yaad hogā tumhārā faisla thā yaad hogā 
bahut se ujle ujle phuul le kar koī tum se milā thā yaad hogā 
bichhī thiiñ har taraf āñkheñ hī āñkheñ koī aañsū girā thā yaad hogā 
udāsī aur baḌhtī jā rahī thī vo chehra bujh rahā thā yaad hogā 
vo ḳhat pāgal havā ke āñchaloñ par kise tum ne likhā thā yaad hogā 
main kab tanha hua tha yaad hoga tumhaara faisla tha yaad hoga 
bahut se ujle ujle phul le kar koi tum se mila tha yaad hoga 
bichhi thin har taraf aankhen hi aankhen koi aansu gira tha yaad hoga 
udasi aur baDhti ja rahi thi wo chehra bujh raha tha yaad hoga 
wo KHat pagal hawa ke aanchalon par kise tum ne likha tha yaad hoga

tum aa.e ho tumheñ bhī aazmā kar dekh letā huuñ tumhāre saath bhī kuchh duur jā kar dekh letā huuñ 
havā.eñ jin kī andhī khiḌkiyoñ par sar paTaktī haiñ maiñ un kamroñ meñ phir sham.eñ jalā kar dekh letā huuñ 
ajab kyā is qarīne se koī sūrat nikal aa.e tirī bātoñ ko ḳhvāboñ se milā kar dekh letā huuñ 
sahar-dam kirchiyāñ TuuTe hue ḳhvāboñ kī miltī haiñ to bistar jhaaḌ kar chādar haTā kar dekh letā huuñ 
bahut dil ko dukhātā hai kabhī jab dard-e-mahjūrī tirī yādoñ kī jānib muskurā kar dekh letā huuñ 
uḌā kar rañg kuchh hoñToñ se kuchh āñkhoñ se kuchh dil se ga.e lamhoñ ko tasvīreñ banā kar dekh letā huuñ 
nahīñ ho tum bhī vo ab mujh se yaaro kyā chhupāoge havā kī samt ko miTTī uḌā kar dekh letā huuñ 
sunā hai be-niyāzī hī ilāj-e-nā-umīdī hai ye nusḳha bhī koī din aazmā kar dekh letā huuñ 
mohabbat mar ga.ī 'mushtāq' lekin tum na mānoge maiñ ye afvāh bhī tum ko sunā kar dekh letā huuñ 
tum aae ho tumhein bhi aazma kar dekh leta hun tumhaare sath bhi kuchh dur ja kar dekh leta hun 
hawaen jin ki andhi khiDkiyon par sar paTakti hain main un kamron mein phir shamen jala kar dekh leta hun 
ajab kya is qarine se koi surat nikal aae teri baaton ko KHwabon se mila kar dekh leta hun 
sahar-dam kirchiyan TuTe hue KHwabon ki milti hain to bistar jhaD kar chadar haTa kar dekh leta hun 
bahut dil ko dukhata hai kabhi jab dard-e-mahjuri teri yaadon ki jaanib muskura kar dekh leta hun 
uDa kar rang kuchh honTon se kuchh aankhon se kuchh dil se gae lamhon ko taswiren bana kar dekh leta hun 
nahin ho tum bhi wo ab mujh se yaro kya chhupaoge hawa ki samt ko miTTi uDa kar dekh leta hun 
suna hai be-niyazi hi ilaj-e-na-umidi hai ye nusKHa bhi koi din aazma kar dekh leta hun 
mohabbat mar gai 'mushtaq' lekin tum na manoge main ye afwah bhi tum ko suna kar dekh leta hun

ab shauq se ki jaañ se guzar jaanā chāhiye bol ai havā-e-shahr kidhar jaanā chāhiye 
kab tak isī ko āḳhirī manzil kaheñge ham kū-e-murād se bhī udhar jaanā chāhiye 
vo vaqt aa gayā hai ki sāhil ko chhoḌ kar gahre samundaroñ meñ utar jaanā chāhiye 
ab raftagāñ kī baat nahīñ kārvāñ kī hai jis samt bhī ho gard-e-safar jaanā chāhiye 
kuchh to subūt-e-ḳhūn-e-tamannā kahīñ mile hai dil tahī to aañkh ko bhar jaanā chāhiye 
yā apnī ḳhvāhishoñ ko muqaddas na jānte yā ḳhvāhishoñ ke saath hī mar jaanā chāhiye 
ab shauq se ki jaan se guzar jaana chahiye bol ai hawa-e-shahr kidhar jaana chahiye 
kab tak isi ko aaKHiri manzil kahenge hum ku-e-murad se bhi udhar jaana chahiye 
wo waqt aa gaya hai ki sahil ko chhoD kar gahre samundaron mein utar jaana chahiye 
ab raftagan ki baat nahin karwan ki hai jis samt bhi ho gard-e-safar jaana chahiye 
kuchh to subut-e-KHun-e-tamanna kahin mile hai dil tahi to aankh ko bhar jaana chahiye 
ya apni KHwahishon ko muqaddas na jaante ya KHwahishon ke sath hi mar jaana chahiye

patā ab tak nahīñ badlā hamārā vahī ghar hai vahī qissa hamārā 
vahī TuuTī huī kashtī hai apnī vahī Thahrā huā dariyā hamārā 
ye maqtal bhī hai aur kunj-e-amāñ bhī ye dil ye be-nishāñ kamra hamārā 
kisī jānib nahīñ khulte darīche kahīñ jaatā nahīñ rasta hamārā 
ham apnī dhuup meñ baiThe haiñ 'mushtāq' hamāre saath hai saayā hamārā 
pata ab tak nahin badla hamara wahi ghar hai wahi qissa hamara 
wahi TuTi hui kashti hai apni wahi Thahra hua dariya hamara 
ye maqtal bhi hai aur kunj-e-aman bhi ye dil ye be-nishan kamra hamara 
kisi jaanib nahin khulte dariche kahin jata nahin rasta hamara 
hum apni dhup mein baiThe hain 'mushtaq' hamare sath hai saya hamara

vahshateñ baḌhtī ga.iiñ hijr ke āzār ke saath ab to ham baat bhī karte nahīñ ġham-ḳhvār ke saath 
ham ne ik umr basar kī hai ġham-e-yār ke saath 'mīr' do din na jiye hijr ke āzār ke saath 
ab to ham ghar se nikalte haiñ to rakh dete haiñ taaq par izzat-e-sādāt bhī dastār ke saath 
is qadar ḳhauf hai ab shahr kī galiyoñ meñ ki log chaap sunte haiñ to lag jaate haiñ dīvār ke saath 
ek to ḳhvāb liye phirte ho galiyoñ galiyoñ us pe takrār bhī karte ho ḳharīdār ke saath 
shahr kā shahr hī nāseh ho to kyā kījiyegā varna ham rind to bhiḌ jaate haiñ do-chār ke saath 
ham ko us shahr meñ ta.amīr kā saudā hai jahāñ log me.amār ko chun dete haiñ dīvār ke saath 
jo sharaf ham ko milā kūcha-e-jānāñ se 'farāz' sū-e-maqtal bhī ga.e haiñ usī pindār ke saath 
wahshaten baDhti gain hijr ke aazar ke sath ab to hum baat bhi karte nahin gham-KHwar ke sath 
hum ne ek umr basar ki hai gham-e-yar ke sath 'mir' do din na jiye hijr ke aazar ke sath 
ab to hum ghar se nikalte hain to rakh dete hain taq par izzat-e-sadat bhi dastar ke sath 
is qadar KHauf hai ab shahr ki galiyon mein ki log chap sunte hain to lag jate hain diwar ke sath 
ek to KHwab liye phirte ho galiyon galiyon us pe takrar bhi karte ho KHaridar ke sath 
shahr ka shahr hi naseh ho to kya kijiyega warna hum rind to bhiD jate hain do-chaar ke sath 
hum ko us shahr mein tamir ka sauda hai jahan log meamar ko chun dete hain diwar ke sath 
jo sharaf hum ko mila kucha-e-jaanan se 'faraaz' su-e-maqtal bhi gae hain usi pindar ke sath

tamāshā-e-dair-o-haram dekhte haiñ tujhe har bahāne se ham dekhte haiñ 
hamārī taraf ab vo kam dekhte haiñ vo nazreñ nahīñ jin ko ham dekhte haiñ 
zamāne ke kyā kyā sitam dekhte haiñ hamīñ jānte haiñ jo ham dekhte haiñ 
phire but-kade se to ai ahl-e-ka.aba phir aa kar tumhāre qadam dekhte haiñ 
hameñ chashm-e-bīnā dikhātī hai sab kuchh vo andhe haiñ jo jām-e-jam dekhte haiñ 
na īmā-e-ḳhvāhish na iz.hār-e-matlab mire muñh ko ahl-e-karam dekhte haiñ 
kabhī toḌte haiñ vo ḳhanjar ko apne kabhī nabz-e-bismil meñ dam dekhte haiñ 
ġhanīmat hai chashm-e-taġhāful bhī un kī bahut dekhte haiñ jo kam dekhte haiñ 
ġharaz kyā ki samjheñ mire ḳhat kā mazmūñ vo unvān o tarz-e-raqam dekhte haiñ 
salāmat rahe dil burā hai ki achchhā hazāroñ meñ ye ek dam dekhte haiñ 
rahā kaun mahfil meñ ab aane vaalā vo chāroñ taraf dam-ba-dam dekhte haiñ 
udhar sharm haa.il idhar ḳhauf maane na vo dekhte haiñ na ham dekhte haiñ 
unheñ kyuuñ na ho dilrubā.ī se nafrat ki har dil meñ vo ġham alam dekhte haiñ 
nigahbāñ se bhī kyā huī bad-gumānī ab us ko tire saath kam dekhte haiñ 
hameñ 'dāġh' kyā kam hai ye sarfarāzī ki shāh-e-dakan ke qadam dekhte haiñ 
tamasha-e-dair-o-haram dekhte hain tujhe har bahane se hum dekhte hain 
hamari taraf ab wo kam dekhte hain wo nazren nahin jin ko hum dekhte hain 
zamane ke kya kya sitam dekhte hain hamin jaante hain jo hum dekhte hain 
phire but-kade se to ai ahl-e-kaba phir aa kar tumhaare qadam dekhte hain 
hamein chashm-e-bina dikhati hai sab kuchh wo andhe hain jo jam-e-jam dekhte hain 
na ima-e-KHwahish na izhaar-e-matlab mere munh ko ahl-e-karam dekhte hain 
kabhi toDte hain wo KHanjar ko apne kabhi nabz-e-bismil mein dam dekhte hain 
ghanimat hai chashm-e-taghaful bhi un ki bahut dekhte hain jo kam dekhte hain 
gharaz kya ki samjhen mere KHat ka mazmun wo unwan o tarz-e-raqam dekhte hain 
salamat rahe dil bura hai ki achchha hazaron mein ye ek dam dekhte hain 
raha kaun mahfil mein ab aane wala wo chaaron taraf dam-ba-dam dekhte hain 
udhar sharm hail idhar KHauf mane na wo dekhte hain na hum dekhte hain 
unhen kyun na ho dilrubai se nafrat ki har dil mein wo gham alam dekhte hain 
nigahban se bhi kya hui bad-gumani ab us ko tere sath kam dekhte hain 
hamein 'dagh' kya kam hai ye sarfaraazi ki shah-e-dakan ke qadam dekhte hain

aaj yuuñ mauj-dar-mauj ġham tham gayā is tarah ġham-zadoñ ko qarār aa gayā jaise ḳhush-bū-e-zulf-e-bahār aa ga.ī jaise paiġhām-e-dīdār-e-yār aa gayā 
jis kī dīd-o-talab vahm samjhe the ham rū-ba-rū phir sar-e-rahguzār aa gayā sub.h-e-fardā ko phir dil tarasne lagā umr-e-rafta tirā e'tibār aa gayā 
rut badalne lagī rañg-e-dil dekhnā rañg-e-gulshan se ab haal khultā nahīñ zaḳhm chhalkā koī yā koī gul khilā ashk umDe ki abr-e-bahār aa gayā 
ḳhūn-e-ushshāq se jaam bharne lage dil sulagne lage daaġh jalne lage mahfil-e-dard phir rañg par aa ga.ī phir shab-e-ārzū par nikhār aa gayā 
sarfaroshī ke andāz badle ga.e dāvat-e-qatl par maqtal-e-shahr meñ Daal kar koī gardan meñ tauq aa gayā laad kar koī kāñdhe pe daar aa gayā 
'faiz' kyā jāniye yaar kis aas par muntazir haiñ ki lā.egā koī ḳhabar mai-kashoñ par huā mohtasib mehrbāñ dil-figāroñ pe qātil ko pyaar aa gayā 
aaj yun mauj-dar-mauj gham tham gaya is tarah gham-zadon ko qarar aa gaya jaise KHush-bu-e-zulf-e-bahaar aa gai jaise paigham-e-didar-e-yar aa gaya 
jis ki did-o-talab wahm samjhe the hum ru-ba-ru phir sar-e-rahguzar aa gaya subh-e-farda ko phir dil tarasne laga umr-e-rafta tera e'tibar aa gaya 
rut badalne lagi rang-e-dil dekhna rang-e-gulshan se ab haal khulta nahin zaKHm chhalka koi ya koi gul khila ashk umDe ki abr-e-bahaar aa gaya 
KHun-e-ushshaq se jam bharne lage dil sulagne lage dagh jalne lage mahfil-e-dard phir rang par aa gai phir shab-e-arzu par nikhaar aa gaya 
sarfaroshi ke andaz badle gae dawat-e-qatl par maqtal-e-shahr mein Dal kar koi gardan mein tauq aa gaya lad kar koi kandhe pe dar aa gaya 
'faiz' kya jaaniye yar kis aas par muntazir hain ki laega koi KHabar mai-kashon par hua mohtasib mehrban dil-figaron pe qatil ko pyar aa gaya

ḳhair auroñ ne bhī chāhā to hai tujh sā honā ye alag baat ki mumkin nahīñ aisā honā 
dekhtā aur na Thahartā to koī baat bhī thī jis ne dekhā hī nahīñ us se ḳhafā kyā honā 
tujh se duurī meñ bhī ḳhush rahtā huuñ pahle kī tarah bas kisī vaqt burā lagtā hai tanhā honā 
yuuñ merī yaad meñ mahfūz haiñ tere ḳhad-o-ḳhāl jis tarah dil meñ kisī shai kī tamannā honā 
zindagī marka-e-rūh-o-badan hai 'mushtāq' ishq ke saath zarūrī hai havas kā honā 
KHair auron ne bhi chaha to hai tujh sa hona ye alag baat ki mumkin nahin aisa hona 
dekhta aur na Thaharta to koi baat bhi thi jis ne dekha hi nahin us se KHafa kya hona 
tujh se duri mein bhi KHush rahta hun pahle ki tarah bas kisi waqt bura lagta hai tanha hona 
yun meri yaad mein mahfuz hain tere KHad-o-KHal jis tarah dil mein kisi shai ki tamanna hona 
zindagi marka-e-ruh-o-badan hai 'mushtaq' ishq ke sath zaruri hai hawas ka hona

ajab junūn-e-masāfat meñ ghar se niklā thā ḳhabar nahīñ hai ki sūraj kidhar se niklā thā 
ye kaun phir se unhīñ rāstoñ meñ chhoḌ gayā abhī abhī to azāb-e-safar se niklā thā 
ye tiir dil meñ magar be-sabab nahīñ utrā koī to harf lab-e-chāragar se niklā thā 
ye ab jo aag banā shahr shahr phailā hai yahī dhuāñ mire dīvār-o-dar se niklā thā 
maiñ raat TuuT ke royā to chain se soyā ki dil kā zahr mirī chashm-e-tar se niklā thā 
ye ab jo sar haiñ ḳhamīda kulāh kī ḳhātir ye aib bhī to ham ahl-e-hunar se niklā thā 
vo qais ab jise majnūñ pukārte haiñ 'farāz' tirī tarah koī dīvāna ghar se niklā thā 
ajab junun-e-masafat mein ghar se nikla tha KHabar nahin hai ki suraj kidhar se nikla tha 
ye kaun phir se unhin raston mein chhoD gaya abhi abhi to azab-e-safar se nikla tha 
ye tir dil mein magar be-sabab nahin utra koi to harf lab-e-chaaragar se nikla tha 
ye ab jo aag bana shahr shahr phaila hai yahi dhuan mere diwar-o-dar se nikla tha 
main raat TuT ke roya to chain se soya ki dil ka zahr meri chashm-e-tar se nikla tha 
ye ab jo sar hain KHamida kulah ki KHatir ye aib bhi to hum ahl-e-hunar se nikla tha 
wo qais ab jise majnun pukarte hain 'faraaz' teri tarah koi diwana ghar se nikla tha

kisī kī yaad meñ palkeñ zarā bhigo lete udaas raat kī tanhā.iyoñ meñ ro lete 
dukhoñ kā bojh akele nahīñ sañbhaltā hai kahīñ vo miltā to us se lipaT ke ro lete 
agar safar meñ hamārā bhī ham-safar hotā baḌī ḳhushī se unhī pattharoñ pe so lete 
tumhārī raah meñ shāḳhoñ pe phuul suukh ga.e kabhī havā kī tarah is taraf bhī ho lete 
ye kyā ki roz vahī chāñdnī kā bistar ho kabhī to dhuup kī chādar bichhā ke so lete 
kisi ki yaad mein palken zara bhigo lete udas raat ki tanhaiyon mein ro lete 
dukhon ka bojh akele nahin sanbhalta hai kahin wo milta to us se lipaT ke ro lete 
agar safar mein hamara bhi ham-safar hota baDi KHushi se unhi pattharon pe so lete 
tumhaari rah mein shaKHon pe phul sukh gae kabhi hawa ki tarah is taraf bhi ho lete 
ye kya ki roz wahi chandni ka bistar ho kabhi to dhup ki chadar bichha ke so lete

ai vasl kuchh yahāñ na huā kuchh nahīñ huā us jism kī maiñ jaañ na huā kuchh nahīñ huā 
tū aaj mere ghar meñ jo mehmāñ hai iid hai tū ghar kā mezbāñ na huā kuchh nahīñ huā 
kholī to hai zabān magar is kī kyā bisāt maiñ zahr kī dukāñ na huā kuchh nahīñ huā 
kyā ek kārobār thā vo rabt-e-jism-o-jāñ koī bhī rā.egāñ na huā kuchh nahīñ huā 
kitnā jalā huā huuñ bas ab kyā batā.ūñ maiñ aalam dhuāñ dhuāñ na huā kuchh nahīñ huā 
dekhā thā jab ki pahle-pahal us ne ā.īna us vaqt maiñ vahāñ na huā kuchh nahīñ huā 
vo ik jamāl jalvā-fishāñ hai zamīñ zamīñ maiñ tā-ba-āsmāñ na huā kuchh nahīñ huā 
maiñ ne bas ik nigāh meñ tai kar liyā tujhe tū rañg-e-bekarāñ na huā kuchh nahīñ huā 
gum ho ke jaan tū mirī āġhosh-e-zāt meñ be-nām-o-be-nishāñ na huā kuchh nahīñ huā 
har koī darmiyān hai ai mājrā-farosh maiñ apne darmiyāñ na huā kuchh nahīñ huā 
ai wasl kuchh yahan na hua kuchh nahin hua us jism ki main jaan na hua kuchh nahin hua 
tu aaj mere ghar mein jo mehman hai id hai tu ghar ka mezban na hua kuchh nahin hua 
kholi to hai zaban magar is ki kya bisat main zahr ki dukan na hua kuchh nahin hua 
kya ek karobar tha wo rabt-e-jism-o-jaan koi bhi raegan na hua kuchh nahin hua 
kitna jala hua hun bas ab kya bataun main aalam dhuan dhuan na hua kuchh nahin hua 
dekha tha jab ki pahle-pahal us ne aaina us waqt main wahan na hua kuchh nahin hua 
wo ek jamal jalwa-fishan hai zamin zamin main ta-ba-asman na hua kuchh nahin hua 
main ne bas ek nigah mein tai kar liya tujhe tu rang-e-bekaran na hua kuchh nahin hua 
gum ho ke jaan tu meri aaghosh-e-zat mein be-nam-o-be-nishan na hua kuchh nahin hua 
har koi darmiyan hai ai majra-farosh main apne darmiyan na hua kuchh nahin hua

nigāh-e-yār jise āshnā-e-rāz kare vo apnī ḳhūbi-e-qismat pe kyuuñ na naaz kare 
diloñ ko fikr-e-do-ālam se kar diyā āzād tire junūñ kā ḳhudā silsila darāz kare 
ḳhirad kā naam junūñ paḌ gayā junūñ kā ḳhirad jo chāhe aap kā husn-e-karishma-sāz kare 
tire sitam se maiñ ḳhush huuñ ki ġhāliban yuuñ bhī mujhe vo shāmil-e-arbāb-e-imtiyāz kare 
ġham-e-jahāñ se jise ho farāġh kī ḳhvāhish vo un ke dard-e-mohabbat se sāz-bāz kare 
ummīd-vār haiñ har samt āshiqoñ ke giroh tirī nigāh ko allāh dil-navāz kare 
tire karam kā sazā-vār to nahīñ 'hasrat' ab aage terī ḳhushī hai jo sarfarāz kare 
nigah-e-yar jise aashna-e-raaz kare wo apni KHubi-e-qismat pe kyun na naz kare 
dilon ko fikr-e-do-alam se kar diya aazad tere junun ka KHuda silsila daraaz kare 
KHirad ka nam junun paD gaya junun ka KHirad jo chahe aap ka husn-e-karishma-saz kare 
tere sitam se main KHush hun ki ghaaliban yun bhi mujhe wo shamil-e-arbab-e-imtiyaz kare 
gham-e-jahan se jise ho faragh ki KHwahish wo un ke dard-e-mohabbat se saz-baz kare 
ummid-war hain har samt aashiqon ke giroh teri nigah ko allah dil-nawaz kare 
tere karam ka saza-war to nahin 'hasrat' ab aage teri KHushi hai jo sarfaraaz kare

koī phuul dhuup kī pattiyoñ meñ hare ribbon se bañdhā huā vo ġhazal kā lahja nayā nayā na kahā huā na sunā huā 
jise le ga.ī hai abhī havā vo varaq thā dil kī kitāb kā kahīñ āñsuoñ se miTā huā kahīñ āñsuoñ se likhā huā 
ka.ī miil ret ko kaaT kar koī mauj phuul khilā ga.ī koī peḌ pyaas se mar rahā hai nadī ke paas khaḌā huā 
vahī ḳhat ki jis pe jagah jagah do mahakte hoñToñ ke chāñd the kisī bhūle-bisre se taaq par tah-e-gard hogā dabā huā 
mujhe hādsoñ ne sajā sajā ke bahut hasīn banā diyā mirā dil bhī jaise dulhan kā haath ho mehñdiyoñ se rachā huā 
vahī shahr hai vahī rāste vahī ghar hai aur vahī lawn bhī magar is darīche se pūchhnā vo daraḳht anaar kā kyā huā 
mire saath jugnū hai ham-safar magar is sharar kī bisāt kyā ye charāġh koī charāġh hai na jalā huā na bujhā huā 
koi phul dhup ki pattiyon mein hare ribbon se bandha hua wo ghazal ka lahja naya naya na kaha hua na suna hua 
jise le gai hai abhi hawa wo waraq tha dil ki kitab ka kahin aansuon se miTa hua kahin aansuon se likha hua 
kai mil ret ko kaT kar koi mauj phul khila gai koi peD pyas se mar raha hai nadi ke pas khaDa hua 
wahi KHat ki jis pe jagah jagah do mahakte honTon ke chand the kisi bhule-bisre se taq par tah-e-gard hoga daba hua 
mujhe hadson ne saja saja ke bahut hasin bana diya mera dil bhi jaise dulhan ka hath ho mehndiyon se racha hua 
wahi shahr hai wahi raste wahi ghar hai aur wahi lawn bhi magar is dariche se puchhna wo daraKHt anar ka kya hua 
mere sath jugnu hai ham-safar magar is sharar ki bisat kya ye charagh koi charagh hai na jala hua na bujha hua

jaane kahāñ gayā hai vo vo jo abhī yahāñ thā vo jo abhī yahāñ thā vo kaun thā kahāñ thā 
tā-lamha-e-guzishtā ye jism aur saa.e zinda the rā.egāñ meñ jo kuchh thā rā.egāñ thā 
ab jis kī diid kā hai saudā hamāre sar meñ vo apnī hī nazar meñ apnā hī ik samāñ thā 
kyā kyā na ḳhuun thūkā maiñ us galī meñ yaaro sach jānñā vahāñ to jo fan thā rā.egāñ thā 
ye vaar kar gayā hai pahlū se kaun mujh par thā maiñ hī daa.eñ baa.eñ aur maiñ hī darmiyāñ thā 
us shahr kī hifāzat karnī thī ham ko jis meñ āñdhī kī thiiñ fasīleñ aur gard kā makāñ thā 
thī ik ajab fazā sī imkān-e-ḳhāl-o-ḳhad kī thā ik ajab musavvir aur vo mirā gumāñ thā 
umreñ guzar ga.ī thiiñ ham ko yaqīñ se bichhḌe aur lamha ik gumāñ kā sadiyoñ meñ be-amāñ thā 
jab Dūbtā chalā maiñ tārīkiyoñ kī tah meñ tah meñ thā ik darīcha aur us meñ āsmāñ thā 
jaane kahan gaya hai wo wo jo abhi yahan tha wo jo abhi yahan tha wo kaun tha kahan tha 
ta-lamha-e-guzishta ye jism aur sae zinda the raegan mein jo kuchh tha raegan tha 
ab jis ki did ka hai sauda hamare sar mein wo apni hi nazar mein apna hi ek saman tha 
kya kya na KHun thuka main us gali mein yaro sach jaanna wahan to jo fan tha raegan tha 
ye war kar gaya hai pahlu se kaun mujh par tha main hi daen baen aur main hi darmiyan tha 
us shahr ki hifazat karni thi hum ko jis mein aandhi ki thin fasilen aur gard ka makan tha 
thi ek ajab faza si imkan-e-KHal-o-KHad ki tha ek ajab musawwir aur wo mera guman tha 
umren guzar gai thin hum ko yaqin se bichhDe aur lamha ek guman ka sadiyon mein be-aman tha 
jab Dubta chala main tarikiyon ki tah mein tah mein tha ek daricha aur us mein aasman tha

ab vo galiyāñ vo makāñ yaad nahīñ kaun rahtā thā kahāñ yaad nahīñ 
jalva-e-husn-e-azal the vo dayār jin ke ab nām-o-nishāñ yaad nahīñ 
koī ujlā sā bhalā sā ghar thā kis ko dekhā thā vahāñ yaad nahīñ 
yaad hai zīna-e-pechāñ us kā dar-o-dīvār-e-makāñ yaad nahīñ 
yaad hai zamzama-e-sāz-e-bahār shor-e-āvāz-e-ḳhizāñ yaad nahīñ 
ab wo galiyan wo makan yaad nahin kaun rahta tha kahan yaad nahin 
jalwa-e-husn-e-azal the wo dayar jin ke ab nam-o-nishan yaad nahin 
koi ujla sa bhala sa ghar tha kis ko dekha tha wahan yaad nahin 
yaad hai zina-e-pechan us ka dar-o-diwar-e-makan yaad nahin 
yaad hai zamzama-e-saz-e-bahaar shor-e-awaz-e-KHizan yaad nahin

band bāhar se mirī zaat kā dar hai mujh meñ maiñ nahīñ ḳhud meñ ye ik aam ḳhabar hai mujh meñ 
ik ajab āmad-o-shud hai ki na maazī hai na haal 'jaun' barpā ka.ī nasloñ kā safar hai mujh meñ 
hai mirī umr jo hairān tamāshā.ī hai aur ik lamha hai jo zer-o-zabar hai mujh meñ 
kyā tarastā huuñ ki bāhar ke kisī kaam aa.e vo ik amboh ki bas ḳhāk-basar hai mujh meñ 
Dūbne vāloñ ke dariyā mujhe pāyāb mile us meñ ab Duub rahā huuñ jo bhañvar hai mujh meñ 
dar-o-dīvār to bāhar ke haiñ Dhāne vaale chāhe rahtā nahīñ maiñ par mirā ghar hai mujh meñ 
maiñ jo paikār meñ andar kī huuñ be-teġh-o-zirah āḳhirash kaun hai jo sīna-sipar hai mujh meñ 
ma.arka garm hai be-taur sā koī har-dam na koī teġh salāmat na sipar hai mujh meñ 
zaḳhm-hā-zaḳhm huuñ aur koī nahīñ ḳhuuñ kā nishāñ kaun hai vo jo mire ḳhuun meñ tar hai mujh meñ 
band bahar se meri zat ka dar hai mujh mein main nahin KHud mein ye ek aam KHabar hai mujh mein 
ek ajab aamad-o-shud hai ki na mazi hai na haal 'jaun' barpa kai naslon ka safar hai mujh mein 
hai meri umr jo hairan tamashai hai aur ek lamha hai jo zer-o-zabar hai mujh mein 
kya tarasta hun ki bahar ke kisi kaam aae wo ek amboh ki bas KHak-basar hai mujh mein 
Dubne walon ke dariya mujhe payab mile us mein ab Dub raha hun jo bhanwar hai mujh mein 
dar-o-diwar to bahar ke hain Dhane wale chahe rahta nahin main par mera ghar hai mujh mein 
main jo paikar mein andar ki hun be-tegh-o-zirah aaKHirash kaun hai jo sina-sipar hai mujh mein 
marka garm hai be-taur sa koi har-dam na koi tegh salamat na sipar hai mujh mein 
zaKHm-ha-zaKHm hun aur koi nahin KHun ka nishan kaun hai wo jo mere KHun mein tar hai mujh mein

sau ḳhulūs bātoñ meñ sab karam ḳhayāloñ meñ bas zarā vafā kam hai tere shahr vāloñ meñ 
pahlī baar nazroñ ne chāñd bolte dekhā ham javāb kyā dete kho ga.e savāloñ meñ 
raat terī yādoñ ne dil ko is tarah chheḌā jaise koī chuTkī le narm narm gāloñ meñ 
yuuñ kisī kī āñkhoñ meñ sub.h tak abhī the ham jis tarah rahe shabnam phuul ke piyāloñ meñ 
merī aañkh ke taare ab na dekh pāoge raat ke musāfir the kho ga.e ujāloñ meñ 
jaise aadhī shab ke baa'd chāñd niiñd meñ chauñke vo gulāb kī jumbish un siyāh bāloñ meñ 
sau KHulus baaton mein sab karam KHayalon mein bas zara wafa kam hai tere shahr walon mein 
pahli bar nazron ne chand bolte dekha hum jawab kya dete kho gae sawalon mein 
raat teri yaadon ne dil ko is tarah chheDa jaise koi chuTki le narm narm galon mein 
yun kisi ki aankhon mein subh tak abhi the hum jis tarah rahe shabnam phul ke piyalon mein 
meri aankh ke tare ab na dekh paoge raat ke musafir the kho gae ujalon mein 
jaise aadhi shab ke ba'd chand nind mein chaunke wo gulab ki jumbish un siyah baalon mein

chāñd nikle kisī jānib tirī zebā.ī kā rañg badle kisī sūrat shab-e-tanhā.ī kā 
daulat-e-lab se phir ai ḳhusrav-e-shīrīñ-dahanāñ aaj arzāñ ho koī harf shanāsā.ī kā 
garmi-e-rashk se har anjuman-e-gul-badanāñ tazkira chheḌe tirī pairahan-ārā.ī kā 
sehn-e-gulshan meñ kabhī ai shah-e-shamshād-qadāñ phir nazar aa.e salīqa tirī ra.anā.ī kā 
ek baar aur masīhā-e-dil-e-dil-zadagāñ koī va.ada koī iqrār masīhā.ī kā 
diida o dil ko sambhālo ki sar-e-shām-e-firāq sāz-o-sāmān baham pahuñchā hai rusvā.ī kā 
chand nikle kisi jaanib teri zebai ka rang badle kisi surat shab-e-tanhai ka 
daulat-e-lab se phir ai KHusraw-e-shirin-dahanan aaj arzan ho koi harf shanasai ka 
garmi-e-rashk se har anjuman-e-gul-badanan tazkira chheDe teri pairahan-arai ka 
sehn-e-gulshan mein kabhi ai shah-e-shamshad-qadan phir nazar aae saliqa teri ranai ka 
ek bar aur masiha-e-dil-e-dil-zadagan koi wada koi iqrar masihai ka 
dida o dil ko sambhaalo ki sar-e-sham-e-firaq saz-o-saman baham pahuncha hai ruswai ka

tujh meñ paḌā huā huuñ harakat nahīñ hai mujh meñ hālat na pūchhiyo tū hālat nahīñ hai mujh meñ 
ab to nazar meñ aa jā bāñhoñ ke ghar meñ aa jā ai jaan terī koī sūrat nahīñ hai mujh meñ 
ai rañg rañg meñ aa āġhosh-e-tañg meñ aa bāteñ hī rañg kī haiñ rañgat nahīñ hai mujh meñ 
apne meñ hī kisī kī ho rū-ba-rūī mujh ko huuñ ḳhud se rū-ba-rū huuñ himmat nahīñ hai mujh meñ 
ab to simaT ke aa jā aur ruuh meñ samā jā vaise kisī kī pyāre vus.at nahīñ hai mujh meñ 
shīshe ke is taraf se maiñ sab ko tak rahā huuñ marne kī bhī kisī ko fursat nahīñ hai mujh meñ 
tum mujh ko apne ram meñ le jaao saath apne apne se ai ġhazālo vahshat nahīñ hai mujh meñ 
tujh mein paDa hua hun harakat nahin hai mujh mein haalat na puchhiyo tu haalat nahin hai mujh mein 
ab to nazar mein aa ja banhon ke ghar mein aa ja ai jaan teri koi surat nahin hai mujh mein 
ai rang rang mein aa aaghosh-e-tang mein aa baaten hi rang ki hain rangat nahin hai mujh mein 
apne mein hi kisi ki ho ru-ba-rui mujh ko hun KHud se ru-ba-ru hun himmat nahin hai mujh mein 
ab to simaT ke aa ja aur ruh mein sama ja waise kisi ki pyare wusat nahin hai mujh mein 
shishe ke is taraf se main sab ko tak raha hun marne ki bhi kisi ko fursat nahin hai mujh mein 
tum mujh ko apne ram mein le jao sath apne apne se ai ghazalo wahshat nahin hai mujh mein

kyuuñ jal gayā na tāb-e-ruḳh-e-yār dekh kar jaltā huuñ apnī tāqat-e-dīdār dekh kar 
ātish-parast kahte haiñ ahl-e-jahāñ mujhe sargarm-e-nāla-hā-e-sharar-bār dekh kar 
kyā ābrū-e-ishq jahāñ aam ho jafā ruktā huuñ tum ko be-sabab āzār dekh kar 
aatā hai mere qatl ko par josh-e-rashk se martā huuñ us ke haath meñ talvār dekh kar 
sābit huā hai gardan-e-mīnā pe ḳhūn-e-ḳhalq larze hai mauj-e-mai tirī raftār dekh kar 
vā-hasratā ki yaar ne khīñchā sitam se haath ham ko harīs-e-lazzat-e-āzār dekh kar 
bik jaate haiñ ham aap matā-e-suḳhan ke saath lekin ayār-e-taba.a-e-ḳharīdār dekh kar 
zunnār bāñdh sub.ha-e-sad-dāna toḌ Daal rah-rau chale hai raah ko hamvār dekh kar 
in ābloñ se paañv ke ghabrā gayā thā maiñ jī ḳhush huā hai raah ko pur-ḳhār dekh kar 
kyā bad-gumāñ hai mujh se ki ā.īne meñ mire tuutī kā aks samjhe hai zañgār dekh kar 
girnī thī ham pe barq-e-tajallī na tuur par dete haiñ baada zarf-e-qadah-ḳhvār dekh kar 
sar phoḌnā vo 'ġhālib'-e-shorīda haal kā yaad aa gayā mujhe tirī dīvār dekh kar 
kyun jal gaya na tab-e-ruKH-e-yar dekh kar jalta hun apni taqat-e-didar dekh kar 
aatish-parast kahte hain ahl-e-jahan mujhe sargarm-e-nala-ha-e-sharar-bar dekh kar 
kya aabru-e-ishq jahan aam ho jafa rukta hun tum ko be-sabab aazar dekh kar 
aata hai mere qatl ko par josh-e-rashk se marta hun us ke hath mein talwar dekh kar 
sabit hua hai gardan-e-mina pe KHun-e-KHalq larze hai mauj-e-mai teri raftar dekh kar 
wa-hasrata ki yar ne khincha sitam se hath hum ko haris-e-lazzat-e-azar dekh kar 
bik jate hain hum aap mata-e-suKHan ke sath lekin ayar-e-taba-e-KHaridar dekh kar 
zunnar bandh subha-e-sad-dana toD Dal rah-rau chale hai rah ko hamwar dekh kar 
in aablon se panw ke ghabra gaya tha main ji KHush hua hai rah ko pur-KHar dekh kar 
kya bad-guman hai mujh se ki aaine mein mere tuti ka aks samjhe hai zangar dekh kar 
girni thi hum pe barq-e-tajalli na tur par dete hain baada zarf-e-qadah-KHwar dekh kar 
sar phoDna wo 'ghaalib'-e-shorida haal ka yaad aa gaya mujhe teri diwar dekh kar

ab vahī harf-e-junūñ sab kī zabāñ Thahrī hai jo bhī chal niklī hai vo baat kahāñ Thahrī hai 
aaj tak shaiḳh ke ikrām meñ jo shai thī harām ab vahī dushman-e-dīñ rāhat-e-jāñ Thahrī hai 
hai ḳhabar garm ki phirtā hai gurezāñ nāseh guftugū aaj sar-e-kū-e-butāñ Thahrī hai 
hai vahī āriz-e-lailā vahī shīrīñ kā dahan nigah-e-shauq ghaḌī bhar ko jahāñ Thahrī hai 
vasl kī shab thī to kis darja subuk guzrī thī hijr kī shab hai to kyā saḳht girāñ Thahrī hai 
bikhrī ik baar to haath aa.ī hai kab mauj-e-shamīm dil se niklī hai to kab lab pe fuġhāñ Thahrī hai 
dast-e-sayyād bhī aajiz hai kaf-e-gul-chīñ bhī bū-e-gul Thahrī na bulbul kī zabāñ Thahrī hai 
aate aate yūñhī dam bhar ko rukī hogī bahār jaate jaate yūñhī pal bhar ko ḳhizāñ Thahrī hai 
ham ne jo tarz-e-fuġhāñ kī hai qafas meñ ījād 'faiz' gulshan meñ vahī tarz-e-bayāñ Thahrī hai 
ab wahi harf-e-junun sab ki zaban Thahri hai jo bhi chal nikli hai wo baat kahan Thahri hai 
aaj tak shaiKH ke ikram mein jo shai thi haram ab wahi dushman-e-din rahat-e-jaan Thahri hai 
hai KHabar garm ki phirta hai gurezan naseh guftugu aaj sar-e-ku-e-butan Thahri hai 
hai wahi aariz-e-laila wahi shirin ka dahan nigah-e-shauq ghaDi bhar ko jahan Thahri hai 
wasl ki shab thi to kis darja subuk guzri thi hijr ki shab hai to kya saKHt giran Thahri hai 
bikhri ek bar to hath aai hai kab mauj-e-shamim dil se nikli hai to kab lab pe fughan Thahri hai 
dast-e-sayyaad bhi aajiz hai kaf-e-gul-chin bhi bu-e-gul Thahri na bulbul ki zaban Thahri hai 
aate aate yunhi dam bhar ko ruki hogi bahaar jate jate yunhi pal bhar ko KHizan Thahri hai 
hum ne jo tarz-e-fughan ki hai qafas mein ijad 'faiz' gulshan mein wahi tarz-e-bayan Thahri hai

dil gayā tum ne liyā ham kyā kareñ jaane vaalī chiiz kā ġham kyā kareñ 
ham ne mar kar hijr meñ paa.ī shifā aise achchhoñ kā vo mātam kyā kareñ 
apne hī ġham se nahīñ miltī najāt is binā par fikr-e-ālam kyā kareñ 
ek sāġhar par hai apnī zindagī rafta rafta is se bhī kam kyā kareñ 
kar chuke sab apnī apnī hikmateñ dam nikaltā ho to hamdam kyā kareñ 
dil ne sīkhā sheva-e-begānagī aise nā-mahram ko mahram kyā kareñ 
ma.arka hai aaj husn o ishq kā dekhiye vo kyā kareñ ham kyā kareñ 
ā.īna hai aur vo haiñ dekhiye faisla donoñ ye bāham kyā kareñ 
aadmī honā bahut dushvār hai phir farishte hirs-e-ādam kyā kareñ 
tund-ḳhū hai kab sune vo dil kī baat aur bhī barham ko barham kyā kareñ 
Hyderabad aur lañgar yaad hai ab ke dillī meñ moharram kyā kareñ 
kahte haiñ ahl-e-sifārish mujh se 'dāġh' terī qismat hai burī ham kyā kareñ 
dil gaya tum ne liya hum kya karen jaane wali chiz ka gham kya karen 
hum ne mar kar hijr mein pai shifa aise achchhon ka wo matam kya karen 
apne hi gham se nahin milti najat is bina par fikr-e-alam kya karen 
ek saghar par hai apni zindagi rafta rafta is se bhi kam kya karen 
kar chuke sab apni apni hikmaten dam nikalta ho to hamdam kya karen 
dil ne sikha shewa-e-beganagi aise na-mahram ko mahram kya karen 
marka hai aaj husn o ishq ka dekhiye wo kya karen hum kya karen 
aaina hai aur wo hain dekhiye faisla donon ye baham kya karen 
aadmi hona bahut dushwar hai phir farishte hirs-e-adam kya karen 
tund-KHu hai kab sune wo dil ki baat aur bhi barham ko barham kya karen 
Hyderabad aur langar yaad hai ab ke dilli mein moharram kya karen 
kahte hain ahl-e-sifarish mujh se 'dagh' teri qismat hai buri hum kya karen

garmī-e-shauq-e-nazārā kā asar to dekho gul khile jaate haiñ vo sāya-e-tar to dekho 
aise nādāñ bhī na the jaañ se guzarne vaale nāseho pand-garo rāhguzar to dekho 
vo to vo hai tumheñ ho jā.egī ulfat mujh se ik nazar tum mirā mahbūb-e-nazar to dekho 
vo jo ab chaak garebāñ bhī nahīñ karte haiñ dekhne vaalo kabhī un kā jigar to dekho 
dāman-e-dard ko gulzār banā rakkhā hai aao ik din dil-e-pur-ḳhūñ kā hunar to dekho 
sub.h kī tarah jhamaktā hai shab-e-ġham kā ufuq 'faiz' tābindagī-e-dīda-e-tar to dekho 
garmi-e-shauq-e-nazara ka asar to dekho gul khile jate hain wo saya-e-tar to dekho 
aise nadan bhi na the jaan se guzarne wale naseho pand-garo rahguzar to dekho 
wo to wo hai tumhein ho jaegi ulfat mujh se ek nazar tum mera mahbub-e-nazar to dekho 
wo jo ab chaak gareban bhi nahin karte hain dekhne walo kabhi un ka jigar to dekho 
daman-e-dard ko gulzar bana rakkha hai aao ek din dil-e-pur-KHun ka hunar to dekho 
subh ki tarah jhamakta hai shab-e-gham ka ufuq 'faiz' tabindagi-e-dida-e-tar to dekho

ranj kī jab guftugū hone lagī aap se tum tum se tū hone lagī 
chāhiye paiġhām-bar donoñ taraf lutf kyā jab dū-ba-dū hone lagī 
merī rusvā.ī kī naubat aa ga.ī un kī shohrat kū-ba-kū hone lagī 
hai tirī tasvīr kitnī be-hijāb har kisī ke rū-ba-rū hone lagī 
ġhair ke hote bhalā ai shām-e-vasl kyuuñ hamāre rū-ba-rū hone lagī 
nā-ummīdī baḌh ga.ī hai is qadar aarzū kī aarzū hone lagī 
ab ke mil kar dekhiye kyā rañg ho phir hamārī justujū hone lagī 
'dāġh' itrā.e hue phirte haiñ aaj shāyad un kī aabrū hone lagī 
ranj ki jab guftugu hone lagi aap se tum tum se tu hone lagi 
chahiye paigham-bar donon taraf lutf kya jab du-ba-du hone lagi 
meri ruswai ki naubat aa gai un ki shohrat ku-ba-ku hone lagi 
hai teri taswir kitni be-hijab har kisi ke ru-ba-ru hone lagi 
ghair ke hote bhala ai sham-e-wasl kyun hamare ru-ba-ru hone lagi 
na-ummidi baDh gai hai is qadar aarzu ki aarzu hone lagi 
ab ke mil kar dekhiye kya rang ho phir hamari justuju hone lagi 
'dagh' itrae hue phirte hain aaj shayad un ki aabru hone lagi

jaan se ishq aur jahāñ se gurez dostoñ ne kiyā kahāñ se gurez 
ibtidā kī tere qasīde se ab ye mushkil karūñ kahāñ se gurez 
maiñ vahāñ huuñ jahāñ jahāñ tum ho tum karoge kahāñ kahāñ se gurez 
kar gayā mere tere qisse meñ dāstāñ-go yahāñ vahāñ se gurez 
jañg haarī na thī abhī ki 'farāz' kar ga.e dost darmiyāñ se gurez 
jaan se ishq aur jahan se gurez doston ne kiya kahan se gurez 
ibtida ki tere qaside se ab ye mushkil karun kahan se gurez 
main wahan hun jahan jahan tum ho tum karoge kahan kahan se gurez 
kar gaya mere tere qisse mein dastan-go yahan wahan se gurez 
jang haari na thi abhi ki 'faraaz' kar gae dost darmiyan se gurez

ye kahnā to nahīñ kaafī ki bas pyāre lage ham ko unheñ kaise batā.eñ ham ki vo kaise lage ham ko 
makīñ the yā kisī khoī huī jannat kī tasvīreñ makāñ is shahr ke bhūle hue sapne lage ham ko 
ham un ko soch meñ gum dekh kar vāpas chale aa.e vo apne dhyān meñ baiThe hue achchhe lage ham ko 
bahut shaffāf the jab tak ki masrūf-e-tamannā the magar is kār-e-duniyā meñ baḌe dhabbe lage ham ko 
jahāñ tanhā hue dil meñ bhañvar se paḌne lagte haiñ agarche muddateñ guzrīñ kināre se lage ham ko 
ye kahna to nahin kafi ki bas pyare lage hum ko unhen kaise bataen hum ki wo kaise lage hum ko 
makin the ya kisi khoi hui jannat ki taswiren makan is shahr ke bhule hue sapne lage hum ko 
hum un ko soch mein gum dekh kar wapas chale aae wo apne dhyan mein baiThe hue achchhe lage hum ko 
bahut shaffaf the jab tak ki masruf-e-tamanna the magar is kar-e-duniya mein baDe dhabbe lage hum ko 
jahan tanha hue dil mein bhanwar se paDne lagte hain agarche muddaten guzrin kinare se lage hum ko

gumāñ yahī hai ki dil ḳhud udhar ko jaatā hai so shak kā fā.eda us kī nazar ko jaatā hai 
hadeñ vafā kī bhī āḳhir havas se miltī haiñ ye rāsta bhī idhar se udhar ko jaatā hai 
ye dil kā dard to umroñ kā rog hai pyāre so jaa.e bhī to pahar do pahar ko jaatā hai 
ye haal hai ki ka.ī rāste haiñ pesh-e-nazar magar ḳhayāl tirī rah-guzar ko jaatā hai 
tū 'anvarī' hai na 'ġhālib' to phir ye kyuuñ hai 'farāz' har ek sail-e-balā tere ghar ko jaatā hai 
guman yahi hai ki dil KHud udhar ko jata hai so shak ka faeda us ki nazar ko jata hai 
haden wafa ki bhi aaKHir hawas se milti hain ye rasta bhi idhar se udhar ko jata hai 
ye dil ka dard to umron ka rog hai pyare so jae bhi to pahar do pahar ko jata hai 
ye haal hai ki kai raste hain pesh-e-nazar magar KHayal teri rah-guzar ko jata hai 
tu 'anwari' hai na 'ghaalib' to phir ye kyun hai 'faraaz' har ek sail-e-bala tere ghar ko jata hai

havā ke zor se pindār-e-bām-o-dar bhī gayā charāġh ko jo bachāte the un kā ghar bhī gayā 
pukārte rahe mahfūz kashtiyoñ vaale maiñ Dūbtā huā dariyā ke paar utar bhī gayā 
ab ehtiyāt kī dīvār kyā uThāte ho jo chor dil meñ chhupā thā vo kaam kar bhī gayā 
maiñ chup rahā ki isī meñ thī āfiyat jaañ kī koī to merī tarah thā jo daar par bhī gayā 
sulagte sochte vīrān mausamoñ kī tarah kaḌā thā ahd-e-javānī magar guzar bhī gayā 
jise bhulā na sakā us ko yaad kyā rakhtā jo naam lab pe rahā zehn se utar bhī gayā 
phaTī phaTī huī āñkhoñ se yuuñ na dekh mujhe tujhe talāsh hai jis shaḳhs kī vo mar bhī gayā 
magar falak ko adāvat usī ke ghar se thī jahāñ 'farāz' na thā sail-e-ġham udhar bhī gayā 
hawa ke zor se pindar-e-baam-o-dar bhi gaya charagh ko jo bachate the un ka ghar bhi gaya 
pukarte rahe mahfuz kashtiyon wale main Dubta hua dariya ke par utar bhi gaya 
ab ehtiyat ki diwar kya uThate ho jo chor dil mein chhupa tha wo kaam kar bhi gaya 
main chup raha ki isi mein thi aafiyat jaan ki koi to meri tarah tha jo dar par bhi gaya 
sulagte sochte viran mausamon ki tarah kaDa tha ahd-e-jawani magar guzar bhi gaya 
jise bhula na saka us ko yaad kya rakhta jo nam lab pe raha zehn se utar bhi gaya 
phaTi phaTi hui aankhon se yun na dekh mujhe tujhe talash hai jis shaKHs ki wo mar bhi gaya 
magar falak ko adawat usi ke ghar se thi jahan 'faraaz' na tha sail-e-gham udhar bhi gaya

dil munāfiq thā shab-e-hijr meñ soyā kaisā aur jab tujh se milā TuuT ke royā kaisā 
zindagī meñ bhī ġhazal hī kā qarīna rakkhā ḳhvāb-dar-ḳhvāb tire ġham ko piroyā kaisā 
ab to chehroñ pe bhī katboñ kā gumāñ hotā hai āñkheñ pathrā.ī huī haiñ lab-e-goyā kaisā 
dekh ab qurb kā mausam bhī na sarsabz lage hijr hī hijr marāsim meñ samoyā kaisā 
ek aañsū thā ki dariyā-e-nadāmat thā 'farāz' dil se bebāk shanāvar ko Duboyā kaisā 
dil munafiq tha shab-e-hijr mein soya kaisa aur jab tujh se mila TuT ke roya kaisa 
zindagi mein bhi ghazal hi ka qarina rakkha KHwab-dar-KHwab tere gham ko piroya kaisa 
ab to chehron pe bhi katbon ka guman hota hai aankhen pathrai hui hain lab-e-goya kaisa 
dekh ab qurb ka mausam bhi na sarsabz lage hijr hi hijr marasim mein samoya kaisa 
ek aansu tha ki dariya-e-nadamat tha 'faraaz' dil se bebak shanawar ko Duboya kaisa

kis shai pe yahāñ vaqt kā saaya nahīñ hotā ik ḳhvāb-e-mohabbat hai ki būḌhā nahīñ hotā 
vo vaqt bhī aatā hai jab āñkhoñ meñ hamārī phirtī haiñ vo shakleñ jinheñ dekhā nahīñ hotā 
bārish vo barastī hai ki bhar jaate haiñ jal-thal dekho to kahīñ abr kā TukḌā nahīñ hotā 
ghir jaatā hai dil dard kī har band galī meñ chāho ki nikal jaa.eñ to rasta nahīñ hotā 
yādoñ pe bhī jam jaatī hai jab gard-e-zamāna miltā hai vo paiġhām ki pahuñchā nahīñ hotā 
tanhā.ī meñ karnī to hai ik baat kisī se lekin vo kisī vaqt akelā nahīñ hotā 
kyā us se gila kījiye barbādī-e-dil kā ham se bhī to iz.hār-e-tamannā nahīñ hotā 
kis shai pe yahan waqt ka saya nahin hota ek KHwab-e-mohabbat hai ki buDha nahin hota 
wo waqt bhi aata hai jab aankhon mein hamari phirti hain wo shaklen jinhen dekha nahin hota 
barish wo barasti hai ki bhar jate hain jal-thal dekho to kahin abr ka TukDa nahin hota 
ghir jata hai dil dard ki har band gali mein chaho ki nikal jaen to rasta nahin hota 
yaadon pe bhi jam jati hai jab gard-e-zamana milta hai wo paigham ki pahuncha nahin hota 
tanhai mein karni to hai ek baat kisi se lekin wo kisi waqt akela nahin hota 
kya us se gila kijiye barbaadi-e-dil ka hum se bhi to izhaar-e-tamanna nahin hota

ġhair ko muñh lagā ke dekh liyā jhuuT sach aazmā ke dekh liyā 
un ke ghar 'dāġh' jā ke dekh liyā dil ke kahne meñ aa ke dekh liyā 
kitnī farhat-fazā thī bū-e-vafā us ne dil ko jalā ke dekh liyā 
kabhī ġhash meñ rahā shab-e-va.ada kabhī gardan uThā ke dekh liyā 
jins-e-dil hai ye vo nahīñ saudā har jagah se mañgā ke dekh liyā 
log kahte haiñ chup lagī hai tujhe hāl-e-dil bhī sunā ke dekh liyā 
jaao bhī kyā karoge mehr-o-vafā bār-hā aazmā ke dekh liyā 
zaḳhm-e-dil meñ nahīñ hai qatra-e-ḳhūñ ḳhuub ham ne dikhā ke dekh liyā 
idhar ā.īna hai udhar dil hai jis ko chāhā uThā ke dekh liyā 
un ko ḳhalvat-sarā meñ be-parda saaf maidān pā ke dekh liyā 
us ne sub.h-e-shab-e-visāl mujhe jaate jaate bhī aa ke dekh liyā 
tum ko hai vasl-e-ġhair se inkār aur jo ham ne aa ke dekh liyā 
'dāġh' ne ḳhuub āshiqī kā mazā jal ke dekhā jalā ke dekh liyā 
ghair ko munh laga ke dekh liya jhuT sach aazma ke dekh liya 
un ke ghar 'dagh' ja ke dekh liya dil ke kahne mein aa ke dekh liya 
kitni farhat-faza thi bu-e-wafa us ne dil ko jala ke dekh liya 
kabhi ghash mein raha shab-e-wada kabhi gardan uTha ke dekh liya 
jins-e-dil hai ye wo nahin sauda har jagah se manga ke dekh liya 
log kahte hain chup lagi hai tujhe haal-e-dil bhi suna ke dekh liya 
jao bhi kya karoge mehr-o-wafa bar-ha aazma ke dekh liya 
zaKHm-e-dil mein nahin hai qatra-e-KHun KHub hum ne dikha ke dekh liya 
idhar aaina hai udhar dil hai jis ko chaha uTha ke dekh liya 
un ko KHalwat-sara mein be-parda saf maidan pa ke dekh liya 
us ne subh-e-shab-e-visal mujhe jate jate bhi aa ke dekh liya 
tum ko hai wasl-e-ghair se inkar aur jo hum ne aa ke dekh liya 
'dagh' ne KHub aashiqi ka maza jal ke dekha jala ke dekh liya

kaabe kī hai havas kabhī kū-e-butāñ kī hai mujh ko ḳhabar nahīñ mirī miTTī kahāñ kī hai 
sun ke mirā fasāna unheñ lutf aa gayā suntā huuñ ab ki roz talab qissa-ḳhvāñ kī hai 
paiġhām-bar kī baat par aapas meñ ranj kyā merī zabāñ kī hai na tumhārī zabāñ kī hai 
kuchh tāzgī ho lazzat-e-āzār ke liye har dam mujhe talāsh na.e āsmāñ kī hai 
jāñ-bar bhī ho ga.e haiñ bahut mujh se nīm-jāñ kyā ġham hai ai tabīb jo puurī vahāñ kī hai 
hasrat baras rahī hai hamāre mazār par kahte haiñ sab ye qabr kisī naujavāñ kī hai 
vaqt-e-ḳhirām-e-nāz dikhā do judā judā ye chaal hashr kī ye ravish āsmāñ kī hai 
fursat kahāñ ki ham se kisī vaqt tū mile din ġhair kā hai raat tire pāsbāñ kī hai 
qāsid kī guftugū se tasallī ho kis tarah chhuptī nahīñ vo baat jo terī zabāñ kī hai 
jaur-e-raqīb o zulm-e-falak kā nahīñ ḳhayāl tashvīsh ek ḳhātir-e-nā-mehrbāñ kī hai 
sun kar mirā fasāna-e-ġham us ne ye kahā ho jaa.e jhuuT sach yahī ḳhūbī bayāñ kī hai 
dāman sambhāl bāñdh kamar āstīñ chaḌhā ḳhanjar nikāl dil meñ agar imtihāñ kī hai 
har har nafas meñ dil se nikalne lagā ġhubār kyā jaane gard-e-rāh ye kis kārvāñ kī hai 
kyūñki na aate ḳhuld se aadam zamīn par mauzūñ vahīñ vo ḳhuub hai jo sunte jahāñ kī hai 
taqdīr se ye pūchh rahā huuñ ki ishq meñ tadbīr koī bhī sitam-e-nā-gahāñ kī hai 
urdu hai jis kā naam hamīñ jānte haiñ 'dāġh' hindostāñ meñ dhuum hamārī zabāñ kī hai 
kabe ki hai hawas kabhi ku-e-butan ki hai mujh ko KHabar nahin meri miTTi kahan ki hai 
sun ke mera fasana unhen lutf aa gaya sunta hun ab ki roz talab qissa-KHwan ki hai 
paigham-bar ki baat par aapas mein ranj kya meri zaban ki hai na tumhaari zaban ki hai 
kuchh tazgi ho lazzat-e-azar ke liye har dam mujhe talash nae aasman ki hai 
jaan-bar bhi ho gae hain bahut mujh se nim-jaan kya gham hai ai tabib jo puri wahan ki hai 
hasrat baras rahi hai hamare mazar par kahte hain sab ye qabr kisi naujawan ki hai 
waqt-e-KHiram-e-naz dikha do juda juda ye chaal hashr ki ye rawish aasman ki hai 
fursat kahan ki hum se kisi waqt tu mile din ghair ka hai raat tere pasban ki hai 
qasid ki guftugu se tasalli ho kis tarah chhupti nahin wo baat jo teri zaban ki hai 
jaur-e-raqib o zulm-e-falak ka nahin KHayal tashwish ek KHatir-e-na-mehrban ki hai 
sun kar mera fasana-e-gham us ne ye kaha ho jae jhuT sach yahi KHubi bayan ki hai 
daman sambhaal bandh kamar aastin chaDha KHanjar nikal dil mein agar imtihan ki hai 
har har nafas mein dil se nikalne laga ghubar kya jaane gard-e-rah ye kis karwan ki hai 
kyunki na aate KHuld se aadam zamin par mauzun wahin wo KHub hai jo sunte jahan ki hai 
taqdir se ye puchh raha hun ki ishq mein tadbir koi bhi sitam-e-na-gahan ki hai 
urdu hai jis ka nam hamin jaante hain 'dagh' hindostan mein dhum hamari zaban ki hai

kaun aayā rāste ā.īna-ḳhāne ho ga.e raat raushan ho ga.ī din bhī suhāne ho ga.e 
kyuuñ havelī ke ujaḌne kā mujhe afsos ho saikḌoñ be-ghar parindoñ ke Thikāne ho ga.e 
jaao un kamroñ ke ā.īne uThā kar pheñk do be-adab ye kah rahe haiñ ham purāne ho ga.e 
ye bhī mumkin hai ki maiñ ne us ko pahchānā na ho ab use dekhe hue kitne zamāne ho ga.e 
palkoñ par ye aañsū pyaar kī tauhīn the āñkhoñ se gire motī ke daane ho ga.e 
kaun aaya raste aaina-KHane ho gae raat raushan ho gai din bhi suhane ho gae 
kyun haweli ke ujaDne ka mujhe afsos ho saikDon be-ghar parindon ke Thikane ho gae 
jao un kamron ke aaine uTha kar phenk do be-adab ye kah rahe hain hum purane ho gae 
ye bhi mumkin hai ki main ne us ko pahchana na ho ab use dekhe hue kitne zamane ho gae 
palkon par ye aansu pyar ki tauhin the aankhon se gire moti ke dane ho gae

jab tujhe yaad kareñ kār-e-jahāñ kheñchtā hai aur phir ishq vahī koh-e-girāñ kheñchtā hai 
kisī dushman kā koī tiir na pahuñchā mujh tak dekhnā ab ke mirā dost kamāñ kheñchtā hai 
ahd-e-fursat meñ kisī yār-e-guzishta kā ḳhayāl jab bhī aatā hai to jaise rag-e-jāñ kheñchtā hai 
dil ke TukḌoñ ko kahāñ joḌ sakā hai koī phir bhī āvāza-e-ā.īna-girāñ kheñchtā hai 
intihā ishq kī koī na havas kī koī dekhnā ye hai ki had kaun kahāñ kheñchtā hai 
khiñchte jaate haiñ rasan-basta ġhulāmoñ kī tarah jis taraf qāfila-e-umr-e-ravāñ kheñchtā hai
