ham to rahvār-e-zabūñ haiñ vo muqaddar kā savār ḳhud hī mahmez kare ḳhud hī inaañ kheñchtā hai 
rishta-e-teġh-o-gulū ab bhī salāmat hai 'farāz' ab bhī maqtal kī taraf dil sā javāñ kheñchtā hai 
jab tujhe yaad karen kar-e-jahan khenchta hai aur phir ishq wahi koh-e-giran khenchta hai 
kisi dushman ka koi tir na pahuncha mujh tak dekhna ab ke mera dost kaman khenchta hai 
ahd-e-fursat mein kisi yar-e-guzishta ka KHayal jab bhi aata hai to jaise rag-e-jaan khenchta hai 
dil ke TukDon ko kahan joD saka hai koi phir bhi aawaza-e-aina-giran khenchta hai 
intiha ishq ki koi na hawas ki koi dekhna ye hai ki had kaun kahan khenchta hai 
khinchte jate hain rasan-basta ghulamon ki tarah jis taraf qafila-e-umr-e-rawan khenchta hai 
hum to rahwar-e-zabun hain wo muqaddar ka sawar KHud hi mahmez kare KHud hi inan khenchta hai 
rishta-e-tegh-o-gulu ab bhi salamat hai 'faraaz' ab bhi maqtal ki taraf dil sa jawan khenchta hai

sab qarīne usī dildār ke rakh dete haiñ ham ġhazal meñ bhī hunar yaar ke rakh dete haiñ 
shāyad aa jaa.eñ kabhī chashm-e-ḳharīdār meñ ham jaan o dil biich meñ bāzār ke rakh dete haiñ 
taaki ta.ana na mile ham ko tunuk-zarfī kā ham qadah sāmne aġhyār ke rakh dete haiñ 
ab kise ranj-e-asīrī ki qafas meñ sayyād saare manzar gul-o-gulzār ke rakh dete haiñ 
zikr-e-jānāñ meñ ye duniyā ko kahāñ le aa.e log kyuuñ mas.ale bekār ke rakh dete haiñ 
vaqt vo rañg dikhātā hai ki ahl-e-dil bhī tāq-e-nisyāñ pe suḳhan yaar ke rakh dete haiñ 
zindagī terī amānat hai magar kyā kiije log ye bojh bhī thak-hār ke rakh dete haiñ 
ham to chāhat meñ bhī 'ġhālib' ke muqallid haiñ 'farāz' jis pe marte haiñ use maar ke rakh dete haiñ 
sab qarine usi dildar ke rakh dete hain hum ghazal mein bhi hunar yar ke rakh dete hain 
shayad aa jaen kabhi chashm-e-KHaridar mein hum jaan o dil bich mein bazar ke rakh dete hain 
taki tana na mile hum ko tunuk-zarfi ka hum qadah samne aghyar ke rakh dete hain 
ab kise ranj-e-asiri ki qafas mein sayyaad sare manzar gul-o-gulzar ke rakh dete hain 
zikr-e-jaanan mein ye duniya ko kahan le aae log kyun masale bekar ke rakh dete hain 
waqt wo rang dikhata hai ki ahl-e-dil bhi taq-e-nisyan pe suKHan yar ke rakh dete hain 
zindagi teri amanat hai magar kya kije log ye bojh bhi thak-haar ke rakh dete hain 
hum to chahat mein bhi 'ghaalib' ke muqallid hain 'faraaz' jis pe marte hain use mar ke rakh dete hain

jis se ye tabī.at baḌī mushkil se lagī thī dekhā to vo tasvīr har ik dil se lagī thī 
tanhā.ī meñ rote haiñ ki yuuñ dil ko sukūñ ho ye choT kisī sāhab-e-mahfil se lagī thī 
ai dil tire āshob ne phir hashr jagāyā bedard abhī aañkh bhī mushkil se lagī thī 
ḳhilqat kā ajab haal thā us kū-e-sitam meñ saa.e kī tarah dāman-e-qātil se lagī thī 
utrā bhī to kab dard kā chaḌhtā huā dariyā jab kashtī-e-jāñ maut ke sāhil se lagī thī 
jis se ye tabiat baDi mushkil se lagi thi dekha to wo taswir har ek dil se lagi thi 
tanhai mein rote hain ki yun dil ko sukun ho ye choT kisi sahab-e-mahfil se lagi thi 
ai dil tere aashob ne phir hashr jagaya bedard abhi aankh bhi mushkil se lagi thi 
KHilqat ka ajab haal tha us ku-e-sitam mein sae ki tarah daman-e-qatil se lagi thi 
utra bhi to kab dard ka chaDhta hua dariya jab kashti-e-jaan maut ke sahil se lagi thi

dil ko duniyā kā hai safar darpesh aur chāroñ taraf hai ghar darpesh 
hai ye 'ālam 'ajīb aur yahāñ mājrā hai 'ajīb-tar darpesh 
do jahāñ se guzar gayā phir bhī maiñ rahā ḳhud ko 'umr bhar darpesh 
ab maiñ kū-e-abas shitāb chalūñ ka.ī ik kaam haiñ udhar darpesh 
us ke dīdār kī umiid kahāñ jab ki hai diid ko nazar darpesh 
ab mirī jaan bach ga.ī yā'nī ek qātil kī hai sipar darpesh 
kis tarah kuuch par kamar bāñdhūñ ek rahzan kī hai kamar darpesh 
ḳhalvat-e-nāz aur ā.īna ḳhud-nigar ko hai ḳhud-nigar darpesh 
dil ko duniya ka hai safar darpesh aur chaaron taraf hai ghar darpesh 
hai ye 'alam 'ajib aur yahan majra hai 'ajib-tar darpesh 
do jahan se guzar gaya phir bhi main raha KHud ko 'umr bhar darpesh 
ab main ku-e-abas shitab chalun kai ek kaam hain udhar darpesh 
us ke didar ki umid kahan jab ki hai did ko nazar darpesh 
ab meri jaan bach gai ya'ni ek qatil ki hai sipar darpesh 
kis tarah kuch par kamar bandhun ek rahzan ki hai kamar darpesh 
KHalwat-e-naz aur aaina KHud-nigar ko hai KHud-nigar darpesh

dil ko kyā ho gayā ḳhudā jaane kyuuñ hai aisā udaas kyā jaane 
apne ġham meñ bhī us ko sarfa hai na khilā jaane vo na khā jaane 
is tajāhul kā kyā Thikānā hai jaan kar jo na mudda.ā jaane 
kah diyā maiñ ne rāz-e-dil apnā us ko tum jaano yā ḳhudā jaane 
kyā ġharaz kyuuñ idhar tavajjoh ho hāl-e-dil aap kī balā jaane 
jānte jānte hī jānegā mujh meñ kyā hai abhī vo kyā jaane 
kyā ham us bad-gumāñ se baat kareñ jo satā.ish ko bhī gila jaane 
tum na pāoge sāda-dil mujh sā jo taġhāful ko bhī hayā jaane 
hai abas jurm-e-ishq par ilzām jab ḳhatā-vār bhī ḳhatā jaane 
nahīñ kotāh dāman-e-ummīd aage ab dast-e-nā-rasā jaane 
jo ho achchhā hazār achchhoñ kā vaa.iz us but ko tū burā jaane 
kī mirī qadr misl-e-shāh-e-dakan kisī navvāb ne na raajā ne 
us se uTThegī kyā musībat-e-ishq ibtidā ko jo intihā jaane 
'dāġh' se kah do ab na ghabrāo kaam apnā batā huā jaane 
dil ko kya ho gaya KHuda jaane kyun hai aisa udas kya jaane 
apne gham mein bhi us ko sarfa hai na khila jaane wo na kha jaane 
is tajahul ka kya Thikana hai jaan kar jo na muddaa jaane 
kah diya main ne raaz-e-dil apna us ko tum jaano ya KHuda jaane 
kya gharaz kyun idhar tawajjoh ho haal-e-dil aap ki bala jaane 
jaante jaante hi jaanega mujh mein kya hai abhi wo kya jaane 
kya hum us bad-guman se baat karen jo sataish ko bhi gila jaane 
tum na paoge sada-dil mujh sa jo taghaful ko bhi haya jaane 
hai abas jurm-e-ishq par ilzam jab KHata-war bhi KHata jaane 
nahin kotah daman-e-ummid aage ab dast-e-na-rasa jaane 
jo ho achchha hazar achchhon ka waiz us but ko tu bura jaane 
ki meri qadr misl-e-shah-e-dakan kisi nawwab ne na raja ne 
us se uTThegi kya musibat-e-ishq ibtida ko jo intiha jaane 
'dagh' se kah do ab na ghabrao kaam apna bata hua jaane

faqīh-e-shahr kī majlis se kuchh bhalā na huā ki us se mil ke mizāj aur kāfirāna huā 
abhī abhī vo milā thā hazār bāteñ kiiñ abhī abhī vo gayā hai magar zamāna huā 
vo raat bhuul chuko vo suḳhan na doharāo vo raat ḳhvāb huī vo suḳhan fasāna huā 
kuchh ab ke aise kaḌe the firāq ke mausam tirī hī baat nahīñ maiñ bhī kyā se kyā na huā 
hujūm aisā ki rāheñ nazar nahīñ ātīñ nasīb aisā ki ab tak to qāfila na huā 
shahīd-e-shab faqat ahmad-'farāz' hī to nahīñ ki jo charāġh-ba-kaf thā vahī nishāna huā 
faqih-e-shahr ki majlis se kuchh bhala na hua ki us se mil ke mizaj aur kafirana hua 
abhi abhi wo mila tha hazar baaten kin abhi abhi wo gaya hai magar zamana hua 
wo raat bhul chuko wo suKHan na doharao wo raat KHwab hui wo suKHan fasana hua 
kuchh ab ke aise kaDe the firaq ke mausam teri hi baat nahin main bhi kya se kya na hua 
hujum aisa ki rahen nazar nahin aatin nasib aisa ki ab tak to qafila na hua 
shahid-e-shab faqat ahmad-'faraaz' hi to nahin ki jo charagh-ba-kaf tha wahi nishana hua

bahut ruk ruk ke chaltī hai havā ḳhālī makānoñ meñ bujhe TukḌe paḌe haiñ sigreToñ ke rākh-dānoñ meñ 
dhueñ se āsmāñ kā rañg mailā hotā jaatā hai hare jañgal badalte jā rahe haiñ kār-ḳhānoñ meñ 
bhalī lagtī hai āñkhoñ ko na.e phūloñ kī rañgat bhī purāne zamzame bhī gūñjte rahte haiñ kānoñ meñ 
vahī gulshan hai lekin vaqt kī parvāz to dekho koī taa.ir nahīñ pichhle baras ke āshiyānoñ meñ 
zabānoñ par ulajhte dostoñ ko kaun samjhā.e mohabbat kī zabāñ mumtāz hai saarī zabānoñ meñ 
bahut ruk ruk ke chalti hai hawa KHali makanon mein bujhe TukDe paDe hain sigreTon ke rakh-danon mein 
dhuen se aasman ka rang maila hota jata hai hare jangal badalte ja rahe hain kar-KHanon mein 
bhali lagti hai aankhon ko nae phulon ki rangat bhi purane zamzame bhi gunjte rahte hain kanon mein 
wahi gulshan hai lekin waqt ki parwaz to dekho koi tair nahin pichhle baras ke aashiyanon mein 
zabanon par ulajhte doston ko kaun samjhae mohabbat ki zaban mumtaz hai sari zabanon mein

dil badan kā sharīk-e-hāl kahāñ hijr phir hijr hai visāl kahāñ 
ishq hai naam intihāoñ kā is samundar meñ e'tidāl kahāñ 
aisā nashsha to zahr meñ bhī na thā ai ġham-e-dil tirī misāl kahāñ 
ham ko bhī apnī pā.emālī kā hai magar is qadar malāl kahāñ 
maiñ na.ī dostī ke moḌ pe thā aa gayā hai tirā ḳhayāl kahāñ 
dil ki ḳhush-fahm thā so hai varna tere milne kā ehtimāl kahāñ 
vasl o hijrāñ haiñ aur duniyā.eñ in zamānoñ meñ māh-o-sāl kahāñ 
tujh ko dekhā to log hairāñ haiñ aa gayā shahr meñ ġhazāl kahāñ 
tujh pe likkhī to saj ga.ī hai ġhazal aa milā ḳhvāb se ḳhayāl kahāñ 
ab to shah maat ho rahī hai 'farāz' ab bachāv kī koī chaal kahāñ 
dil badan ka sharik-e-haal kahan hijr phir hijr hai visal kahan 
ishq hai nam intihaon ka is samundar mein e'tidal kahan 
aisa nashsha to zahr mein bhi na tha ai gham-e-dil teri misal kahan 
hum ko bhi apni paemali ka hai magar is qadar malal kahan 
main nai dosti ke moD pe tha aa gaya hai tera KHayal kahan 
dil ki KHush-fahm tha so hai warna tere milne ka ehtimal kahan 
wasl o hijran hain aur duniyaen in zamanon mein mah-o-sal kahan 
tujh ko dekha to log hairan hain aa gaya shahr mein ghazal kahan 
tujh pe likkhi to saj gai hai ghazal aa mila KHwab se KHayal kahan 
ab to shah mat ho rahi hai 'faraaz' ab bachaw ki koi chaal kahan

bhed paa.eñ to rah-e-yār meñ gum ho jaa.eñ varna kis vāste be-kār meñ gum ho jaa.eñ 
kyā kareñ arz-e-tamannā ki tujhe dekhte hī lafz pairāya-e-iz.hār meñ gum ho jaa.eñ 
ye na ho tum bhī kisī bhiiḌ meñ kho jaao kahīñ ye na ho ham kisī bāzār meñ gum ho jaa.eñ 
kis tarah tujh se kaheñ kitnā bhalā lagtā hai tujh ko dekheñ tire dīdār meñ gum ho jaa.eñ 
ham tire shauq meñ yuuñ ḳhud ko gañvā baiThe haiñ jaise bachche kisī tyauhār meñ gum ho jaa.eñ 
pech itne bhī na do kirmak-e-resham kī tarah dekhnā sar hī na dastār meñ gum ho jaa.eñ 
aisā āshob-e-zamāna hai ki Dar lagtā hai dil ke mazmūñ hī na ash.ār meñ gum ho jaa.eñ 
shahryāroñ ke bulāve bahut aate haiñ 'farāz' ye na ho aap bhī darbār meñ gum ho jaa.eñ 
bhed paen to rah-e-yar mein gum ho jaen warna kis waste be-kar mein gum ho jaen 
kya karen arz-e-tamanna ki tujhe dekhte hi lafz pairaya-e-izhaar mein gum ho jaen 
ye na ho tum bhi kisi bhiD mein kho jao kahin ye na ho hum kisi bazar mein gum ho jaen 
kis tarah tujh se kahen kitna bhala lagta hai tujh ko dekhen tere didar mein gum ho jaen 
hum tere shauq mein yun KHud ko ganwa baiThe hain jaise bachche kisi tyauhaar mein gum ho jaen 
pech itne bhi na do kirmak-e-resham ki tarah dekhna sar hi na dastar mein gum ho jaen 
aisa aashob-e-zamana hai ki Dar lagta hai dil ke mazmun hi na ashaar mein gum ho jaen 
shahryaron ke bulawe bahut aate hain 'faraaz' ye na ho aap bhi darbar mein gum ho jaen

ishq nashsha hai na jaadū jo utar bhī jaa.e ye to ik sail-e-balā hai so guzar bhī jaa.e 
talḳhī-e-kām-o-dahan kab se azāb-e-jāñ hai ab to ye zahr rag o pai meñ utar bhī jaa.e 
ab ke jis dasht-e-tamannā meñ qadam rakkhā hai dil to kyā chiiz hai imkāñ hai ki sar bhī jaa.e 
ham bagūloñ kī tarah ḳhāk-basar phirte haiñ paañv shal hoñ to ye āshob-e-safar bhī jaa.e 
luT chuke ishq meñ ik baar to phir ishq karo kis ko mālūm ki taqdīr sañvar bhī jaa.e 
shahr-e-jānāñ se pare bhī ka.ī duniyā.eñ haiñ hai koī aisā musāfir jo udhar bhī jaa.e 
is qadar qurb ke baad aise judā ho jaanā koī kam-hausla insāñ ho to mar bhī jaa.e 
ek muddat se muqaddar hai ġharīb-ul-vatanī koī pardes meñ nā-ḳhush ho to ghar bhī jaa.e 
ishq nashsha hai na jadu jo utar bhi jae ye to ek sail-e-bala hai so guzar bhi jae 
talKHi-e-kaam-o-dahan kab se azab-e-jaan hai ab to ye zahr rag o pai mein utar bhi jae 
ab ke jis dasht-e-tamanna mein qadam rakkha hai dil to kya chiz hai imkan hai ki sar bhi jae 
hum bagulon ki tarah KHak-basar phirte hain panw shal hon to ye aashob-e-safar bhi jae 
luT chuke ishq mein ek bar to phir ishq karo kis ko malum ki taqdir sanwar bhi jae 
shahr-e-jaanan se pare bhi kai duniyaen hain hai koi aisa musafir jo udhar bhi jae 
is qadar qurb ke baad aise juda ho jaana koi kam-hausla insan ho to mar bhi jae 
ek muddat se muqaddar hai gharib-ul-watani koi pardes mein na-KHush ho to ghar bhi jae

kaun sā tā.ir-e-gum-gashta use yaad aayā dekhtā bhāltā har shāḳh ko sayyād aayā 
mere qaabū meñ na pahroñ dil-e-nāshād aayā vo mirā bhūlne vaalā jo mujhe yaad aayā 
koī bhūlā huā andāz-e-sitam yaad aayā ki tabassum tujhe zālim dam-e-be-dād aayā 
laa.e haiñ log janāze kī tarah mahshar meñ kis musībat se tirā kushta-e-bedād aayā 
jazb-e-vahshat tire qurbān tirā kyā kahnā khiñch ke rag rag meñ mire nashtar-e-fassād aayā 
us ke jalve ko ġharaz kaun-o-makāñ se kyā thā daad lene ke liye husn-e-ḳhudā-dād aayā 
bastiyoñ se yahī āvāz chalī aatī hai jo kiyā tū ne vo aage tire farhād aayā 
dil-e-vīrāñ se raqīboñ ne murādeñ pā.īñ kaam kis kis ke mirā ḳhirman-e-barbād aayā 
ishq ke aate hī muñh par mire phūlī hai basant ho gayā zard ye shāgird jab ustād aayā 
ho gayā farz mujhe shauq kā daftar likhnā jab mire haath koī ḳhāma-e-faulād aayā 
iid hai qatl mirā ahl-e-tamāshā ke liye sab gale milne lage jab ki vo jallād aayā 
chain karte haiñ vahāñ ranj uThāne vaale kaam uqbā meñ hamārā dil-e-nāshād aayā 
dī shab-e-vasl mo.azzin ne azaañ pichhlī raat haa.e kam-baḳht ko kis vaqt ḳhudā yaad aayā 
mere naale ne sunā.ī hai kharī kis kis ko muñh farishtoñ pe ye gustāḳh ye āzād aayā 
ġham-e-jāved ne dī mujh ko mubārakbādī jab sunā ye ki unheñ sheva-e-bedād aayā 
maiñ tamannā-e-shahādat kā mazā bhuul gayā aaj is shauq se armān se jallād aayā 
shādiyāna jo diyā naala o shevan ne diyā jab mulāqāt ko nāshād kī nāshād aayā 
lījiye suniye ab afsāna-e-furqat mujh se aap ne yaad dilāyā to mujhe yaad aayā 
aap kī bazm meñ sab kuchh hai magar 'dāġh' nahīñ ham ko vo ḳhāna-ḳharāb aaj bahut yaad aayā 
kaun sa tair-e-gum-gashta use yaad aaya dekhta bhaalta har shaKH ko sayyaad aaya 
mere qabu mein na pahron dil-e-nashad aaya wo mera bhulne wala jo mujhe yaad aaya 
koi bhula hua andaz-e-sitam yaad aaya ki tabassum tujhe zalim dam-e-be-dad aaya 
lae hain log janaze ki tarah mahshar mein kis musibat se tera kushta-e-bedad aaya 
jazb-e-wahshat tere qurban tera kya kahna khinch ke rag rag mein mere nashtar-e-fassad aaya 
us ke jalwe ko gharaz kaun-o-makan se kya tha dad lene ke liye husn-e-KHuda-dad aaya 
bastiyon se yahi aawaz chali aati hai jo kiya tu ne wo aage tere farhad aaya 
dil-e-viran se raqibon ne muraden pain kaam kis kis ke mera KHirman-e-barbaad aaya 
ishq ke aate hi munh par mere phuli hai basant ho gaya zard ye shagird jab ustad aaya 
ho gaya farz mujhe shauq ka daftar likhna jab mere hath koi KHama-e-faulad aaya 
id hai qatl mera ahl-e-tamasha ke liye sab gale milne lage jab ki wo jallad aaya 
chain karte hain wahan ranj uThane wale kaam uqba mein hamara dil-e-nashad aaya 
di shab-e-wasl moazzin ne azan pichhli raat hae kam-baKHt ko kis waqt KHuda yaad aaya 
mere nale ne sunai hai khari kis kis ko munh farishton pe ye gustaKH ye aazad aaya 
gham-e-jawed ne di mujh ko mubarakbaadi jab suna ye ki unhen shewa-e-bedad aaya 
main tamanna-e-shahadat ka maza bhul gaya aaj is shauq se arman se jallad aaya 
shadiyana jo diya nala o shewan ne diya jab mulaqat ko nashad ki nashad aaya 
lijiye suniye ab afsana-e-furqat mujh se aap ne yaad dilaya to mujhe yaad aaya 
aap ki bazm mein sab kuchh hai magar 'dagh' nahin hum ko wo KHana-KHarab aaj bahut yaad aaya

terī sūrat ko dekhtā huuñ maiñ us kī qudrat ko dekhtā huuñ maiñ 
jab huī sub.h aa ga.e nāseh unhīñ hazrat ko dekhtā huuñ maiñ 
vo musībat sunī nahīñ jaatī jis musībat ko dekhtā huuñ maiñ 
dekhne aa.e haiñ jo merī nabz un kī sūrat ko dekhtā huuñ maiñ 
maut mujh ko dikhā.ī detī hai jab tabī.at ko dekhtā huuñ maiñ

sab log liye sañg-e-malāmat nikal aa.e kis shahr meñ ham ahl-e-mohabbat nikal aa.e 
ab dil kī tamannā hai to ai kaash yahī ho aañsū kī jagah aañkh se hasrat nikal aa.e 
har ghar kā diyā gul na karo tum ki na jaane kis baam se ḳhurshīd-e-qayāmat nikal aa.e 
jo darpai-e-pindār haiñ un qatl-gahoñ se jaañ de ke bhī samjho ki salāmat nikal aa.e 
ai ham-nafaso kuchh to kaho ahd-e-sitam kī ik harf se mumkin hai hikāyat nikal aa.e 
yaaro mujhe maslūb karo tum ki mire baad shāyad ki tumhārā qad-o-qāmat nikal aa.e 
sab log liye sang-e-malamat nikal aae kis shahr mein hum ahl-e-mohabbat nikal aae 
ab dil ki tamanna hai to ai kash yahi ho aansu ki jagah aankh se hasrat nikal aae

yaro mujhe maslub karo tum ki mere baad shayad ki tumhaara qad-o-qamat nikal aae

ye baat baat meñ kyā nāzukī nikaltī hai dabī dabī tire lab se hañsī nikaltī hai

bajā.e shikva bhī detā huuñ maiñ duā us ko mirī zabāñ se karūñ kyā yahī nikaltī hai 
ḳhushī meñ ham ne ye shoḳhī kabhī nahīñ dekhī dam-e-itāb jo rañgat tirī nikaltī hai 
hazār baar jo māñgā karo to kyā hāsil duā vahī hai jo dil se kabhī nikaltī hai 
adā se terī magar khiñch rahīñ haiñ talvāreñ nigah nigah se chhurī par chhurī nikaltī hai 
muhīt-e-ishq meñ hai kyā umiid o biim mujhe ki Duub Duub ke kashtī mirī nikaltī hai 
jhalak rahī hai sar-e-shāḳh-e-mizha ḳhuun kī buuñd shajar meñ pahle samar se kalī nikaltī hai

samajh to lījiye kahne to dījiye matlab bayāñ se pahle hī mujh par chhurī nikaltī hai 
ye dil kī aag hai yā dil ke nuur kā hai zuhūr nafas nafas meñ mire raushnī nikaltī hai 
kahā jo maiñ ne ki mar jā.ūñgā to kahte haiñ hamāre zā.iche meñ zindagī nikaltī hai 
samajhne vaale samajhte haiñ pech kī taqrīr ki kuchh na kuchh tirī bātoñ meñ fī nikaltī hai 
dam-e-aḳhīr tasavvur hai kis parī-vash kā ki merī ruuh bhī ban kar parī nikaltī hai 
sanam-kade meñ bhī hai husn ik ḳhudā.ī kā ki jo nikaltī hai sūrat parī nikaltī hai 
mire nikāle na niklegī aarzū merī jo tum nikālnā chāho abhī nikaltī hai 
ġham-e-firāq meñ ho 'dāġh' is qadar betāb zarā se ranj meñ jaañ aap kī nikaltī hai 
ye baat baat mein kya nazuki nikalti hai dabi dabi tere lab se hansi nikalti hai 
Thahar Thahar ke jala dil ko ek bar na phunk ki is mein bu-e-mohabbat abhi nikalti hai 
bajae shikwa bhi deta hun main dua us ko meri zaban se karun kya yahi nikalti hai 
KHushi mein hum ne ye shoKHi kabhi nahin dekhi dam-e-itab jo rangat teri nikalti hai 
hazar bar jo manga karo to kya hasil dua wahi hai jo dil se kabhi nikalti hai 
ada se teri magar khinch rahin hain talwaren nigah nigah se chhuri par chhuri nikalti hai 
muhit-e-ishq mein hai kya umid o bim mujhe ki Dub Dub ke kashti meri nikalti hai 
jhalak rahi hai sar-e-shaKH-e-mizha KHun ki bund shajar mein pahle samar se kali nikalti hai

kaha jo main ne ki mar jaunga to kahte hain hamare zaiche mein zindagi nikalti hai 
samajhne wale samajhte hain pech ki taqrir ki kuchh na kuchh teri baaton mein fi nikalti hai 
dam-e-aKHir tasawwur hai kis pari-wash ka ki meri ruh bhi ban kar pari nikalti hai

mere nikale na niklegi aarzu meri jo tum nikalna chaho abhi nikalti hai

ik zaḳhm bhī yārān-e-bismil nahīñ aane kā maqtal meñ paḌe rahiye qātil nahīñ aane kā 
ab kuuch karo yaaro sahrā se ki sunte haiñ sahrā meñ ab ā.inda mahmil nahīñ aane kā 
vaa.iz ko ḳharābe meñ ik dāvat-e-haq dī thī maiñ jaan rahā thā vo jāhil nahīñ aane kā 
buniyād-e-jahāñ pahle jo thī vahī ab bhī hai yuuñ hashr to yārān-e-yak-dil nahīñ aane kā 
but hai ki ḳhudā hai vo maanā hai na mānūñgā us shoḳh se jab tak maiñ ḳhud mil nahīñ aane kā 
gar dil kī ye mahfil hai ḳharcha bhī ho phir dil kā bāhar se to sāmān-e-mahfil nahīñ aane kā 
vo naaf pyāle se sarmast kare varna ho ke maiñ kabhī us kā qaa.il nahīñ aane kā 
ek zaKHm bhi yaran-e-bismil nahin aane ka maqtal mein paDe rahiye qatil nahin aane ka 
ab kuch karo yaro sahra se ki sunte hain sahra mein ab aainda mahmil nahin aane ka 
waiz ko KHarabe mein ek dawat-e-haq di thi main jaan raha tha wo jahil nahin aane ka 
buniyaad-e-jahan pahle jo thi wahi ab bhi hai yun hashr to yaran-e-yak-dil nahin aane ka 
but hai ki KHuda hai wo mana hai na manunga us shoKH se jab tak main KHud mil nahin aane ka 
gar dil ki ye mahfil hai KHarcha bhi ho phir dil ka bahar se to saman-e-mahfil nahin aane ka 
wo naf pyale se sarmast kare warna ho ke main kabhi us ka qail nahin aane ka

vo zamāna nazar nahīñ aatā kuchh Thikānā nazar nahīñ aatā 
jaan jaatī dikhā.ī detī hai un kā aanā nazar nahīñ aatā 
ishq dar-parda phūñktā hai aag ye jalānā nazar nahīñ aatā 
ik zamāna mirī nazar meñ rahā ik zamāna nazar nahīñ aatā 
dil ne is bazm meñ biThā to diyā uTh ke jaanā nazar nahīñ aatā

tum milāoge ḳhaak meñ ham ko dil milānā nazar nahīñ aatā 
aap hī dekhte haiñ ham ko to dil kā aanā nazar nahīñ aatā 
dil-e-pur-ārzū luTā ai 'dāġh' vo ḳhazāna nazar nahīñ aatā 
wo zamana nazar nahin aata kuchh Thikana nazar nahin aata 
jaan jati dikhai deti hai un ka aana nazar nahin aata 
ishq dar-parda phunkta hai aag ye jalana nazar nahin aata 
ek zamana meri nazar mein raha ek zamana nazar nahin aata 
dil ne is bazm mein biTha to diya uTh ke jaana nazar nahin aata 
rahiye mushtaq-e-jalwa-e-didar hum ne mana nazar nahin aata 
le chalo mujh ko rah-rawan-e-adam yan Thikana nazar nahin aata 
dil pe baiTha kahan se tir-e-nigah ye nishana nazar nahin aata 
tum milaoge KHak mein hum ko dil milana nazar nahin aata 
aap hi dekhte hain hum ko to dil ka aana nazar nahin aata 
dil-e-pur-arzu luTa ai 'dagh' wo KHazana nazar nahin aata

āmad-e-ḳhat se huā hai sard jo bāzār-e-dost dūd-e-sham'-e-kushta thā shāyad ḳhat-e-ruḳhsār-e-dost

jamegī kaise bisāt-e-yārāñ ki shīsha o jaam bujh ga.e haiñ sajegī kaise shab-e-nigārāñ ki dil sar-e-shām bujh ga.e haiñ 
vo tīrgī hai rah-e-butāñ meñ charāġh-e-ruḳh hai na sham-e-vāda kiran koī aarzū kī laao ki sab dar-o-bām bujh ga.e haiñ 
bahut sambhālā vafā kā paimāñ magar vo barsī hai ab ke barkhā har ek iqrār miT gayā hai tamām paiġhām bujh ga.e haiñ 
qarīb aa ai mah-e-shab-e-ġham nazar pe khultā nahīñ kuchh is dam ki dil pe kis kis kā naqsh baaqī hai kaun se naam bujh ga.e haiñ 
bahār ab aa ke kyā karegī ki jin se thā jashn-e-rañg-o-naġhma vo gul sar-e-shāḳh jal ga.e haiñ vo dil tah-e-dām bujh ga.e haiñ 
jamegi kaise bisat-e-yaran ki shisha o jam bujh gae hain sajegi kaise shab-e-nigaran ki dil sar-e-sham bujh gae hain 
wo tirgi hai rah-e-butan mein charagh-e-ruKH hai na sham-e-wada kiran koi aarzu ki lao ki sab dar-o-baam bujh gae hain 
bahut sambhaala wafa ka paiman magar wo barsi hai ab ke barkha har ek iqrar miT gaya hai tamam paigham bujh gae hain 
qarib aa ai mah-e-shab-e-gham nazar pe khulta nahin kuchh is dam ki dil pe kis kis ka naqsh baqi hai kaun se nam bujh gae hain 
bahaar ab aa ke kya karegi ki jin se tha jashn-e-rang-o-naghma wo gul sar-e-shaKH jal gae hain wo dil tah-e-dam bujh gae hain

kuchh mohtasiboñ kī ḳhalvat meñ kuchh vaa.iz ke ghar jaatī hai ham bāda-kashoñ ke hisse kī ab jaam meñ kam-tar jaatī hai 
yuuñ arz-o-talab se kam ai dil patthar dil paanī hote haiñ tum laakh razā kī ḳhū Daalo kab ḳhū-e-sitamgar jaatī hai 
bedād-garoñ kī bastī hai yaañ daad kahāñ ḳhairāt kahāñ sar phoḌtī phirtī hai nādāñ fariyād jo dar dar jaatī hai 
haañ jaañ ke ziyāñ kī ham ko bhī tashvīsh hai lekin kyā kiije har rah jo udhar ko jaatī hai maqtal se guzar kar jaatī hai 
ab kūcha-e-dil-bar kā rah-rau rahzan bhī bane to baat bane pahre se adū Talte hī nahīñ aur raat barābar jaatī hai 
ham ahl-e-qafas tanhā bhī nahīñ har roz nasīm-e-sub.h-e-vatan yādoñ se mo.attar aatī hai ashkoñ se munavvar jaatī hai 
kuchh mohtasibon ki KHalwat mein kuchh waiz ke ghar jati hai hum baada-kashon ke hisse ki ab jam mein kam-tar jati hai 
yun arz-o-talab se kam ai dil patthar dil pani hote hain tum lakh raza ki KHu Dalo kab KHu-e-sitamgar jati hai 
bedad-garon ki basti hai yan dad kahan KHairaat kahan sar phoDti phirti hai nadan fariyaad jo dar dar jati hai 
han jaan ke ziyan ki hum ko bhi tashwish hai lekin kya kije har rah jo udhar ko jati hai maqtal se guzar kar jati hai 
ab kucha-e-dil-bar ka rah-rau rahzan bhi bane to baat bane pahre se adu Talte hi nahin aur raat barabar jati hai 
hum ahl-e-qafas tanha bhi nahin har roz nasim-e-subh-e-watan yaadon se moattar aati hai ashkon se munawwar jati hai

ġham se kahīñ najāt mile chain paa.eñ ham dil ḳhuun meñ nahā.e to gañgā nahā.eñ ham 
jannat meñ jaa.eñ ham ki jahannam meñ jaa.eñ ham mil jaa.e to kahīñ na kahīñ tujh ko paa.eñ ham 
jauf-e-falak meñ ḳhaak bhī lazzat nahīñ rahī jī chāhtā hai terī jafā.eñ uThā.eñ ham 
Dar hai na bhuul jaa.e vo saffāk roz-e-hashr duniyā meñ likhte jaate haiñ apnī ḳhatā.eñ ham 
mumkin hai ye ki va.ade par apne vo aa bhī jaa.e mushkil ye hai ki aap meñ us vaqt aa.eñ ham 
nārāz ho ḳhudā to kareñ bandagī se ḳhush māshūq ruuTh jaa.e to kyūñkar manā.eñ ham 
sar dostoñ kā kaaT ke rakhte haiñ sāmne ġhairoñ se pūchhte haiñ qasam kis kī khā.eñ ham 
kitnā tirā mizāj ḳhushāmad-pasand hai kab tak kareñ ḳhudā ke liye iltijā.eñ ham 
lālach abas hai dil kā tumheñ vaqt-e-vāpsīñ ye maal vo nahīñ ki jise chhoḌ jaa.eñ ham 
sauñpā tumheñ ḳhudā ko chale ham to nā-murād kuchh paḌh ke baḳhshnā jo kabhī yaad aa.eñ ham 
soz-e-darūñ se apne sharar ban ga.e haiñ ashk kyuuñ āh-e-sard ko na patiñge lagā.eñ ham 
ye jaan tum na loge agar aap jā.egī us bevafā kī ḳhair kahāñ tak manā.eñ ham 
ham-sā.e jāgte rahe nāloñ se raat bhar so.e hue nasīb ko kyūñkar jagā.eñ ham 
jalva dikhā rahā hai vo ā.īna-e-jamāl aatī hai ham ko sharm ki kyā muñh dikhā.eñ ham 
maano kahā jafā na karo tum vafā ke ba.ad aisā na ho ki pher leñ ulTī duā.eñ ham 
dushman se milte julte haiñ ḳhātir se dostī kyā fā.eda jo dost ko dushman banā.eñ ham 
tū bhūlne kī chiiz nahīñ ḳhuub yaad rakh ai 'dāġh' kis tarah tujhe dil se bhulā.eñ ham

lalach abas hai dil ka tumhein waqt-e-wapsin ye mal wo nahin ki jise chhoD jaen hum 
saunpa tumhein KHuda ko chale hum to na-murad kuchh paDh ke baKHshna jo kabhi yaad aaen hum 
soz-e-darun se apne sharar ban gae hain ashk kyun aah-e-sard ko na patinge lagaen hum 
ye jaan tum na loge agar aap jaegi us bewafa ki KHair kahan tak manaen hum 
ham-sae jagte rahe nalon se raat bhar soe hue nasib ko kyunkar jagaen hum 
jalwa dikha raha hai wo aaina-e-jamal aati hai hum ko sharm ki kya munh dikhaen hum 
mano kaha jafa na karo tum wafa ke baad aisa na ho ki pher len ulTi duaen hum 
dushman se milte julte hain KHatir se dosti kya faeda jo dost ko dushman banaen hum 
tu bhulne ki chiz nahin KHub yaad rakh ai 'dagh' kis tarah tujhe dil se bhulaen hum

ḳhvāb kī hālatoñ ke saath terī hikāyatoñ meñ haiñ ham bhī dayār-e-ahl-e-dil terī rivāyatoñ meñ haiñ 
vo jo the rishtā-hā-e-jāñ TuuT sake bhalā kahāñ jaan vo rishtā-hā-e-jāñ ab bhī shikāyatoñ meñ haiñ 
ek ġhubār hai ki hai dā.era-vār pur-fishāñ qāfilā-hā-e-kahkashāñ tañg haiñ vahshatoñ meñ haiñ 
vaqt kī darmiyāniyāñ kar ga.iiñ jāñ-kanī ko jaañ vo jo adāvateñ ki thiiñ aaj mohabbatoñ meñ haiñ 
partav-e-rañg hai ki hai diid meñ jāñ-nashīn-e-rañg rañg kahāñ haiñ rūnumā rañg to nik.hatoñ meñ haiñ 
hai ye vajūd kī numūd apnī nafas nafas gurez vaqt kī saarī bastiyāñ apnī hazīmatoñ meñ haiñ 
gard kā saarā ḳhānumāñ hai sar-e-dasht-e-be-amāñ shahr haiñ vo jo har tarah gard kī ḳhidmatoñ meñ haiñ 
vo dil o jaan sūrateñ jaise kabhī na thiiñ kahīñ ham unhīñ sūratoñ ke haiñ ham unhīñ sūratoñ meñ haiñ 
maiñ na sunūñgā mājrā ma.arka-hā-e-shauq kā ḳhuun ga.e haiñ rā.egāñ rañg nadāmatoñ meñ haiñ 
KHwab ki haalaton ke sath teri hikayaton mein hain hum bhi dayar-e-ahl-e-dil teri riwayaton mein hain 
wo jo the rishta-ha-e-jaan TuT sake bhala kahan jaan wo rishta-ha-e-jaan ab bhi shikayaton mein hain 
ek ghubar hai ki hai daera-war pur-fishan qafila-ha-e-kahkashan tang hain wahshaton mein hain 
waqt ki darmiyaniyan kar gain jaan-kani ko jaan wo jo adawaten ki thin aaj mohabbaton mein hain 
partaw-e-rang hai ki hai did mein jaan-nashin-e-rang rang kahan hain runuma rang to nikhaton mein hain 
hai ye wajud ki numud apni nafas nafas gurez waqt ki sari bastiyan apni hazimaton mein hain 
gard ka sara KHanuman hai sar-e-dasht-e-be-aman shahr hain wo jo har tarah gard ki KHidmaton mein hain 
wo dil o jaan suraten jaise kabhi na thin kahin hum unhin suraton ke hain hum unhin suraton mein hain 
main na sununga majra marka-ha-e-shauq ka KHun gae hain raegan rang nadamaton mein hain

chāk-pairāhanī-e-gul ko sabā jāntī hai mastī-e-shauq kahāñ band-e-qabā jāntī hai 
ham to badnām-e-mohabbat the so rusvā Thahre nāsehoñ ko bhī magar ḳhalq-e-ḳhudā jāntī hai 
kaun tāqoñ pe rahā kaun sar-e-rāhguzar shahr ke saare charāġhoñ ko havā jāntī hai 
havas in.aam samajhtī hai karam ko tere aur mohabbat hai ki ehsāñ ko sazā jāntī hai 
chaak-pairahani-e-gul ko saba jaanti hai masti-e-shauq kahan band-e-qaba jaanti hai 
hum to badnam-e-mohabbat the so ruswa Thahre nasehon ko bhi magar KHalq-e-KHuda jaanti hai 
kaun taqon pe raha kaun sar-e-rahguzar shahr ke sare charaghon ko hawa jaanti hai 
hawas inam samajhti hai karam ko tere aur mohabbat hai ki ehsan ko saza jaanti hai

jab tak nigār-e-dasht kā siina dukhā na thā sahrā meñ koī lāla-e-sahrā khilā na thā 
do jhīleñ us kī āñkhoñ meñ lahrā ke so ga.iiñ us vaqt merī 'umr kā dariyā chaḌhā na thā 
jaagī na thiiñ nasoñ meñ tamannā kī nāgineñ us gandumī sharāb ko jab tak chakhā na thā 
DhūñDā karo jahān-e-tahayyur meñ 'umr bhar vo chaltī phirtī chhāñv hai maiñ ne kahā na thā 
ik bevafā ke sāmne aañsū bahāte ham itnā hamārī aañkh kā paanī marā na thā 
vo kaale hoñT jaam samajh kar chaḌhā ga.e vo aab jis se maiñ ne vuzū tak kiyā na thā 
sab log apne apne ḳhudāoñ ko laa.e the ik ham hī aise the ki hamārā ḳhudā na thā 
vo kaalī āñkheñ shahr meñ mash.hūr thiiñ bahut tab un pe moTe shīshoñ kā chashma chaḌhā na thā 
maiñ sāhib-e-ġhazal thā hasīnoñ kī bazm meñ sar par ghanere baal the māthā khulā na thā 
jab tak nigar-e-dasht ka sina dukha na tha sahra mein koi lala-e-sahra khila na tha 
do jhilen us ki aankhon mein lahra ke so gain us waqt meri 'umr ka dariya chaDha na tha 
jagi na thin nason mein tamanna ki naginen us gandumi sharab ko jab tak chakha na tha 
DhunDa karo jahan-e-tahayyur mein 'umr bhar wo chalti phirti chhanw hai main ne kaha na tha 
ek bewafa ke samne aansu bahate hum itna hamari aankh ka pani mara na tha 
wo kale honT jam samajh kar chaDha gae wo aab jis se main ne wuzu tak kiya na tha 
sab log apne apne KHudaon ko lae the ek hum hi aise the ki hamara KHuda na tha 
wo kali aankhen shahr mein mashhur thin bahut tab un pe moTe shishon ka chashma chaDha na tha 
main sahib-e-ghazal tha hasinon ki bazm mein sar par ghanere baal the matha khula na tha

jab yaar ne raḳht-e-safar bāñdhā kab zabt kā paarā us din thā har dard ne dil ko sahlāyā kyā haal hamārā us din thā 
jab ḳhvāb huiiñ us kī āñkheñ jab dhund huā us kā chehra har ashk sitāra us shab thā har zaḳhm añgāra us din thā 
sab yāroñ ke hote sote ham kis se gale mil kar rote kab galiyāñ apnī galiyāñ thiiñ kab shahr hamārā us din thā 
jab tujh se zarā ġhāfil Thahre har yaad ne dil par dastak dī jab lab pe tumhārā naam na thā har dukh ne pukārā us din thā 
ik tum hī 'farāz' na the tanhā ab ke to balā vājib aa.ī ik bhiiḌ lagī thī maqtal meñ har dard kā maarā us din thā 
jab yar ne raKHt-e-safar bandha kab zabt ka para us din tha har dard ne dil ko sahlaya kya haal hamara us din tha 
jab KHwab huin us ki aankhen jab dhund hua us ka chehra har ashk sitara us shab tha har zaKHm angara us din tha 
sab yaron ke hote sote hum kis se gale mil kar rote kab galiyan apni galiyan thin kab shahr hamara us din tha 
jab tujh se zara ghafil Thahre har yaad ne dil par dastak di jab lab pe tumhaara nam na tha har dukh ne pukara us din tha 
ek tum hi 'faraaz' na the tanha ab ke to bala wajib aai ek bhiD lagi thi maqtal mein har dard ka mara us din tha

tum ā.īna hī na har baar dekhte jaao mirī taraf bhī to sarkār dekhte jaao 
na jaao hāl-e-dil-e-zār dekhte jaao ki jī na chāhe to nā-chār dekhte jaao 
bahār-e-umr meñ bāġh-e-jahāñ kī sair karo khilā huā hai ye gulzār dekhte jaao 
yahī to chashm-e-haqīqat nigar kā surma hai nizā-e-kāfir-o-dīñ-dār dekhte jaao 
uThāo aañkh na sharmāo ye to mahfil hai ġhazab se jānib-e-aġhyār dekhte jaao 
nahīñ hai jins-e-vafā kī tumheñ jo qadr na ho baneñge kitne ḳharīdār dekhte jaao 
tumheñ ġharaz jo karo rahm pā.emāloñ par tum apnī shoḳhī-e-raftār dekhte jaao 
qasam bhī khaa.ī thī qur.ān bhī uThāyā thā phir aaj hai vahī inkār dekhte jaao 
ye shāmat aa.ī ki us kī galī meñ dil ne kahā khulā hai rauzan-e-dīvār dekhte jaao 
huā hai kyā abhī hangāma aur kuchh hogā fuġhāñ meñ hashr ke āsār dekhte jaao 
shab-e-visāl adū kī yahī nishānī hai nishān-e-bosa-e-ruḳhsār dekhte jaao 
tumhārī aañkh mire dil se le sabab be-vaj.h huī hai laḌne ko tayyār dekhte jaao 
idhar ko aa hī ga.e ab to hazrat-e-zāhid yahīñ hai ḳhāna-e-ḳhummār dekhte jaao 
raqīb barsar-e-parḳhāsh ham se hotā hai baḌhegī muft meñ takrār dekhte jaao 
nahīñ haiñ jurm-e-mohabbat meñ sab ke sab mulzim ḳhatā muaaf ḳhatā-vār dekhte jaao 
dikhā rahī hai tamāshā falak kī nairañgī nayā hai sho.abada har baar dekhte jaao 
banā diyā mirī chāhat ne ġhairat-e-yūsuf tum apnī garmī-e-bāzār dekhte jaao 
na jaao band kiye aañkh rah-ravān-e-adam idhar udhar bhī ḳhabar-dār dekhte jaao 
sunī-sunā.ī pe hargiz kabhī amal na karo hamāre haal ke aḳhbār dekhte jaao 
koī na koī har ik sher meñ hai baat zarūr janāb-e-'dāġh' ke ash.ār dekhte jaao 
tum aaina hi na har bar dekhte jao meri taraf bhi to sarkar dekhte jao 
na jao haal-e-dil-e-zar dekhte jao ki ji na chahe to na-chaar dekhte jao 
bahaar-e-umr mein bagh-e-jahan ki sair karo khila hua hai ye gulzar dekhte jao 
yahi to chashm-e-haqiqat nigar ka surma hai niza-e-kafir-o-din-dar dekhte jao 
uThao aankh na sharmao ye to mahfil hai ghazab se jaanib-e-aghyar dekhte jao 
nahin hai jins-e-wafa ki tumhein jo qadr na ho banenge kitne KHaridar dekhte jao 
tumhein gharaz jo karo rahm paemalon par tum apni shoKHi-e-raftar dekhte jao 
qasam bhi khai thi quran bhi uThaya tha phir aaj hai wahi inkar dekhte jao 
ye shamat aai ki us ki gali mein dil ne kaha khula hai rauzan-e-diwar dekhte jao 
hua hai kya abhi hangama aur kuchh hoga fughan mein hashr ke aasar dekhte jao 
shab-e-visal adu ki yahi nishani hai nishan-e-bosa-e-ruKHsar dekhte jao 
tumhaari aankh mere dil se le sabab be-wajh hui hai laDne ko tayyar dekhte jao 
idhar ko aa hi gae ab to hazrat-e-zahid yahin hai KHana-e-KHummar dekhte jao 
raqib barsar-e-parKHash hum se hota hai baDhegi muft mein takrar dekhte jao 
nahin hain jurm-e-mohabbat mein sab ke sab mulzim KHata muaf KHata-war dekhte jao 
dikha rahi hai tamasha falak ki nairangi naya hai shoabada har bar dekhte jao 
bana diya meri chahat ne ghairat-e-yusuf tum apni garmi-e-bazar dekhte jao 
na jao band kiye aankh rah-rawan-e-adam idhar udhar bhi KHabar-dar dekhte jao 
suni-sunai pe hargiz kabhi amal na karo hamare haal ke aKHbar dekhte jao 
koi na koi har ek sher mein hai baat zarur janab-e-'dagh' ke ashaar dekhte jao

dil-e-nākām ke haiñ kaam ḳharāb kar liyā āshiqī meñ naam ḳharāb 
is ḳharābāt kā yahī hai maza ki rahe aadmī mudām ḳharāb 
dekh kar jins-e-dil vo kahte haiñ kyuuñ kare koī apne daam ḳharāb 
abr-e-tar se sabā hī achchhī thī merī miTTī huī tamām ḳharāb 
vo bhī saaqī mujhe nahīñ detā vo jo TuuTā paḌā hai jaam ḳharāb 
kyā milā ham ko zindagī ke sivā vo bhī dushvār nā-tamām ḳharāb 
vaah kyā muñh se phuul jhaḌte haiñ ḳhūb-rū ho ke ye kalām ḳharāb 
chaal kī rahnumā-e-ishq ne bhī vo dikhāyā jo thā maqām ḳharāb 
'dāġh' hai bad-chalan to hone do sau meñ hotā hai ik ġhulām ḳharāb 
dil-e-nakaam ke hain kaam KHarab kar liya aashiqi mein nam KHarab 
is KHarabaat ka yahi hai maza ki rahe aadmi mudam KHarab 
dekh kar jins-e-dil wo kahte hain kyun kare koi apne dam KHarab 
abr-e-tar se saba hi achchhi thi meri miTTi hui tamam KHarab 
wo bhi saqi mujhe nahin deta wo jo TuTa paDa hai jam KHarab 
kya mila hum ko zindagi ke siwa wo bhi dushwar na-tamam KHarab 
wah kya munh se phul jhaDte hain KHub-ru ho ke ye kalam KHarab 
chaal ki rahnuma-e-ishq ne bhi wo dikhaya jo tha maqam KHarab 
'dagh' hai bad-chalan to hone do sau mein hota hai ek ghulam KHarab

phuul barse kahīñ shabnam kahīñ gauhar barse aur is dil kī taraf barse to patthar barse 
koī bādal ho to tham jaa.e magar ashk mire ek raftār se din raat barābar barse 
barf ke phūloñ se raushan huī tārīk zamīñ raat kī shāḳh se jaise mah o aḳhtar barse 
pyaar kā giit añdheroñ pe ujāloñ kī phuvār aur nafrat kī sadā shīshe pe patthar barse 
bārisheñ chhat pe khulī jag.hoñ pe hotī haiñ magar ġham vo sāvan hai jo un kamroñ ke andar barse 
phul barse kahin shabnam kahin gauhar barse aur is dil ki taraf barse to patthar barse 
koi baadal ho to tham jae magar ashk mere ek raftar se din raat barabar barse 
barf ke phulon se raushan hui tarik zamin raat ki shaKH se jaise mah o aKHtar barse 
pyar ka git andheron pe ujalon ki phuwar aur nafrat ki sada shishe pe patthar barse 
barishen chhat pe khuli jaghon pe hoti hain magar gham wo sawan hai jo un kamron ke andar barse

ye be-dilī hai to kashtī se yaar kyā utreñ udhar bhī kaun hai dariyā ke paar kyā utreñ 
tamām daulat-e-jāñ haar dī mohabbat meñ jo zindagī se liye the udhār kyā utreñ 
hazār jaam se Takrā ke jaam ḳhālī hoñ jo aa ga.e haiñ diloñ meñ ġhubār kyā utreñ 
basān-e-ḳhāk sar-e-kū-e-yār baiThe haiñ ab is maqām se ham ḳhāksār kyā utreñ 
na itr o uud na jaam o subū na saaz o surūr faqīr-e-shahr ke ghar shahryār kyā utreñ 
hameñ majāl nahīñ hai ki baam tak pahuñcheñ unheñ ye aar sar-e-rahguzār kyā utreñ 
jo zaḳhm daaġh bane haiñ vo bhar ga.e the 'farāz' jo daaġh zaḳhm bane haiñ vo yaar kyā utreñ 
ye be-dili hai to kashti se yar kya utren udhar bhi kaun hai dariya ke par kya utren 
tamam daulat-e-jaan haar di mohabbat mein jo zindagi se liye the udhaar kya utren 
hazar jam se Takra ke jam KHali hon jo aa gae hain dilon mein ghubar kya utren 
basan-e-KHak sar-e-ku-e-yar baiThe hain ab is maqam se hum KHaksar kya utren 
na itr o ud na jam o subu na saz o surur faqir-e-shahr ke ghar shahryar kya utren 
hamein majal nahin hai ki baam tak pahunchen unhen ye aar sar-e-rahguzar kya utren 
jo zaKHm dagh bane hain wo bhar gae the 'faraaz' jo dagh zaKHm bane hain wo yar kya utren

ġhanīm se bhī adāvat meñ had nahīñ māñgī ki haar maan lī lekin madad nahīñ māñgī 
hazār shukr ki ham ahl-e-harf-e-zindā ne mujāvirān-e-adab se sanad nahīñ māñgī 
bahut hai lamha-e-maujūd kā sharaf bhī mujhe so apne fan se baqā-e-abad nahīñ māñgī 
qubūl vo jise kartā vo iltijā nahīñ kī duā jo vo na kare mustarad nahīñ māñgī 
maiñ apne jāma-e-sad-chāk se bahut ḳhush huuñ kabhī abā-o-qabā-e-ḳhirad nahīñ māñgī 
shahīd jism salāmat uThā.e jaate haiñ jabhī to gor-kanoñ se lahad nahīñ māñgī 
maiñ sar-barahna rahā phir bhī sar-kashīda rahā kabhī kulāh se tauqīr-e-qad nahīñ māñgī 
atā-e-dard meñ vo bhī nahīñ thā dil kā ġharīb 'farāz' maiñ ne bhī baḳhshish meñ had nahīñ māñgī 
ghanim se bhi adawat mein had nahin mangi ki haar man li lekin madad nahin mangi 
hazar shukr ki hum ahl-e-harf-e-zinda ne mujaviran-e-adab se sanad nahin mangi 
bahut hai lamha-e-maujud ka sharaf bhi mujhe so apne fan se baqa-e-abad nahin mangi 
qubul wo jise karta wo iltija nahin ki dua jo wo na kare mustarad nahin mangi 
main apne jama-e-sad-chaak se bahut KHush hun kabhi aba-o-qaba-e-KHirad nahin mangi 
shahid jism salamat uThae jate hain jabhi to gor-kanon se lahad nahin mangi 
main sar-barahna raha phir bhi sar-kashida raha kabhi kulah se tauqir-e-qad nahin mangi 
ata-e-dard mein wo bhi nahin tha dil ka gharib 'faraaz' main ne bhi baKHshish mein had nahin mangi

har lamha zulmatoñ kī ḳhudā.ī kā vaqt hai shāyad kisī kī chehra-numā.ī kā vaqt hai 
kahtī hai sāhiloñ se ye jaate samay kī dhuup hushyār naddiyoñ kī chaḌhā.ī kā vaqt hai 
hotī hai shaam aañkh se aañsū ravāñ hue ye vaqt qaidiyoñ kī rihā.ī kā vaqt hai 
koī bhī vaqt ho kabhī hotā nahīñ judā kitnā aziiz us kī judā.ī kā vaqt hai 
dil ne kahā ki shām-e-shab-e-vasl se na bhaag ab pak chukī hai fasl kaTā.ī kā vaqt hai 
maiñ ne kahā ki dekh ye maiñ ye havā ye raat us ne kahā ki merī paḌhā.ī kā vaqt hai 
har lamha zulmaton ki KHudai ka waqt hai shayad kisi ki chehra-numai ka waqt hai 
kahti hai sahilon se ye jate samay ki dhup hushyar naddiyon ki chaDhai ka waqt hai 
hoti hai sham aankh se aansu rawan hue ye waqt qaidiyon ki rihai ka waqt hai 
koi bhi waqt ho kabhi hota nahin juda kitna aziz us ki judai ka waqt hai 
dil ne kaha ki sham-e-shab-e-wasl se na bhag ab pak chuki hai fasl kaTai ka waqt hai 
main ne kaha ki dekh ye main ye hawa ye raat us ne kaha ki meri paDhai ka waqt hai

saaz ye kīna-sāz kyā jāneñ naaz vaale niyāz kyā jāneñ 
sham.a-rū aap go hue lekin lutf-e-soz-o-gudāz kyā jāneñ 
kab kisī dar kī jab.ha-sā.ī kī shaiḳh sāhab namāz kyā jāneñ 
jo rah-e-ishq meñ qadam rakkheñ vo nasheb-o-farāz kyā jāneñ 
pūchhiye mai-kashoñ se lutf-e-sharāb ye mazā pāk-bāz kyā jāneñ 
bale chitvan tirī ġhazab rī nigāh kyā kareñge ye naaz kyā jāneñ 
jin ko apnī ḳhabar nahīñ ab tak vo mire dil kā raaz kyā jāneñ 
hazrat-e-ḳhizr jab shahīd na hoñ lutf-e-umr-e-darāz kyā jāneñ 
jo guzarte haiñ 'dāġh' par sadme aap banda-navāz kyā jāneñ 
saz ye kina-saz kya jaanen naz wale niyaz kya jaanen 
shama-ru aap go hue lekin lutf-e-soz-o-gudaz kya jaanen 
kab kisi dar ki jabha-sai ki shaiKH sahab namaz kya jaanen 
jo rah-e-ishq mein qadam rakkhen wo nasheb-o-faraaz kya jaanen 
puchhiye mai-kashon se lutf-e-sharab ye maza pak-baz kya jaanen 
bale chitwan teri ghazab ri nigah kya karenge ye naz kya jaanen 
jin ko apni KHabar nahin ab tak wo mere dil ka raaz kya jaanen 
hazrat-e-KHizr jab shahid na hon lutf-e-umr-e-daraaz kya jaanen 
jo guzarte hain 'dagh' par sadme aap banda-nawaz kya jaanen

ġhairat-e-ishq salāmat thī anā zinda thī vo bhī din the ki rah-o-rasm-e-vafā zinda thī 
qais ko dosh na do rakhiyo na farhād ko naam inhī logoñ se mohabbat kī adā zinda thī 
shahr-e-bīmār ke har kūcha o baam o dar par ham bhī marte the ki jab ḳhalq-e-ḳhudā zinda thī 
bujh ga.iiñ sham.eñ to dam toḌ ga.e jhoñke bhī jis tarah zahr-e-raqābat se havā zinda thī 
yād-e-ayyām ki sahrā-e-mohabbat meñ 'farāz' jaras-e-qāfila-e-dil kī sadā zinda thī 
ghairat-e-ishq salamat thi ana zinda thi wo bhi din the ki rah-o-rasm-e-wafa zinda thi 
qais ko dosh na do rakhiyo na farhad ko nam inhi logon se mohabbat ki ada zinda thi 
shahr-e-bimar ke har kucha o baam o dar par hum bhi marte the ki jab KHalq-e-KHuda zinda thi 
bujh gain shamen to dam toD gae jhonke bhi jis tarah zahr-e-raqabat se hawa zinda thi 
yaad-e-ayyam ki sahra-e-mohabbat mein 'faraaz' jaras-e-qafila-e-dil ki sada zinda thi

chaa.e kī pyālī meñ niilī tablet gholī sahme sahme hāthoñ ne ik kitāb phir kholī 
dā.ere añdheroñ ke raushnī ke poroñ ne coat ke button khole tie kī girah kholī 
shīshe kī silā.ī meñ kaale bhuut kā chaḌhnā baam kaaTh kā ghoḌā niim kāñch kī golī 
barf meñ dabā makkhan maut rail aur rickshaw zindagī ḳhushī rickshaw rail motareñ Dolī

zāhid na kah burī ki ye mastāne aadmī haiñ tujh ko lipaT paḌeñge dīvāne aadmī haiñ 
ġhairoñ kī dostī par kyuuñ e'tibār kiije ye dushmanī kareñge begāne aadmī haiñ 
jo aadmī pe guzrī vo ik sivā tumhāre kyā jī lagā ke sunte afsāne aadmī haiñ 
kyā jur.ateñ jo ham ko darbāñ tumhārā Toke kah do ki ye to jāne-pahchāne aadmī haiñ 
mai buuñd bhar pilā kar kyā hañs rahā hai saaqī bhar bhar ke piite āḳhir paimāne aadmī haiñ 
tum ne hamāre dil meñ ghar kar liyā to kyā hai ābād karte āḳhir vīrāne aadmī haiñ 
nāseh se koī kah de kiije kalām aisā hazrat ko tā ki koī ye jaane aadmī haiñ 
jab dāvar-e-qayāmat pūchhegā tum pe rakh kar kah deñge saaf ham to begāne aadmī haiñ 
maiñ vo bashar ki mujh se har aadmī ko nafrat tum sham.a vo ki tum par parvāne aadmī haiñ 
mahfil bharī huī hai saudā.iyoñ se us kī us ġhairat-e-parī par dīvāne aadmī haiñ 
shābāsh 'dāġh' tujh ko kyā teġh-e-ishq khaa.ī jī karte haiñ vahī jo mardāne aadmī haiñ 
zahid na kah buri ki ye mastane aadmi hain tujh ko lipaT paDenge diwane aadmi hain 
ghairon ki dosti par kyun e'tibar kije ye dushmani karenge begane aadmi hain 
jo aadmi pe guzri wo ek siwa tumhaare kya ji laga ke sunte afsane aadmi hain 
kya juraten jo hum ko darban tumhaara Toke kah do ki ye to jaane-pahchane aadmi hain 
mai bund bhar pila kar kya hans raha hai saqi bhar bhar ke pite aaKHir paimane aadmi hain 
tum ne hamare dil mein ghar kar liya to kya hai aabaad karte aaKHir virane aadmi hain 
naseh se koi kah de kije kalam aisa hazrat ko ta ki koi ye jaane aadmi hain 
jab dawar-e-qayamat puchhega tum pe rakh kar kah denge saf hum to begane aadmi hain 
main wo bashar ki mujh se har aadmi ko nafrat tum shama wo ki tum par parwane aadmi hain 
mahfil bhari hui hai saudaiyon se us ki us ghairat-e-pari par diwane aadmi hain 
shabash 'dagh' tujh ko kya tegh-e-ishq khai ji karte hain wahi jo mardane aadmi hain

jo ho saktā hai us se vo kisī se ho nahīñ saktā magar dekho to phir kuchh aadmī se ho nahīñ saktā 
mohabbat meñ kare kyā kuchh kisī se ho nahīñ saktā mirā marnā bhī to merī ḳhushī se ho nahīñ saktā 
alag karnā raqīboñ kā ilāhī tujh ko āsāñ hai mujhe mushkil ki merī bekasī se ho nahīñ saktā 
kiyā hai vā'da-e-fardā unhoñ ne dekhiye kyā ho yahāñ sabr o tahammul aaj hī se ho nahīñ saktā 
ye mushtāq-e-shahādat kis jagah jaa.eñ kise DhūñDeñ ki terā kaam qātil jab tujhī se ho nahīñ saktā 
lagā kar teġh qissa paak kiije dād-ḳhvāhoñ kā kisī kā faisla gar munsifī se ho nahīñ saktā 
mirā dushman ba-zāhir chaar din ko dost hai terā kisī kā ho rahe ye har kisī se ho nahīñ saktā 
dam-e-pursish kahoge kyā vahāñ jab yaañ ye sūrat hai adā ik harf-e-vāda nāzukī se ho nahīñ saktā 
na kahiye go ki hāl-e-dil magar rañg-āshnā haiñ ham ye zāhir aap kī kyā ḳhāmushī se ho nahīñ saktā 
kiyā jo ham ne zālim kyā karegā ġhair muñh kyā hai kare to sabr aisā aadmī se ho nahīñ saktā 
chaman meñ naaz bulbul ne kiyā jo apnī naale par chaTak kar ġhuncha bolā kyā kisī se ho nahīñ saktā 
nahīñ gar tujh pe qaabū dil hī par kuchh zor ho apnā karūñ kyā ye bhī to nā-tāqatī se ho nahīñ saktā 
na ronā hai tarīqe kā na hañsnā hai salīqe kā pareshānī meñ koī kaam jī se ho nahīñ saktā 
huā huuñ is qadar mahjūb 'arz-e-mudda'ā kar ke ki ab to 'uzr bhī sharmindagī se ho nahīñ saktā 
ġhazab meñ jaan hai kyā kiije badla ranj-e-furqat kā badī se kar nahīñ sakte ḳhushī se ho nahīñ saktā 
mazā jo iztirāb-e-shauq se 'āshiq ko hai hāsil vo taslīm o razā o bandagī se ho nahīñ saktā 
ḳhudā jab dost hai ai 'dāġh' kyā dushman se andesha hamārā kuchh kisī kī dushmanī se ho nahīñ saktā 
jo ho sakta hai us se wo kisi se ho nahin sakta magar dekho to phir kuchh aadmi se ho nahin sakta 
mohabbat mein kare kya kuchh kisi se ho nahin sakta mera marna bhi to meri KHushi se ho nahin sakta 
alag karna raqibon ka ilahi tujh ko aasan hai mujhe mushkil ki meri bekasi se ho nahin sakta

laga kar tegh qissa pak kije dad-KHwahon ka kisi ka faisla gar munsifi se ho nahin sakta 
mera dushman ba-zahir chaar din ko dost hai tera kisi ka ho rahe ye har kisi se ho nahin sakta 
dam-e-pursish kahoge kya wahan jab yan ye surat hai ada ek harf-e-wada nazuki se ho nahin sakta 
na kahiye go ki haal-e-dil magar rang-ashna hain hum ye zahir aap ki kya KHamushi se ho nahin sakta 
kiya jo hum ne zalim kya karega ghair munh kya hai kare to sabr aisa aadmi se ho nahin sakta 
chaman mein naz bulbul ne kiya jo apni nale par chaTak kar ghuncha bola kya kisi se ho nahin sakta 
nahin gar tujh pe qabu dil hi par kuchh zor ho apna karun kya ye bhi to na-taqati se ho nahin sakta 
na rona hai tariqe ka na hansna hai saliqe ka pareshani mein koi kaam ji se ho nahin sakta 
hua hun is qadar mahjub 'arz-e-mudda'a kar ke ki ab to 'uzr bhi sharmindagi se ho nahin sakta 
ghazab mein jaan hai kya kije badla ranj-e-furqat ka badi se kar nahin sakte KHushi se ho nahin sakta

sitam hī karnā jafā hī karnā nigāh-e-ulfat kabhī na karnā tumheñ qasam hai hamāre sar kī hamāre haq meñ kamī na karnā 
hamārī mayyat pe tum jo aanā to chaar aañsū bahā ke jaanā zarā rahe pās-e-ābrū bhī kahīñ hamārī hañsī na karnā 
kahāñ kā aanā kahāñ kā jaanā vo jānte hī nahīñ ye rasmeñ vahāñ hai va.ade kī bhī ye sūrat kabhī to karnā kabhī na karnā 
liye to chalte haiñ hazrat-e-dil tumheñ bhī us anjuman meñ lekin hamāre pahlū meñ baiTh kar tum hamīñ se pahlū-tahī na karnā 
nahīñ hai kuchh qatl un kā āsāñ ye saḳht-jāñ haiñ bure balā ke qazā ko pahle sharīk karnā ye kaam apnī ḳhushī na karnā 
halāk andāz-e-vasl karnā ki parda rah jaa.e kuchh hamārā ġham-e-judā.ī meñ ḳhaak kar ke kahīñ adū kī ḳhushī na karnā 
mirī to hai baat zahr un ko vo un ke matlab hī kī na kyuuñ ho ki un se jo iltijā se kahnā ġhazab hai un ko vahī na karnā 
huā agar shauq aa.ine se to ruḳh rahe rāstī kī jānib misāl-e-āriz safā.ī rakhnā ba-rañg-e-kākul kajī na karnā 
vo hī hamārā tarīq-e-ulfat ki dushmanoñ se bhī mil ke chalnā ye ek sheva tirā sitamgar ki dost se dostī na karnā 
ham ek rasta galī kā us kī dikhā ke dil ko hue pashemāñ ye hazrat-e-ḳhizr ko jatā do kisī kī tum rahbarī na karnā 
bayān-e-dard-e-firāq kaisā ki hai vahāñ apnī ye haqīqat jo baat karnī to naala karnā nahīñ to vo bhī kabhī na karnā 
madār hai nāseho tumhīñ par tamām ab us kī munsifī kā zarā to kahnā ḳhudā-lagī bhī faqat suḳhan-parvarī na karnā 
burī hai ai 'dāġh' rāh-e-ulfat ḳhudā na le jaa.e aise raste jo apnī tum ḳhair chāhte ho to bhuul kar dil-lagī na karnā 
sitam hi karna jafa hi karna nigah-e-ulfat kabhi na karna tumhein qasam hai hamare sar ki hamare haq mein kami na karna 
hamari mayyat pe tum jo aana to chaar aansu baha ke jaana zara rahe pas-e-abru bhi kahin hamari hansi na karna 
kahan ka aana kahan ka jaana wo jaante hi nahin ye rasmen wahan hai wade ki bhi ye surat kabhi to karna kabhi na karna 
liye to chalte hain hazrat-e-dil tumhein bhi us anjuman mein lekin hamare pahlu mein baiTh kar tum hamin se pahlu-tahi na karna 
nahin hai kuchh qatl un ka aasan ye saKHt-jaan hain bure bala ke qaza ko pahle sharik karna ye kaam apni KHushi na karna 
halak andaz-e-wasl karna ki parda rah jae kuchh hamara gham-e-judai mein KHak kar ke kahin adu ki KHushi na karna 
meri to hai baat zahr un ko wo un ke matlab hi ki na kyun ho ki un se jo iltija se kahna ghazab hai un ko wahi na karna 
hua agar shauq aaine se to ruKH rahe rasti ki jaanib misal-e-ariz safai rakhna ba-rang-e-kakul kaji na karna 
wo hi hamara tariq-e-ulfat ki dushmanon se bhi mil ke chalna ye ek shewa tera sitamgar ki dost se dosti na karna 
hum ek rasta gali ka us ki dikha ke dil ko hue pasheman ye hazrat-e-KHizr ko jata do kisi ki tum rahbari na karna 
bayan-e-dard-e-firaq kaisa ki hai wahan apni ye haqiqat jo baat karni to nala karna nahin to wo bhi kabhi na karna 
madar hai naseho tumhin par tamam ab us ki munsifi ka zara to kahna KHuda-lagi bhi faqat suKHan-parwari na karna
