yaar sab jam.a hue raat kī ḳhāmoshī meñ koī ro kar to koī baal banā kar aayā 
chand us ghar ke darichon ke barabar aaya dil-e-mushtaq Thahar ja wahi manzar aaya 
main bahut KHush tha kaDi dhup ke sannaTe mein kyun teri yaad ka baadal mere sar par aaya 
bujh gai raunaq-e-parwana to mahfil chamki so gae ahl-e-tamanna to sitamgar aaya 
yar sab jama hue raat ki KHamoshi mein koi ro kar to koi baal bana kar aaya

kisī jānib se bhī parcham na lahū kā niklā ab ke mausam meñ bhī aalam vahī hū kā niklā 
dast-e-qātil se kuchh ummīd-e-shafā thī lekin nok-e-ḳhanjar se bhī kāñTā na gulū kā niklā 
ishq ilzām lagātā thā havas par kyā kyā ye munāfiq bhī tire vasl kā bhūkā niklā 
jī nahīñ chāhtā mai-ḳhāne ko jaa.eñ jab se shaiḳh bhī bazm-nashīñ ahl-e-subū kā niklā 
dil ko ham chhoḌ ke duniyā kī taraf aa.e the ye shabistāñ bhī isī ġhāliya-mū kā niklā 
ham abas sozan-o-rishta liye galiyoñ meñ phire kisī dil meñ na koī kaam rafū kā niklā 
yār-e-be-faiz se kyuuñ ham ko tavaqqo thī 'farāz' jo na apnā na hamārā na adū kā niklā 
kisi jaanib se bhi parcham na lahu ka nikla ab ke mausam mein bhi aalam wahi hu ka nikla 
dast-e-qatil se kuchh ummid-e-shafa thi lekin nok-e-KHanjar se bhi kanTa na gulu ka nikla 
ishq ilzam lagata tha hawas par kya kya ye munafiq bhi tere wasl ka bhuka nikla 
ji nahin chahta mai-KHane ko jaen jab se shaiKH bhi bazm-nashin ahl-e-subu ka nikla 
dil ko hum chhoD ke duniya ki taraf aae the ye shabistan bhi isi ghaaliya-mu ka nikla 
hum abas sozan-o-rishta liye galiyon mein phire kisi dil mein na koi kaam rafu ka nikla 
yar-e-be-faiz se kyun hum ko tawaqqo thi 'faraaz' jo na apna na hamara na adu ka nikla

dil pareshān huā jaatā hai aur sāmān huā jaatā hai 
ḳhidmat-e-pīr-e-muġhāñ kar zāhid tū ab insān huā jaatā hai 
maut se pahle mujhe qatl karo us kā ehsān huā jaatā hai 
lazzat-e-ishq ilāhī miT jaa.e dard armān huā jaatā hai 
dam zarā lo ki mirā dam tum par abhī qurbān huā jaatā hai 
girya kyā zabt karūñ ai nāseh ashk paimān huā jaatā hai 
bevafā.ī se bhī rafta rafta vo mirī jaan huā jaatā hai 
arsa-e-hashr meñ vo aa pahuñche saaf maidān huā jaatā hai 
madad ai himmat-e-dushvār-pasañd kaam āsān huā jaatā hai 
chhā.ī jaatī hai ye vahshat kaisī ghar bayābān huā jaatā hai 
shikva sun aañkh milā kar zālim kyuuñ pashemān huā jaatā hai 
ātish-e-shauq bujhī jaatī hai ḳhaak armān huā jaatā hai 
uzr jaane meñ na kar ai qāsid tū bhī nādān huā jaatā hai 
muztarib kyuuñ na hoñ armāñ dil meñ qaid mehmān huā jaatā hai 
'dāġh' ḳhāmosh na lag jaa.e nazar sher dīvān huā jaatā hai 
dil pareshan hua jata hai aur saman hua jata hai 
KHidmat-e-pir-e-mughan kar zahid tu ab insan hua jata hai 
maut se pahle mujhe qatl karo us ka ehsan hua jata hai 
lazzat-e-ishq ilahi miT jae dard arman hua jata hai 
dam zara lo ki mera dam tum par abhi qurban hua jata hai 
girya kya zabt karun ai naseh ashk paiman hua jata hai 
bewafai se bhi rafta rafta wo meri jaan hua jata hai 
arsa-e-hashr mein wo aa pahunche saf maidan hua jata hai 
madad ai himmat-e-dushwar-pasand kaam aasan hua jata hai 
chhai jati hai ye wahshat kaisi ghar bayaban hua jata hai 
shikwa sun aankh mila kar zalim kyun pasheman hua jata hai 
aatish-e-shauq bujhi jati hai KHak arman hua jata hai 
uzr jaane mein na kar ai qasid tu bhi nadan hua jata hai 
muztarib kyun na hon arman dil mein qaid mehman hua jata hai 
'dagh' KHamosh na lag jae nazar sher diwan hua jata hai

haath se nāptā huuñ dard kī gahrā.ī ko ye nayā khel milā hai mirī tanhā.ī ko 
thā jo siine meñ charāġh-e-dil-e-pur-ḳhūñ na rahā chāTiye baiTh ke ab sabr-o-shakebā.ī ko 
dil-e-afsurda kisī tarah bahaltā hī nahīñ kyā kareñ aap kī is hausla-afzā.ī ko 
ḳhair badnām to pahle bhī bahut the lekin tujh se milnā thā ki par lag ga.e rusvā.ī ko 
nigah-e-nāz na milte hue ghabrā ham se ham mohabbat nahīñ kahne ke shanāsā.ī ko 
dil hai nairangī-e-ayyām pe hairāñ ab tak itnī sī baat bhī mā'lūm nahīñ bhaa.ī ko 
hath se napta hun dard ki gahrai ko ye naya khel mila hai meri tanhai ko 
tha jo sine mein charagh-e-dil-e-pur-KHun na raha chaTiye baiTh ke ab sabr-o-shakebai ko 
dil-e-afsurda kisi tarah bahalta hi nahin kya karen aap ki is hausla-afzai ko 
KHair badnam to pahle bhi bahut the lekin tujh se milna tha ki par lag gae ruswai ko 
nigah-e-naz na milte hue ghabra hum se hum mohabbat nahin kahne ke shanasai ko 
dil hai nairangi-e-ayyam pe hairan ab tak itni si baat bhi ma'lum nahin bhai ko

yād-e-ġhazāl-chashmāñ zikr-e-saman-azārāñ jab chāhā kar liyā hai kunj-e-qafas bahārāñ 
āñkhoñ meñ dard-mandī hoñToñ pe uzr-ḳhvāhī jānāna vaar aa.ī shām-e-firāqyāra 
nāmūs-e-jān-o-dil kī baazī lagī thī varna āsāñ na thī kuchh aisī rāh-e-vafā-shi.ārāñ 
mujrim ho ḳhvāh koī rahtā hai nāsehoñ kā rū-e-suḳhan hamesha sū-e-jigar-figārāñ 
hai ab bhī vaqt zāhid tarmīm-e-zuhd kar le sū-e-haram chalā hai amboh-e-bāda-ḳhvārāñ 
shāyad qarīb pahuñchī sub.h-e-visāl hamdam mauj-e-sabā liye hai ḳhush-bū-e-ḳhush-kinārāñ 
hai apnī kisht-e-vīrāñ sarsabz is yaqīñ se ā.eñge is taraf bhī ik roz abr-o-bārāñ 
aa.egī 'faiz' ik din bād-e-bahār le kar taslīm-e-mai-faroshāñ paiġhām-e-mai-gusārāñ 
yaad-e-ghazal-chashman zikr-e-saman-azaran jab chaha kar liya hai kunj-e-qafas bahaaran 
aankhon mein dard-mandi honTon pe uzr-KHwahi jaanana war aai sham-e-firaqyara 
namus-e-jaan-o-dil ki bazi lagi thi warna aasan na thi kuchh aisi rah-e-wafa-shiaran 
mujrim ho KHwah koi rahta hai nasehon ka ru-e-suKHan hamesha su-e-jigar-figaran 
hai ab bhi waqt zahid tarmim-e-zuhd kar le su-e-haram chala hai amboh-e-baada-KHwaran 
shayad qarib pahunchi subh-e-visal hamdam mauj-e-saba liye hai KHush-bu-e-KHush-kinaran 
hai apni kisht-e-viran sarsabz is yaqin se aaenge is taraf bhi ek roz abr-o-baran 
aaegi 'faiz' ek din baad-e-bahaar le kar taslim-e-mai-faroshan paigham-e-mai-gusaran

sunsān rāstoñ se savārī na aa.egī ab dhuul se aTī huī laarī na aa.egī 
chhappar ke chā.e-ḳhāne bhī ab ūñghne lage paidal chalo ki koī savārī na aa.egī 
tahrīr o guftugū meñ kise DhūñDte haiñ log tasvīr meñ bhī shakl hamārī na aa.egī 
sar par zamīn le ke havāoñ ke saath jā āhista chalne vaale kī baarī na aa.egī 
pahchān apnī ham ne miTā.ī hai is tarah bachchoñ meñ koī baat hamārī na aa.egī 
sunsan raston se sawari na aaegi ab dhul se aTi hui lari na aaegi 
chhappar ke chae-KHane bhi ab unghne lage paidal chalo ki koi sawari na aaegi 
tahrir o guftugu mein kise DhunDte hain log taswir mein bhi shakl hamari na aaegi 
sar par zamin le ke hawaon ke sath ja aahista chalne wale ki bari na aaegi 
pahchan apni hum ne miTai hai is tarah bachchon mein koi baat hamari na aaegi

maze ishq ke kuchh vahī jānte haiñ ki jo maut ko zindagī jānte haiñ 
shab-e-vasl liiñ un kī itnī balā.eñ ki hamdam mire haath hī jānte haiñ 
na ho dil to kyā lutf-e-āzār-o-rāhat barābar ḳhushī nā-ḳhushī jānte haiñ 
jo hai mere dil meñ unhīñ ko ḳhabar hai jo maiñ jāntā huuñ vahī jānte haiñ 
paḌā huuñ sar-e-bazm maiñ dam churā.e magar vo ise be-ḳhudī jānte haiñ 
kahāñ qadr-e-ham-jins ham-jins ko hai farishtoñ ko bhī aadmī jānte haiñ 
kahūñ hāl-e-dil to kaheñ us se hāsil sabhī ko ḳhabar hai sabhī jānte haiñ 
vo nādān anjān bhole haiñ aise ki sab sheva-e-dushmanī jānte haiñ 
nahīñ jānte is kā anjām kyā hai vo marnā merā dil-lagī jānte haiñ 
samajhtā hai tū 'dāġh' ko rind zāhid magar rind us ko valī jānte haiñ 
maze ishq ke kuchh wahi jaante hain ki jo maut ko zindagi jaante hain 
shab-e-wasl lin un ki itni balaen ki hamdam mere hath hi jaante hain 
na ho dil to kya lutf-e-azar-o-rahat barabar KHushi na-KHushi jaante hain 
jo hai mere dil mein unhin ko KHabar hai jo main jaanta hun wahi jaante hain 
paDa hun sar-e-bazm main dam churae magar wo ise be-KHudi jaante hain 
kahan qadr-e-ham-jins ham-jins ko hai farishton ko bhi aadmi jaante hain 
kahun haal-e-dil to kahen us se hasil sabhi ko KHabar hai sabhi jaante hain 
wo nadan anjaan bhole hain aise ki sab shewa-e-dushmani jaante hain 
nahin jaante is ka anjam kya hai wo marna mera dil-lagi jaante hain 
samajhta hai tu 'dagh' ko rind zahid magar rind us ko wali jaante hain

sū-e-falak na jānib-e-mahtāb dekhnā is shahr-e-dil-navāz ke ādāb dekhnā 
tujh ko kahāñ chhupā.eñ ki dil par giraft ho āñkhoñ ko kyā kareñ ki vahī ḳhvāb dekhnā 
vo mauj-e-ḳhūñ uThī hai ki dīvār-o-dar kahāñ ab ke fasīl-e-shahr ko ġharqāb dekhnā 
in sūratoñ ko tarsegī chashm-e-jahāñ ki aaj kamyāb haiñ to kal hameñ nāyāb dekhnā 
phir ḳhūn-e-ḳhalq o gardan-e-mīnā bachā.iyo par chal paḌā hai zikr-e-mai-e-nāb dekhnā 
ābād kū-e-chāk-e-garebāñ jo phir huā dast-e-raqīb o dāman-e-ahbāb dekhnā 
ham le to aa.e haiñ tujhe ik be-dilī ke saath is anjuman meñ ai dil-e-betāb dekhnā 
had chāhiye 'farāz' vafā meñ bhī aur tumheñ ġham dekhnā na dil kī tab-o-tāb dekhnā 
su-e-falak na jaanib-e-mahtab dekhna is shahr-e-dil-nawaz ke aadab dekhna 
tujh ko kahan chhupaen ki dil par giraft ho aankhon ko kya karen ki wahi KHwab dekhna 
wo mauj-e-KHun uThi hai ki diwar-o-dar kahan ab ke fasil-e-shahr ko gharqab dekhna 
in suraton ko tarsegi chashm-e-jahan ki aaj kamyab hain to kal hamein nayab dekhna 
phir KHun-e-KHalq o gardan-e-mina bachaiyo par chal paDa hai zikr-e-mai-e-nab dekhna 
aabaad ku-e-chaak-e-gareban jo phir hua dast-e-raqib o daman-e-ahbab dekhna 
hum le to aae hain tujhe ek be-dili ke sath is anjuman mein ai dil-e-betab dekhna 
had chahiye 'faraaz' wafa mein bhi aur tumhein gham dekhna na dil ki tab-o-tab dekhna

hañs rahā thā maiñ bahut go vaqt vo rone kā thā saḳht kitnā marhala tujh se judā hone kā thā 
rat-jage taqsīm kartī phir rahī haiñ shahr meñ shauq jin āñkhoñ ko kal tak raat meñ sone kā thā 
is safar meñ bas mirī tanhā.ī mere saath thī har qadam kyuuñ ḳhauf mujh ko bhiiḌ meñ khone kā thā 
har bun-e-mū se darindoñ kī sadā aane lagī kaam hī aisā badan meñ ḳhvāhisheñ bone kā thā 
maiñ ne jab se ye sunā hai ḳhud se bhī nādim huuñ maiñ zikr tujh hoñToñ pe mere dar-ba-dar hone kā thā 
hans raha tha main bahut go waqt wo rone ka tha saKHt kitna marhala tujh se juda hone ka tha 
rat-jage taqsim karti phir rahi hain shahr mein shauq jin aankhon ko kal tak raat mein sone ka tha 
is safar mein bas meri tanhai mere sath thi har qadam kyun KHauf mujh ko bhiD mein khone ka tha 
har bun-e-mu se darindon ki sada aane lagi kaam hi aisa badan mein KHwahishen bone ka tha 
main ne jab se ye suna hai KHud se bhi nadim hun main zikr tujh honTon pe mere dar-ba-dar hone ka tha

har koī turra-e-pechāk pahan kar niklā ek maiñ pairahan-e-ḳhāk pahan kar niklā 
aur phir sab ne ye dekhā ki isī maqtal se merā qātil mirī poshāk pahan kar niklā 
ek banda thā ki oḌhe thā ḳhudā.ī saarī ik sitāra thā ki aflāk pahan kar niklā 
aisī nafrat thī ki is shahr ko jab aag lagī har bagūla ḳhas-o-ḳhāshāk pahan kar niklā 
tarkash o daam abas le ke chalā hai sayyād jo bhī naḳhchīr hai fitrāk pahan kar niklā 
us ke qāmat se use jaan ga.e log 'farāz' jo labāda bhī vo chālāk pahan kar niklā 
har koi turra-e-pechaak pahan kar nikla ek main pairahan-e-KHak pahan kar nikla 
aur phir sab ne ye dekha ki isi maqtal se mera qatil meri poshak pahan kar nikla 
ek banda tha ki oDhe tha KHudai sari ek sitara tha ki aflak pahan kar nikla 
aisi nafrat thi ki is shahr ko jab aag lagi har bagula KHas-o-KHashak pahan kar nikla 
tarkash o dam abas le ke chala hai sayyaad jo bhi naKHchir hai fitrak pahan kar nikla 
us ke qamat se use jaan gae log 'faraaz' jo labaada bhi wo chaalak pahan kar nikla

dil meñ vo shor na āñkhoñ meñ vo nam rahtā hai ab tap-e-hijr tavaqqo se bhī kam rahtā hai 
kabhī sho.ale se lapakte the mire siine meñ ab kisī vaqt dhuāñ sā koī dam rahtā hai 
kyā ḳhudā jaane mire dil ko huā tere ba.ad na ḳhushī is meñ Thahartī hai na ġham rahtā hai 
rishta-e-tār-e-tamannā nahīñ TuuTā ab tak ab bhī āñkhoñ meñ tirī zulf kā ḳham rahtā hai 
chhoḌ jaatī hai har ik rut koī ḳhushbū koī rañg na sitam rahtā hai baaqī na karam rahtā hai 
dil mein wo shor na aankhon mein wo nam rahta hai ab tap-e-hijr tawaqqo se bhi kam rahta hai 
kabhi shoale se lapakte the mere sine mein ab kisi waqt dhuan sa koi dam rahta hai 
kya KHuda jaane mere dil ko hua tere baad na KHushi is mein Thaharti hai na gham rahta hai 
rishta-e-tar-e-tamanna nahin TuTa ab tak ab bhi aankhon mein teri zulf ka KHam rahta hai 
chhoD jati hai har ek rut koi KHushbu koi rang na sitam rahta hai baqi na karam rahta hai

haath nikle apne donoñ kaam ke dil ko thāmā un kā dāman thaam ke 
ghūñT pī kar bāda-e-gulfām ke bose le letā huuñ ḳhālī jaam ke 
raat din phirtā hai kyuuñ ai charḳh-e-pīr tere din haiñ rāhat o ārām ke 
is nazākat kā burā ho bazm se uThte haiñ vo dast-e-dushman thaam ke 
chashm-e-mast-e-yār kī ik dhuum hai aaj kal haiñ daur daur-e-jām ke 
yā jigar meñ yā rahegā dil meñ tiir ye hī do goshe to haiñ ārām ke 
vo kareñ uzr-e-vafā achchhī kahī mujh pe radde rakhte haiñ ilzām ke 
jab qadam kaabe se rakkhā sū-e-dair taar uljhe jāma-e-ehrām ke 
ḳhush haiñ vo daur-e-falak se aaj kal din phire haiñ gardish-e-ayyām ke 
aa gayā hai bhuul kar ḳhat is taraf vo to āshiq haiñ mire hamnām ke 
haath se sayyād ke gir kar chhurī kaT ga.e halqe hamāre daam ke 
qāsidoñ ke muntazir rahne lage paḌ ga.e un ko maze paiġhām ke 
kyā kisī dargāh meñ jaanā hai aaj sub.h se sāmān haiñ hammām ke 
pūchhte haiñ hazrat-e-zāhid se rind daam kyā haiñ jāma-e-ehrām ke 
lab utar aa.e haiñ vo tārīf par ham jo aadī ho ga.e dushnām ke 
dāva-e-ishq-o-vafā par ye kahā sab bajā lekin mire kis kaam ke 
ban-sañvar kar kab bigaḌtā hai banāo sub.h tak rahte haiñ jalve shaam ke 
jaur se yā lutf se puurā kiyā aap pīchhe paḌ ga.e jis kaam ke 
hai gadā-e-mai-kada bhī kyā harīs bhar liye jholī meñ TukḌe jaam ke 
naala o fariyād kī tāqat kahāñ baat kartā huuñ kalejā thaam ke 
ḳhūgar-e-bedād ko rāhat hai maut bhāgtā huuñ naam se ārām ke 
'dāġh' ke sab harf likhte haiñ judā TukḌe kar Daale hamāre naam ke 
hath nikle apne donon kaam ke dil ko thama un ka daman tham ke 
ghunT pi kar baada-e-gulfam ke bose le leta hun KHali jam ke 
raat din phirta hai kyun ai charKH-e-pir tere din hain rahat o aaram ke 
is nazakat ka bura ho bazm se uThte hain wo dast-e-dushman tham ke 
chashm-e-mast-e-yar ki ek dhum hai aaj kal hain daur daur-e-jam ke 
ya jigar mein ya rahega dil mein tir ye hi do goshe to hain aaram ke 
wo karen uzr-e-wafa achchhi kahi mujh pe radde rakhte hain ilzam ke 
jab qadam kabe se rakkha su-e-dair tar uljhe jama-e-ehram ke 
KHush hain wo daur-e-falak se aaj kal din phire hain gardish-e-ayyam ke 
aa gaya hai bhul kar KHat is taraf wo to aashiq hain mere hamnam ke 
hath se sayyaad ke gir kar chhuri kaT gae halqe hamare dam ke 
qasidon ke muntazir rahne lage paD gae un ko maze paigham ke 
kya kisi dargah mein jaana hai aaj subh se saman hain hammam ke 
puchhte hain hazrat-e-zahid se rind dam kya hain jama-e-ehram ke 
lab utar aae hain wo tarif par hum jo aadi ho gae dushnam ke 
dawa-e-ishq-o-wafa par ye kaha sab baja lekin mere kis kaam ke 
ban-sanwar kar kab bigaDta hai banao subh tak rahte hain jalwe sham ke 
jaur se ya lutf se pura kiya aap pichhe paD gae jis kaam ke 
hai gada-e-mai-kada bhi kya haris bhar liye jholi mein TukDe jam ke 
nala o fariyaad ki taqat kahan baat karta hun kaleja tham ke 
KHugar-e-bedad ko rahat hai maut bhagta hun nam se aaram ke 
'dagh' ke sab harf likhte hain juda TukDe kar Dale hamare nam ke

diloñ kī or dhuāñ sā dikhā.ī detā hai ye shahr to mujhe jaltā dikhā.ī detā hai 
jahāñ ki daaġh hai yaañ aage dard rahtā thā magar ye daaġh bhī jaatā dikhā.ī detā hai 
pukārtī haiñ bhare shahr kī guzargāheñ vo roz shaam ko tanhā dikhā.ī detā hai 
ye log TuuTī huī kashtiyoñ meñ sote haiñ mire makān se dariyā dikhā.ī detā hai 
ḳhizāñ ke zard dinoñ kī siyāh rātoñ meñ kisī kā phuul sā chehra dikhā.ī detā hai 
kahīñ mile vo sar-e-rāh to lipaT jaa.eñ bas ab to ek hī rasta dikhā.ī detā hai 
dilon ki or dhuan sa dikhai deta hai ye shahr to mujhe jalta dikhai deta hai 
jahan ki dagh hai yan aage dard rahta tha magar ye dagh bhi jata dikhai deta hai 
pukarti hain bhare shahr ki guzargahen wo roz sham ko tanha dikhai deta hai 
ye log TuTi hui kashtiyon mein sote hain mere makan se dariya dikhai deta hai 
KHizan ke zard dinon ki siyah raaton mein kisi ka phul sa chehra dikhai deta hai 
kahin mile wo sar-e-rah to lipaT jaen bas ab to ek hi rasta dikhai deta hai

shabnam ko ret phuul ko kāñTā banā diyā ham ne to apne baaġh ko sahrā banā diyā 
is uuñch niich par to Thaharte nahīñ the paañv kis dast-e-shauq ne ise duniyā banā diyā 
kin muTThiyoñ ne biij bikhere zamīn par kin bārishoñ ne is ko tamāshā banā diyā 
sairāb kar diyā tirī mauj-e-ḳhirām ne rakkhā jahāñ qadam vahāñ dariyā banā diyā 
ik raat chāñdnī mire bistar pe aa.ī thī maiñ ne tarāsh kar tirā chehra banā diyā 
pūchhe agar koī to use kyā batāoñ maiñ dil kyā thaa, tere ġham ne ise kyā banā diyā 
shabnam ko ret phul ko kanTa bana diya hum ne to apne bagh ko sahra bana diya 
is unch nich par to Thaharte nahin the panw kis dast-e-shauq ne ise duniya bana diya 
kin muTThiyon ne bij bikhere zamin par kin barishon ne is ko tamasha bana diya 
sairab kar diya teri mauj-e-KHiram ne rakkha jahan qadam wahan dariya bana diya 
ek raat chandni mere bistar pe aai thi main ne tarash kar tera chehra bana diya 
puchhe agar koi to use kya bataon main dil kya tha, tere gham ne ise kya bana diya

lubhātā hai agarche husn-e-dariyā Dar rahā huuñ maiñ sabab ye hai ki ik muddat kināre par rahā huuñ maiñ 
ye jhoñke jin se dil meñ tāzgī āñkhoñ meñ ThanDak hai inhī jhoñkoñ se murjhāyā huā shab bhar rahā huuñ maiñ 
tire aane kā din hai tere raste meñ bichhāne ko chamaktī dhuup meñ saa.e ikaTThe kar rahā huuñ maiñ 
koī kamra hai jis ke taaq meñ ik sham.a jaltī hai añdherī raat hai aur saañs lete Dar rahā huuñ maiñ 
mujhe ma.alūm hai ahl-e-vafā par kyā guzartī hai samajh kar soch kar tujh se mohabbat kar rahā huuñ maiñ 
lubhata hai agarche husn-e-dariya Dar raha hun main sabab ye hai ki ek muddat kinare par raha hun main 
ye jhonke jin se dil mein tazgi aankhon mein ThanDak hai inhi jhonkon se murjhaya hua shab bhar raha hun main 
tere aane ka din hai tere raste mein bichhane ko chamakti dhup mein sae ikaTThe kar raha hun main 
koi kamra hai jis ke taq mein ek shama jalti hai andheri raat hai aur sans lete Dar raha hun main 
mujhe malum hai ahl-e-wafa par kya guzarti hai samajh kar soch kar tujh se mohabbat kar raha hun main

in mausamoñ meñ nāchte gaate raheñge ham hañste raheñge shor machāte raheñge ham 
lab suukh kyuuñ na jaa.eñ galā baiTh kyuuñ na jaa.e dil meñ haiñ jo savāl uThāte raheñge ham 
apnī rah-e-sulūk meñ chup rahnā manā hai chup rah ga.e to jaan se jaate raheñge ham 
nikle to is tarah ki dikhā.ī nahīñ diye Duube to der tak nazar aate raheñge ham 
dukh ke safar pe dil ko ravāna to kar diyā ab saarī umr haath hilāte raheñge ham 
in mausamon mein nachte gate rahenge hum hanste rahenge shor machate rahenge hum 
lab sukh kyun na jaen gala baiTh kyun na jae dil mein hain jo sawal uThate rahenge hum 
apni rah-e-suluk mein chup rahna mana hai chup rah gae to jaan se jate rahenge hum 
nikle to is tarah ki dikhai nahin diye Dube to der tak nazar aate rahenge hum 
dukh ke safar pe dil ko rawana to kar diya ab sari umr hath hilate rahenge hum

kahūñ kis se raat kā mājrā na.e manzaroñ pe nigāh thī na kisī kā dāman-e-chāk thā na kisī kī tarf-e-kulāh thī 
ka.ī chāñd the sar-e-āsmāñ ki chamak chamak ke palaT ga.e na lahū mire hī jigar meñ thā na tumhārī zulf siyāh thī 
dil-e-kam-alam pe vo kaifiyat ki Thahar sake na guzar sake na hazar hī rāhat-e-rūh thā na safar meñ rāmish raah thī 
mire chār-dāñg thī jalvagar vahī lazzat-e-talab-e-sahar magar ik ummīd-e-shikasta-par ki misāl-e-dard siyāh thī 
vo jo raat mujh ko baḌe adab se salām kar ke chalā gayā use kyā ḳhabar mire dil meñ bhī kabhī ārzū-e-gunāh thī 
kahun kis se raat ka majra nae manzaron pe nigah thi na kisi ka daman-e-chaak tha na kisi ki tarf-e-kulah thi 
kai chand the sar-e-asman ki chamak chamak ke palaT gae na lahu mere hi jigar mein tha na tumhaari zulf siyah thi 
dil-e-kam-alam pe wo kaifiyat ki Thahar sake na guzar sake na hazar hi rahat-e-ruh tha na safar mein ramish rah thi 
mere chaar-dang thi jalwagar wahi lazzat-e-talab-e-sahar magar ek ummid-e-shikasta-par ki misal-e-dard siyah thi 
wo jo raat mujh ko baDe adab se salam kar ke chala gaya use kya KHabar mere dil mein bhi kabhi aarzu-e-gunah thi

ḳhū samajh meñ nahīñ aatī tire dīvānoñ kī dāmanoñ kī na ḳhabar hai na girebānoñ kī 
jalva-e-sāġhar-o-mīnā hai jo ham-rañg-e-bahār raunaqeñ turfa taraqqī pe haiñ mai-ḳhānoñ kī 
har taraf be-ḳhudī o be-ḳhabarī kī hai numūd qābil-e-dīd hai duniyā tire hairānoñ kī 
sahl is se to yahī hai ki sambhāleñ dil ko minnateñ kaun kare aap ke darbānoñ kī 
aañkh vaale tirī sūrat pe miTe jaate haiñ sham-e-mahfil kī taraf bhiiḌ hai parvānoñ kī 
ai jafākār tire ahd se pahle to na thī kasrat is darja mohabbat ke pashīmānoñ kī 
rāz-e-ġham se hameñ āgāh kiyā ḳhuub kiyā kuchh nihāyat hī nahīñ aap ke ehsānoñ kī 
dushman-e-ahl-e-muravvat hai vo begāna-e-uns shakl pariyoñ kī hai ḳhū bhī nahīñ insānoñ kī 
hamrah-e-ġhair mubārak unheñ gul-gasht-e-chaman sair ham ko bhī mayassar hai bayābānoñ kī 
ik bakheḌā hai nazar meñ sar-o-sāmān-e-vajūd ab ye hālat hai tire soḳhta-sāmānoñ kī 
faiz-e-sāqī kī ajab dhuum hai mai-ḳhānoñ meñ har taraf mai kī talab maañg hai paimānoñ kī 
āshiqoñ hī kā jigar hai ki haiñ ḳhursañd-e-jafā kāfiroñ kī hai ye himmat na musalmānoñ kī 
yaad phir taaza huī haal se tere 'hasrat' qais o farhād ke guzre hue afsānoñ kī 
KHu samajh mein nahin aati tere diwanon ki damanon ki na KHabar hai na girebanon ki 
jalwa-e-saghar-o-mina hai jo ham-rang-e-bahaar raunaqen turfa taraqqi pe hain mai-KHanon ki 
har taraf be-KHudi o be-KHabari ki hai numud qabil-e-did hai duniya tere hairanon ki 
sahl is se to yahi hai ki sambhaalen dil ko minnaten kaun kare aap ke darbanon ki 
aankh wale teri surat pe miTe jate hain sham-e-mahfil ki taraf bhiD hai parwanon ki 
ai jafakar tere ahd se pahle to na thi kasrat is darja mohabbat ke pashimanon ki 
raaz-e-gham se hamein aagah kiya KHub kiya kuchh nihayat hi nahin aap ke ehsanon ki 
dushman-e-ahl-e-murawwat hai wo begana-e-uns shakl pariyon ki hai KHu bhi nahin insanon ki 
hamrah-e-ghair mubarak unhen gul-gasht-e-chaman sair hum ko bhi mayassar hai bayabanon ki 
ek bakheDa hai nazar mein sar-o-saman-e-wajud ab ye haalat hai tere soKHta-samanon ki 
faiz-e-saqi ki ajab dhum hai mai-KHanon mein har taraf mai ki talab mang hai paimanon ki 
aashiqon hi ka jigar hai ki hain KHursand-e-jafa kafiron ki hai ye himmat na musalmanon ki 
yaad phir taza hui haal se tere 'hasrat' qais o farhad ke guzre hue afsanon ki

jalve mirī nigāh meñ kaun-o-makāñ ke haiñ mujh se kahāñ chhupeñge vo aise kahāñ ke haiñ 
khulte nahīñ haiñ raaz jo soz-e-nihāñ ke haiñ kyā phūTne ke vāste chhāle zabāñ ke haiñ 
karte haiñ qatl vo talab-e-maġhfirat ke ba.ad jo the duā ke haath vahī imtihāñ ke haiñ 
jis roz kuchh sharīk huī merī musht-e-ḳhāk us roz se zamīñ pe sitam āsmāñ ke haiñ 
baazū dikhā.e tum ne lagā kar hazār haath puure paḌe to vo bhī bahut imtihāñ ke haiñ 
nāseh ke sāmne kabhī sach boltā nahīñ merī zabāñ meñ rañg tumhārī zabāñ ke haiñ 
kaisā javāb hazrat-e-dil dekhiye zarā paiġhām-bar ke haath meñ TukḌe zabāñ ke haiñ 
kyā iztirāb-e-shauq ne mujh ko ḳhajil kiyā vo pūchhte haiñ kahiye irāde kahāñ ke haiñ 
āshiq tire adam ko ga.e kis qadar tabāh pūchhā har ek ne ye musāfir kahāñ ke haiñ 
har-chand 'dāġh' ek hī ayyār hai magar dushman bhī to chhaTe hue saare jahāñ ke haiñ 
jalwe meri nigah mein kaun-o-makan ke hain mujh se kahan chhupenge wo aise kahan ke hain 
khulte nahin hain raaz jo soz-e-nihan ke hain kya phuTne ke waste chhaale zaban ke hain 
karte hain qatl wo talab-e-maghfirat ke baad jo the dua ke hath wahi imtihan ke hain 
jis roz kuchh sharik hui meri musht-e-KHak us roz se zamin pe sitam aasman ke hain 
bazu dikhae tum ne laga kar hazar hath pure paDe to wo bhi bahut imtihan ke hain 
naseh ke samne kabhi sach bolta nahin meri zaban mein rang tumhaari zaban ke hain 
kaisa jawab hazrat-e-dil dekhiye zara paigham-bar ke hath mein TukDe zaban ke hain 
kya iztirab-e-shauq ne mujh ko KHajil kiya wo puchhte hain kahiye irade kahan ke hain 
aashiq tere adam ko gae kis qadar tabah puchha har ek ne ye musafir kahan ke hain 
har-chand 'dagh' ek hi ayyar hai magar dushman bhi to chhaTe hue sare jahan ke hain

kuchh laag kuchh lagāv mohabbat meñ chāhiye donoñ tarah kā rañg tabī.at meñ chāhiye 
ye kyā ki but bane hue baiThe ho bazm meñ kuchh be-takallufī bhī to ḳhalvat meñ chāhiye 
vo ibtidā-e-ishq meñ hāsil huī mujhe jo baat intihā-e-mohabbat meñ chāhiye 
ā.eñge be-shumār farishte azaab ke maidān-e-hashr ġhair kī turbat meñ chāhiye 
kuchh to paḌe dabāo dil-e-be-qarār par paarā bharā huā mirī turbat meñ chāhiye 
māshūq ke kahe kā burā mānte ho 'dāġh' bardāsht aadmī kī tabī.at meñ chāhiye 
kuchh lag kuchh lagaw mohabbat mein chahiye donon tarah ka rang tabiat mein chahiye 
ye kya ki but bane hue baiThe ho bazm mein kuchh be-takallufi bhi to KHalwat mein chahiye 
wo ibtida-e-ishq mein hasil hui mujhe jo baat intiha-e-mohabbat mein chahiye 
aaenge be-shumar farishte azab ke maidan-e-hashr ghair ki turbat mein chahiye 
kuchh to paDe dabao dil-e-be-qarar par para bhara hua meri turbat mein chahiye 
mashuq ke kahe ka bura mante ho 'dagh' bardasht aadmi ki tabiat mein chahiye

na sahī gar unheñ ḳhayāl nahīñ ki hamārā bhī ab vo haal nahīñ 
yaad unheñ vāda-e-visāl nahīñ kab kiyā thā yahī ḳhayāl nahīñ 
aise bigḌe vo sun ke shauq kī baat aaj tak ham se bol-chāl nahīñ 
mujh ko ab ġham ye hai ki baad mire ḳhātir-e-yār be-malāl nahīñ 
afv-e-haq kā hai mai-kashoñ pe nuzūl rezish-e-abr-e-barshagāl nahīñ 
ham pe kyuuñ arz-e-hāl-e-dil pe itaab elchī ko kahīñ zavāl nahīñ 
sun ke mujh se vo ḳhvāhish-e-pā-bos hañs ke kahne lage majāl nahīñ 
dil ko hai yaad shauq kā vo hunar jis se baḌh kar koī kamāl nahīñ 
aap nādim na hoñ ki 'hasrat' se shikva-e-ġham kā ehtimāl nahīñ 
na sahi gar unhen KHayal nahin ki hamara bhi ab wo haal nahin 
yaad unhen wada-e-visal nahin kab kiya tha yahi KHayal nahin 
aise bigDe wo sun ke shauq ki baat aaj tak hum se bol-chaal nahin 
mujh ko ab gham ye hai ki baad mere KHatir-e-yar be-malal nahin 
afw-e-haq ka hai mai-kashon pe nuzul rezish-e-abr-e-barshagal nahin 
hum pe kyun arz-e-haal-e-dil pe itab elchi ko kahin zawal nahin 
sun ke mujh se wo KHwahish-e-pa-bos hans ke kahne lage majal nahin 
dil ko hai yaad shauq ka wo hunar jis se baDh kar koi kamal nahin 
aap nadim na hon ki 'hasrat' se shikwa-e-gham ka ehtimal nahin

duniyā meñ surāġh-e-rah-e-duniyā nahīñ miltā dariyā meñ utar jaa.eñ to dariyā nahīñ miltā 
baaqī to mukammal hai tamannā kī imārat ik guzre hue vaqt kā shīsha nahīñ miltā 
jaate hue har chiiz yahīñ chhoḌ gayā thā lauTā huuñ to ik dhuup kā TukḌā nahīñ miltā 
jo dil meñ samā.e the vo ab shāmil-e-dil haiñ is aa.ine meñ aks kisī kā nahīñ miltā 
tū ne hī to chāhā thā ki miltā rahūñ tujh se terī yahī marzī hai to achchhā nahīñ miltā 
dil meñ to dhaḌakne kī sadā bhī nahīñ 'mushtāq' raste meñ hai vo bhiiḌ ki rasta nahīñ miltā 
duniya mein suragh-e-rah-e-duniya nahin milta dariya mein utar jaen to dariya nahin milta 
baqi to mukammal hai tamanna ki imarat ek guzre hue waqt ka shisha nahin milta 
jate hue har chiz yahin chhoD gaya tha lauTa hun to ek dhup ka TukDa nahin milta 
jo dil mein samae the wo ab shamil-e-dil hain is aaine mein aks kisi ka nahin milta 
tu ne hi to chaha tha ki milta rahun tujh se teri yahi marzi hai to achchha nahin milta 
dil mein to dhaDakne ki sada bhi nahin 'mushtaq' raste mein hai wo bhiD ki rasta nahin milta

is qadar naaz hai kyuuñ aap ko yaktā.ī kā dūsrā naam hai vo bhī mirī tanhā.ī kā 
kyā chhupe raaz ilāhī dil-e-shaidā.ī kā arsa-e-hashr to bāzār hai rusvā.ī kā 
jaan le jā.egā aanā shab-e-tanhā.ī kā kaun ab rokne vaalā hai mirī aa.ī kā 
ḳhūgar-e-ranj-o-balā hashr ke din kyā ḳhush hoñ ki vo maal aaj huā hai shab-e-tanhā.ī kā 
zinda hai naam shahādat kā usī ke dam se tere kushte ne kiyā kaam masīhā.ī kā 
har galī kūche meñ pāmāl use ho jaanā dil hai yā naqsh-e-qadam hai kisī harjā.ī kā 
is adab se tah-e-shamshīr taḌapnā ai dil ki gumāñ terī tapish par ho shakebā.ī kā 
fitne bhī qā.ede se uThte haiñ jab uThte haiñ kyā salīqa hai tumheñ anjuman-ārā.ī kā 
vo ye kahte haiñ mirā sabr paḌegā tujh par ab mujhe ranj nahīñ apnī shakebā.ī kā 
kyā ġharaz hai mirī taqdīr ko mujh se pūchhe aabrū kā hai talabgār ki rusvā.ī kā 
vaañ shab-e-va.ada malī paañv meñ mehñdī us ne yaañ kalejā koī maltā hai tamannā.ī kā 
raat bhar sham.a rahī hijr meñ vo bhī ḳhāmosh multajī thā tirī tasvīr se goyā.ī kā 
sar mirā kaaT ke dahlīz par apnī rakh do shauq baaqī hai abhī nāsiya-farsā.ī kā 
yuuñ na maqbūl huā hogā kisī kā sajda but ko armān rahā merī jabīñ-sā.ī kā 
ho gayā partav-e-ruḳhsār se kuchh aur hī rañg maiñ ne muñh chuum liyā us ke tamāshā.ī kā 
tham ga.e jam ga.e āñkhoñ meñ lahū ke qatre ḳhuun zāhir hai mire sabr o shakebā.ī kā 
ban gayā dāġh-e-jigar mehr-e-qayāmat ai 'dāġh' par abhī rañg vahī hai shab-e-tanhā.ī kā 
is qadar naz hai kyun aap ko yaktai ka dusra nam hai wo bhi meri tanhai ka 
kya chhupe raaz ilahi dil-e-shaidai ka arsa-e-hashr to bazar hai ruswai ka 
jaan le jaega aana shab-e-tanhai ka kaun ab rokne wala hai meri aai ka 
KHugar-e-ranj-o-bala hashr ke din kya KHush hon ki wo mal aaj hua hai shab-e-tanhai ka 
zinda hai nam shahadat ka usi ke dam se tere kushte ne kiya kaam masihai ka 
har gali kuche mein pamal use ho jaana dil hai ya naqsh-e-qadam hai kisi harjai ka 
is adab se tah-e-shamshir taDapna ai dil ki guman teri tapish par ho shakebai ka 
fitne bhi qaede se uThte hain jab uThte hain kya saliqa hai tumhein anjuman-arai ka 
wo ye kahte hain mera sabr paDega tujh par ab mujhe ranj nahin apni shakebai ka 
kya gharaz hai meri taqdir ko mujh se puchhe aabru ka hai talabgar ki ruswai ka 
wan shab-e-wada mali panw mein mehndi us ne yan kaleja koi malta hai tamannai ka 
raat bhar shama rahi hijr mein wo bhi KHamosh multaji tha teri taswir se goyai ka 
sar mera kaT ke dahliz par apni rakh do shauq baqi hai abhi nasiya-farsai ka 
yun na maqbul hua hoga kisi ka sajda but ko arman raha meri jabin-sai ka 
ho gaya partaw-e-ruKHsar se kuchh aur hi rang main ne munh chum liya us ke tamashai ka 
tham gae jam gae aankhon mein lahu ke qatre KHun zahir hai mere sabr o shakebai ka 
ban gaya dagh-e-jigar mehr-e-qayamat ai 'dagh' par abhi rang wahi hai shab-e-tanhai ka

ḳhvāb ke phūloñ kī ta.abīreñ kahānī ho ga.iiñ ḳhuun ThanDā paḌ gayā āñkheñ purānī ho ga.iiñ 
jis kā chehra thā chamakte mausamoñ kī aarzū us kī tasvīreñ bhī aurāq-e-ḳhizānī ho ga.iiñ 
dil bhar aayā kāġhaz-e-ḳhālī kī sūrat dekh kar jin ko likhnā thā vo sab bāteñ zabānī ho ga.iiñ 
jo muqaddar thā use to roknā bas meñ na thā un kā kyā karte jo bāteñ nā-gahānī ho ga.iiñ 
rah gayā 'mushtāq' dil meñ rañg-e-yād-e-raftagāñ phuul mahñge ho ga.e qabreñ purānī ho ga.iiñ 
KHwab ke phulon ki tabiren kahani ho gain KHun ThanDa paD gaya aankhen purani ho gain 
jis ka chehra tha chamakte mausamon ki aarzu us ki taswiren bhi auraq-e-KHizani ho gain 
dil bhar aaya kaghaz-e-KHali ki surat dekh kar jin ko likhna tha wo sab baaten zabani ho gain 
jo muqaddar tha use to rokna bas mein na tha un ka kya karte jo baaten na-gahani ho gain 
rah gaya 'mushtaq' dil mein rang-e-yaad-e-raftagan phul mahnge ho gae qabren purani ho gain

lutf kī un se iltijā na kareñ ham ne aisā kabhī kiyā na kareñ 
mil rahegā jo un se milnā hai lab ko sharminda-e-duā na kareñ 
sabr mushkil hai aarzū bekār kyā kareñ āshiqī meñ kyā na kareñ 
maslak-e-ishq meñ hai fikr harām dil ko tadbīr-āshnā na kareñ 
bhuul hī jaa.eñ ham ko ye to na ho log mere liye duā na kareñ 
marzi-e-yār ke ḳhilāf na ho kaun kahtā hai vo jafā na kareñ 
shauq un kā so miT chukā 'hasrat' kyā kareñ ham agar vafā na kareñ 
lutf ki un se iltija na karen hum ne aisa kabhi kiya na karen 
mil rahega jo un se milna hai lab ko sharminda-e-dua na karen 
sabr mushkil hai aarzu bekar kya karen aashiqi mein kya na karen 
maslak-e-ishq mein hai fikr haram dil ko tadbir-ashna na karen 
bhul hi jaen hum ko ye to na ho log mere liye dua na karen 
marzi-e-yar ke KHilaf na ho kaun kahta hai wo jafa na karen 
shauq un ka so miT chuka 'hasrat' kya karen hum agar wafa na karen

pukārtī hai ḳhamoshī mirī fuġhāñ kī tarah nigāheñ kahtī haiñ sab rāz-e-dil zabāñ kī tarah 
bigaḌ ga.ī hai yahāñ be-tarah jahāñ kī tarah kahāñ kī vaz.a kahāñ kī adā kahāñ kī tarah 
chhuḌā de qaid se ai barq ham asīroñ ko lagā de aag qafas ko bhī āshiyāñ kī tarah 
kabhī to sulh bhī ho jaa.e zohd o mastī meñ ilāhī shaiḳh bhī mai-ḳhvār ho muġhāñ kī tarah 
jalā ke dāġh-e-mohabbat ne dil ko ḳhaak kiyā bahār aa.ī mire baaġh meñ ḳhizāñ kī tarah 
hayā ne rok liyā jazb-e-dil ne khīñch liyā chale vo tiir kī sūrat khiñchī kamāñ kī tarah 
talāsh-e-yār meñ chhoḌī na sarzamīñ koī hamāre paañv meñ chakkar hai āsmāñ kī tarah 
jo samjhe ḳhizr to qaul-e-shahīd-e-ulfat ko girah meñ bāñdh rakkhe umr-e-jāvedāñ kī tarah 
sune jo hazrat-e-zāhid se vasf jannat ke to saaf phir ga.ī āñkhoñ meñ us makāñ kī tarah 
jhukī hī jaatī hai kuchh ḳhud-ba-ḳhud hayā se vo aañkh girī hī paḌtī hai bīmār-e-nā-tavāñ kī tarah 
ye sadd-e-rāh huā kis kā pās-e-rusvā.ī ruke hue haiñ mire ashk kārvāñ kī tarah 
adā-e-matlab-e-dil ham se siikh jaa.e koī unheñ sunā hī diyā haal dāstāñ kī tarah 
maze haiñ us dahan-e-zaḳhm ke liye kyā kyā jo chūse tiir ke paikān ko zabāñ kī tarah 
samajh ke kījiye barbād merā musht-e-ġhubār ye le na aa.e koī chakkar āsmāñ kī tarah 
ye dil hai aap kā ghar rahiye shauq se lekin shakeb-o-rāhat-o-sabr-o-qarār-e-jāñ kī tarah 
qayāmat aa.ī shab-e-vasl mere ghar ke paas raqīb ne use āvāz dī azaañ kī tarah 
shab us kī bazm meñ thā sham.a par bhī rashk hameñ ki muñh meñ shole ko gul-gīr le zabāñ kī tarah 
mujhe ye hukm hai zinhār tum na karnā ishq nasīhateñ bhī vo karte haiñ imtihāñ kī tarah 
ham apne zo.af ke sadqe biThā diyā aisā hile na dar se tire sañg-e-āstāñ kī tarah 
kuchh un se kahne ko baiThe the ham ki ḳhalvat meñ raqīb aa hī gayā marg-e-nā-gahāñ kī tarah 
shikasta baal huuñ vo murġh-e-nātavāñ-o-za.īf ki maiñ to maiñ na uḌe mere āshiyāñ kī tarah 
na hoñge soz-e-mohabbat ke dil-jale ThanDe bharī hai ātish-e-ġham maġhz-e-ustuḳhvāñ kī tarah 
na chhoḌ said-e-mohabbat ko ḳhaak par sayyād use bhī Daal le tū dosh par kamāñ kī tarah 
zabān-e-ḳhār huī tar hamārī vahshat se ki chhāle phūTe bhī chashm-e-ḳhūñ-fishāñ kī tarah 
ḳhudā qubūl kare 'dāġh' tum jo sū-e-adam chale ho ishq-e-butāñ le ke armuġhāñ kī tarah 
pukarti hai KHamoshi meri fughan ki tarah nigahen kahti hain sab raaz-e-dil zaban ki tarah 
bigaD gai hai yahan be-tarah jahan ki tarah kahan ki waza kahan ki ada kahan ki tarah 
chhuDa de qaid se ai barq hum asiron ko laga de aag qafas ko bhi aashiyan ki tarah 
kabhi to sulh bhi ho jae zohd o masti mein ilahi shaiKH bhi mai-KHwar ho mughan ki tarah 
jala ke dagh-e-mohabbat ne dil ko KHak kiya bahaar aai mere bagh mein KHizan ki tarah 
haya ne rok liya jazb-e-dil ne khinch liya chale wo tir ki surat khinchi kaman ki tarah 
talash-e-yar mein chhoDi na sarzamin koi hamare panw mein chakkar hai aasman ki tarah

sune jo hazrat-e-zahid se wasf jannat ke to saf phir gai aankhon mein us makan ki tarah 
jhuki hi jati hai kuchh KHud-ba-KHud haya se wo aankh giri hi paDti hai bimar-e-na-tawan ki tarah 
ye sadd-e-rah hua kis ka pas-e-ruswai ruke hue hain mere ashk karwan ki tarah 
ada-e-matlab-e-dil hum se sikh jae koi unhen suna hi diya haal dastan ki tarah 
maze hain us dahan-e-zaKHm ke liye kya kya jo chuse tir ke paikan ko zaban ki tarah 
samajh ke kijiye barbaad mera musht-e-ghubar ye le na aae koi chakkar aasman ki tarah 
ye dil hai aap ka ghar rahiye shauq se lekin shakeb-o-rahat-o-sabr-o-qarar-e-jaan ki tarah 
qayamat aai shab-e-wasl mere ghar ke pas raqib ne use aawaz di azan ki tarah 
shab us ki bazm mein tha shama par bhi rashk hamein ki munh mein shole ko gul-gir le zaban ki tarah 
mujhe ye hukm hai zinhaar tum na karna ishq nasihaten bhi wo karte hain imtihan ki tarah 
hum apne zoaf ke sadqe biTha diya aisa hile na dar se tere sang-e-astan ki tarah 
kuchh un se kahne ko baiThe the hum ki KHalwat mein raqib aa hi gaya marg-e-na-gahan ki tarah 
shikasta baal hun wo murgh-e-natawan-o-zaif ki main to main na uDe mere aashiyan ki tarah 
na honge soz-e-mohabbat ke dil-jale ThanDe bhari hai aatish-e-gham maghz-e-ustuKHwan ki tarah 
na chhoD said-e-mohabbat ko KHak par sayyaad use bhi Dal le tu dosh par kaman ki tarah 
zaban-e-KHar hui tar hamari wahshat se ki chhaale phuTe bhi chashm-e-KHun-fishan ki tarah 
KHuda qubul kare 'dagh' tum jo su-e-adam chale ho ishq-e-butan le ke armughan ki tarah

shām-e-ġham yaad hai kab sham.a jalī yaad nahīñ kab vo ruḳhsat hue kab raat Dhalī yaad nahīñ 
dil se bahte hue paanī kī sadā guzrī thī kab dhuñdlakā huā kab naav chalī yaad nahīñ 
ThanDe mausam meñ pukārā koī ham aate haiñ jis meñ ham khel rahe the vo galī yaad nahīñ 
in mazāfāt meñ chhup chhup ke havā chaltī thī kaise khiltī thī mohabbat kī kalī yaad nahīñ 
jism-o-jāñ Duub ga.e ḳhvāb-e-farāmoshī meñ ab koī baat burī ho ki bhalī yaad nahīñ 
sham-e-gham yaad hai kab shama jali yaad nahin kab wo ruKHsat hue kab raat Dhali yaad nahin 
dil se bahte hue pani ki sada guzri thi kab dhundlaka hua kab naw chali yaad nahin 
ThanDe mausam mein pukara koi hum aate hain jis mein hum khel rahe the wo gali yaad nahin 
in mazafat mein chhup chhup ke hawa chalti thi kaise khilti thi mohabbat ki kali yaad nahin 
jism-o-jaan Dub gae KHwab-e-faramoshi mein ab koi baat buri ho ki bhali yaad nahin

huā jab sāmnā us ḳhūb-rū se uḌā hai rañg gul kā pahle bū se 
ye āñkheñ tar jo rahtī haiñ lahū se vo guzre ishq ke din aabrū se 
ise kahiye shahādat-nāma-e-ishq use likkhā hai ḳhat apne lahū se 
dhuāñ ban kar uḌī missī kī rañgat ye kis ne jal ke tere hoñT chūse 
raqīboñ ko tamannā hai to bāshad tumheñ matlab parā.ī aarzū se 
vo gul-takiya mire marqad meñ rakhnā mo.attar ho jo zulf-e-mushk-bū se 
na.ī zid hai ki dil ham muft leñge bhalā kyā fā.eda is guftugū se 
adū bhī tum ko chāhe ai tirī shaan laḌāte haiñ ham apnī aarzū se 
huā hai tū to shāhid-bāz ai dil bachā.ūñ tujh ko kis kis ḳhūb-rū se 
lagā rakkhī hai ḳhaak us rahguzar kī tayammum apnā baḌh kar hai vuzū se 
hamārā dil use ab DhūñDtā hai thake haiñ paañv jis kī justujū se 
ḳhudā jaane chhalāvā thā ki bijlī abhī niklā hai koī rū-ba-rū se 
huā hai 'dāġh' aasif kā namak-ḳhvār guzar jaa.e ilāhī aabrū se 
hua jab samna us KHub-ru se uDa hai rang gul ka pahle bu se 
ye aankhen tar jo rahti hain lahu se wo guzre ishq ke din aabru se 
ise kahiye shahadat-nama-e-ishq use likkha hai KHat apne lahu se 
dhuan ban kar uDi missi ki rangat ye kis ne jal ke tere honT chuse 
raqibon ko tamanna hai to bashad tumhein matlab parai aarzu se 
wo gul-takiya mere marqad mein rakhna moattar ho jo zulf-e-mushk-bu se 
nai zid hai ki dil hum muft lenge bhala kya faeda is guftugu se 
adu bhi tum ko chahe ai teri shan laDate hain hum apni aarzu se 
hua hai tu to shahid-baz ai dil bachaun tujh ko kis kis KHub-ru se 
laga rakkhi hai KHak us rahguzar ki tayammum apna baDh kar hai wuzu se 
hamara dil use ab DhunDta hai thake hain panw jis ki justuju se 
KHuda jaane chhalawa tha ki bijli abhi nikla hai koi ru-ba-ru se 
hua hai 'dagh' aasif ka namak-KHwar guzar jae ilahi aabru se

āsān-e-haqīqī hai na kuchh sahl-e-majāzī ma.alūm huī rāh-e-mohabbat kī darāzī 
kuchh lutf o nazar lāzim o malzūm nahīñ haiñ ik ye bhī tamannā kī na ho sho.abada baazī 
dil ḳhuub samajhtā hai tire harf-e-karam ko har-chand vo urdu hai na turkī hai na taazī 
qaa.im hai na vo husn-e-ruḳh-e-yār kā aalam baaqī hai na vo shauq kī hañgāma-navāzī 
ai ishq tirī fat.h bahar-hāl hai sābit mar kar bhī shahīdān-e-mohabbat hue ġhāzī 
kar jald hameñ ḳhatm kahīñ ai ġham-e-jānāñ kaam aa.egī kis roz tirī sīna-gudāzī 
ma.alūm hai duniyā ko ye 'hasrat' kī haqīqat ḳhalvat meñ vo mai-ḳhvār hai jalvat meñ namāzī 
aasan-e-haqiqi hai na kuchh sahl-e-majazi malum hui rah-e-mohabbat ki daraazi 
kuchh lutf o nazar lazim o malzum nahin hain ek ye bhi tamanna ki na ho shoabada bazi 
dil KHub samajhta hai tere harf-e-karam ko har-chand wo urdu hai na turki hai na tazi 
qaim hai na wo husn-e-ruKH-e-yar ka aalam baqi hai na wo shauq ki hangama-nawazi 
ai ishq teri fath bahar-haal hai sabit mar kar bhi shahidan-e-mohabbat hue ghazi 
kar jald hamein KHatm kahin ai gham-e-jaanan kaam aaegi kis roz teri sina-gudazi 
malum hai duniya ko ye 'hasrat' ki haqiqat KHalwat mein wo mai-KHwar hai jalwat mein namazi

qarīne se ajab ārāsta qātil kī mahfil hai jahāñ sar chāhiye sar hai jahāñ dil chāhiye dil hai 
har ik ke vāste kab ishq kī dushvār manzil hai jise āsāñ hai āsāñ hai jise mushkil hai mushkil hai 
zahe taqdīr kis ārām o rāhat se vo bismil hai ki jis ke sar kā takiya der se zānū-e-qātil hai 
tarīq-e-ishq kuchh āsān hai kuchh ham ko mushkil hai idhar rahbar udhar rahzan yahī manzil-ba-manzil hai 
mujhe tujh se rukāvaT aur tū ġhairoñ pe maa.il hai mirā dil ab tirā dil hai tirā dil ab mirā dil hai 
baḌhā dil is qadar fart-e-ḳhushī se vasl kī shab ko mujhe ye vahm thā pahlū meñ ye takiya hai yā dil hai 
tirī talvār ke qurbān ai saffāk kyā kahnā idhar kushte pe kushta hai udhar bismil pe bismil hai 
adam meñ le chalā hai rahnumā-e-ishq kyā mujh ko yahī kahtā hai aa pahuñche haiñ thoḌī duur manzil hai 
unheñ jab mehrbāñ pā kar savāl-e-vasl kar baiThā dabī āvāz se sharmā ke vo bole ye mushkil hai 
sitam bhī ho to mujh par ho jafā bhī ho to mujh par ho mujhe is rashk ne maarā vo kyuuñ aalam kā qātil hai 
masīhā ne tire bīmār ko dekhā to farmāyā na ye jiine ke qābil hai na ye marne ke qābil hai 
zabardastī to dekho haath rakh kar mere siine par vo kis da.ave se kahte haiñ hamārā hī to ye dil hai 
hamāre dil meñ aa kar sair dekho ḳhūb-rūyoñ kī ki indr kā akhāḌā hai parī-zādoñ kī mahfil hai 
madārij ishq ke tai ho sakeñ ye ho nahīñ saktā zamīñ se arsh tak ai be-ḳhabar manzil-ba-manzil hai 
jhiḌakte ho mujhe kyuuñ duur hī se paas aane do baḌhā kar haath dil detā huuñ tum samjhe ho saa.il hai 
sunā bhī tū ne ai dil kyā sadā aatī hai mahshar meñ yahī din imtihāñ kā hai hamāre kaun shāmil hai 
uḌāte haiñ maze duniyā ke ham ai 'dāġh' ghar baiThe dakan meñ ab to afzalganj apnī aish manzil hai 
qarine se ajab aarasta qatil ki mahfil hai jahan sar chahiye sar hai jahan dil chahiye dil hai 
har ek ke waste kab ishq ki dushwar manzil hai jise aasan hai aasan hai jise mushkil hai mushkil hai 
zahe taqdir kis aaram o rahat se wo bismil hai ki jis ke sar ka takiya der se zanu-e-qatil hai 
tariq-e-ishq kuchh aasan hai kuchh hum ko mushkil hai idhar rahbar udhar rahzan yahi manzil-ba-manzil hai 
mujhe tujh se rukawaT aur tu ghairon pe mail hai mera dil ab tera dil hai tera dil ab mera dil hai 
baDha dil is qadar fart-e-KHushi se wasl ki shab ko mujhe ye wahm tha pahlu mein ye takiya hai ya dil hai 
teri talwar ke qurban ai saffak kya kahna idhar kushte pe kushta hai udhar bismil pe bismil hai 
adam mein le chala hai rahnuma-e-ishq kya mujh ko yahi kahta hai aa pahunche hain thoDi dur manzil hai 
unhen jab mehrban pa kar sawal-e-wasl kar baiTha dabi aawaz se sharma ke wo bole ye mushkil hai 
sitam bhi ho to mujh par ho jafa bhi ho to mujh par ho mujhe is rashk ne mara wo kyun aalam ka qatil hai 
masiha ne tere bimar ko dekha to farmaya na ye jine ke qabil hai na ye marne ke qabil hai 
zabardasti to dekho hath rakh kar mere sine par wo kis dawe se kahte hain hamara hi to ye dil hai 
hamare dil mein aa kar sair dekho KHub-ruyon ki ki indr ka akhaDa hai pari-zadon ki mahfil hai 
madarij ishq ke tai ho saken ye ho nahin sakta zamin se arsh tak ai be-KHabar manzil-ba-manzil hai 
jhiDakte ho mujhe kyun dur hi se pas aane do baDha kar hath dil deta hun tum samjhe ho sail hai 
suna bhi tu ne ai dil kya sada aati hai mahshar mein yahi din imtihan ka hai hamare kaun shamil hai 
uDate hain maze duniya ke hum ai 'dagh' ghar baiThe dakan mein ab to afzalganj apni aish manzil hai

vasl kī bantī haiñ in bātoñ se tadbīreñ kahīñ ārzūoñ se phirā kartī haiñ taqdīreñ kahīñ 
be-zabānī tarjumān-e-shauq behad ho to ho varna pesh-e-yār kaam aatī haiñ taqrīreñ kahīñ 
miT rahī haiñ dil se yādeñ rozgār-e-aish kī ab nazar kaahe ko ā.eñgī ye tasvīreñ kahīñ 
iltifāt-e-yār thā ik ḳhvāb-e-āġhāz-e-vafā sach huā kartī haiñ in ḳhvāboñ kī ta.abīreñ kahīñ 
terī be-sabrī hai 'hasrat' ḳhām-kārī kī dalīl girya-e-ushshāq meñ hotī haiñ tāsīreñ kahīñ 
wasl ki banti hain in baaton se tadbiren kahin aarzuon se phira karti hain taqdiren kahin 
be-zabani tarjuman-e-shauq behad ho to ho warna pesh-e-yar kaam aati hain taqriren kahin 
miT rahi hain dil se yaaden rozgar-e-aish ki ab nazar kahe ko aaengi ye taswiren kahin 
iltifat-e-yar tha ek KHwab-e-aghaz-e-wafa sach hua karti hain in KHwabon ki tabiren kahin 
teri be-sabri hai 'hasrat' KHam-kari ki dalil girya-e-ushshaq mein hoti hain tasiren kahin

tāsīr-e-barq-e-husn jo un ke suḳhan meñ thī ik larzish-e-ḳhafī mire saare badan meñ thī 
vaañ se nikal ke phir na farāġhat huī nasīb āsūdgī kī jaan tirī anjuman meñ thī 
ik rañg-e-iltifāt bhī us be-ruḳhī meñ thā ik sādgī bhī us nigah-e-sahar fan meñ thī 
mohtāj-e-bū-e-itr na thā jism-e-ḳhūb-e-yār ḳhushbu-e-dilbarī thī jo us pairahan meñ thī 
kuchh dil hī bujh gayā hai mirā varna aaj kal kaifiyat-e-bahār kī shiddat chaman meñ thī 
mālūm ho ga.ī mire dil ko rāh-e-shauq vo baat pyaar kī jo hunūz us dahan meñ thī 
ġhurbat kī sub.h meñ bhī nahīñ hai vo raushnī jo raushnī ki shām-e-savād-e-vatan meñ thī 
aish gudāz-e-dil bhī ġham-e-āshiqī meñ thā ik rāhat-e-latīf bhī zimn-e-mehan meñ thī 
achchhā huā ki ḳhātir-e-'hasrat' se haT ga.ī haibat sī ik jo ḳhatra-e-dār-o-rasan meñ thī 
tasir-e-barq-e-husn jo un ke suKHan mein thi ek larzish-e-KHafi mere sare badan mein thi 
wan se nikal ke phir na faraghat hui nasib aasudgi ki jaan teri anjuman mein thi 
ek rang-e-iltifat bhi us be-ruKHi mein tha ek sadgi bhi us nigah-e-sahar fan mein thi 
mohtaj-e-bu-e-itr na tha jism-e-KHub-e-yar KHushbu-e-dilbari thi jo us pairahan mein thi 
kuchh dil hi bujh gaya hai mera warna aaj kal kaifiyat-e-bahaar ki shiddat chaman mein thi 
malum ho gai mere dil ko rah-e-shauq wo baat pyar ki jo hunuz us dahan mein thi 
ghurbat ki subh mein bhi nahin hai wo raushni jo raushni ki sham-e-sawad-e-watan mein thi 
aish gudaz-e-dil bhi gham-e-ashiqi mein tha ek rahat-e-latif bhi zimn-e-mehan mein thi 
achchha hua ki KHatir-e-'hasrat' se haT gai haibat si ek jo KHatra-e-dar-o-rasan mein thi

jo vo nazar basar-e-lutf aam ho jaa.e ajab nahīñ ki hamārā bhī kaam ho jaa.e 
sharāb-e-shauq kī qīmat hai naqd-e-jān-e-azīz agar ye bā.is-e-kaif-e-davām ho jaa.e 
rahīn-e-yās raheñ ahl-e-ārzū kab tak kabhī to aap kā darbār aam ho jaa.e

vo duur hī se hameñ dekh leñ yahī hai bahut magar qubūl hamārā salām ho jaa.e 
agar vo husn-e-dil-ārā kabhī ho jalva farosh faroġh-e-nūr meñ gum zarf-e-bām ho jaa.e 
sunā hai bar-sar-e-baḳhshish hai aaj piir muġhāñ hameñ bhī kaash atā koī jaam ho jaa.e 
tire karam pe hai mauqūf kāmrāni-e-shauq ye nā-tamām ilāhī tamām ho jaa.e 
sitam ke baad karam hai jafā ke baad atā hameñ hai bas jo yahī iltizām ho jaa.e 
atā ho soz vo yā rab junūn-e-'hasrat' ko ki jis se puḳhta ye saudā-e-ḳhām ho jaa.e 
jo wo nazar basar-e-lutf aam ho jae ajab nahin ki hamara bhi kaam ho jae

rahin-e-yas rahen ahl-e-arzu kab tak kabhi to aap ka darbar aam ho jae 
jo aur kuchh ho teri did ke siwa manzur to mujh pe KHwahish-e-jannat haram ho jae 
wo dur hi se hamein dekh len yahi hai bahut magar qubul hamara salam ho jae

suna hai bar-sar-e-baKHshish hai aaj pir mughan hamein bhi kash ata koi jam ho jae 
tere karam pe hai mauquf kaamrani-e-shauq ye na-tamam ilahi tamam ho jae 
sitam ke baad karam hai jafa ke baad ata hamein hai bas jo yahi iltizam ho jae

kyā tarz-e-kalām ho ga.ī hai har baat payām ho ga.ī hai

jaate jaate payām-bar ko har sub.h se shaam ho ga.ī hai 
ab dekhiye mashq-e-pā.emālī tārīf-e-ḳhirām ho ga.ī hai 
pahuñche haiñ jab us kī bazm meñ ham majlis hī tamām ho ga.ī hai 
aalam ko hai dāva-e-mohabbat ye ḳhaas bhī aam ho ga.ī hai 
us but ke hamīñ nahīñ haiñ bande maḳhlūq ġhulām ho ga.ī hai 
barbād na hogī terī ulfat tajvīz maqām ho ga.ī hai 
jāgīr junūñ kī qais ke ba.ad ab 'dāġh' ke naam ho ga.ī hai 
kya tarz-e-kalam ho gai hai har baat payam ho gai hai

husn-e-be-mehr ko parvā-e-tamannā kyā ho jab ho aisā to ilāj-e-dil-e-shaidā kyā ho 
kasrat-e-husn kī ye shaan na dekhī na sunī barq larzāñ hai koī garm-e-tamāshā kyā ho 
be-misālī ke haiñ ye rang jo bā-vasf-e-hijāb be-naqābī pe tirā jalva-e-yaktā kyā ho 
dekheñ ham bhī jo tire husn-e-dil-ārā kī bahār is meñ nuqsān tirā ai gul-e-rā'nā kyā ho 
ham ġharaz-mand kahāñ martaba-e-ishq kahāñ ham ko samjheñ vo havas-kār to bejā kyā ho 
dil-farebī hai tirī bā.is-e-sad josh o ḳharosh haal ye ho to dil-e-zār shakebā kyā ho 
raat din rahne lagī us sitam-ījād kī yaad 'hasrat' ab dekhiye anjām hamārā kyā ho 
husn-e-be-mehr ko parwa-e-tamanna kya ho jab ho aisa to ilaj-e-dil-e-shaida kya ho 
kasrat-e-husn ki ye shan na dekhi na suni barq larzan hai koi garm-e-tamasha kya ho 
be-misali ke hain ye rang jo ba-wasf-e-hijab be-naqabi pe tera jalwa-e-yakta kya ho 
dekhen hum bhi jo tere husn-e-dil-ara ki bahaar is mein nuqsan tera ai gul-e-ra'na kya ho 
hum gharaz-mand kahan martaba-e-ishq kahan hum ko samjhen wo hawas-kar to beja kya ho 
dil-farebi hai teri bais-e-sad josh o KHarosh haal ye ho to dil-e-zar shakeba kya ho 
raat din rahne lagi us sitam-ijad ki yaad 'hasrat' ab dekhiye anjam hamara kya ho
